title: Mommessin Cuvee St Pierre Rouge
Description: This red blend is pale ruby in colour and offers subtle cherry aromas and flavours. Light-bodied and fruity, it is consistently well-made. Soft texture along with a balanced finish makes this wine appealing, versatile and food-friendly. Serve with beef tenderloin or enjoy lightly chilled with baked salmon.

title: Folonari Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Valpolicella is the classic red wine of Italy's Veneto region; a blend of local grape varieties that combine to give forward fruit and a supple approachable structure. Ruby red in colour, with upfront spice and plum aromas. On the palate, expect a medium body, soft berry and plum flavours and a fresh, food-friendly finish.

title: Mouton Cadet Bordeaux Red AOC
Description: From France's leading wine family, a wine that has been the world's introduction to the Bordeaux region since 1930. Merlot is dominant, contributing forward berry fruit. Cabernet sauvignon brings structure and cabernet franc adds elegance and finesse. Serve with pork tenderloin, duck breast or a selection of cheeses.

title: Flat Rock Pinot Noir
Description: Innovative Flat Rock Cellars specializes in crafting elegant Pinot Noir. This excellent wine is a great introduction, with its flavours of raspberry, beetroot, smoked meat and spice. It works well with grilled salmon or with veal in a red wine reduction.

title: Ruffino Chianti
Description: Ruffino's original wine, and one of the world's most recognized Tuscan wines. The wine is extra dry, medium-bodied and well-structured. Enjoy aromas and flavours of chestnut, leather, rye bread and red berry fruit, with spicy notes and a touch of pepper.  Serve with wild boar ragu, grilled steak or roasted vegetables.

title: Pisse-Dru Beaujolais
Description: The quirky name of this wine is an old expression describing how readily juice runs from well-ripened grapes. Its light-plus bodied, food-friendly, with appealing plum, nutty, spice and red fruit flavours and balanced, dry finish. A straightforward, juicy and reliable accompaniment for burgers, cold chicken or charcuterie.

title: Folonari Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Valpolicella is the classic red wine of Italy's Veneto region; a blend of local grape varieties that combine to give forward fruit and a supple approachable structure. Ruby red in colour, with upfront spice and plum aromas. On the palate, expect a medium body, soft berry and plum flavours and a fresh, food-friendly finish.

title: 20 Bees Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Red violet; aromas & flavours of herb, black currant & cherry; dry, medium-bodied with balanced acidity & ripe tannins.Bees are hardworking, unselfish and in tune with their environment - all qualities that would also describe Ontario winegrowers! Enjoy lifted aromas and flavours of cedar, bell pepper and black plum with herbal, leafy notes. Serve with grilled meats or a selection of local cheeses.

title: KWV Roodeberg Red
Description: Roodeberg Red is a classic blend of cabernet, shiraz and merlot, oak aged for depth and complexity. Aromas and flavours of smoke, floral note, dark fruit accented by notes of tobacco and spice. Serve with grilled lamb, smoked brisket or firm cheeses.

title: Rodet CdRhone AOC
Description: Great value young ripe and fruity Rhone red. Visually it is a deep ruby colour, while on the nose there is red cherry, raspberry, anise and light spice. Palate is dry, medium bodied and balanced. Immediately appealing from the first sip, showing flavours of ripe raspberry, plum and red fruit with notes of earth and spice.

title: Bouchard Aine & Fils Beaujolais Superieur
Description: Bouchard Ainé & Fils has been part of the wine trade in Burgundy and Beaujolais for over 200 years. This wine is medium-bodied and dry, with appealing flavours of red and black plums and berries, and red pear. Serve lightly chilled with grilled salmon, charcuterie or a selection of cheeses.

title: Anselme La Fiole Du Pape Chateauneuf-Du-Pape AOC
Description: The signature twisted bottle represents the gnarled vine of the Chateauneuf-du-Pape region. Primarily grenache and syrah, this full-bodied wine has lifted aromas and flavours of caramel and licorice, honey and watermelon. Serve with braised meats, mushroom risotto or roasted game bird.

title: Velletri Le Contrade Red IGP
Description: Italy's Velletri region has been known for fine wine since the early days of ancient Rome. The vineyards are sheltered by the Alban Hills, resulting in a vine-friendly climate. Experience upfront aromas and flavours of fresh rye bread, prune, nutmeg and fresh mushrooms. Serve with cured meats, hard cheeses and pasta dishes.

title: Sogrape Grao Vasco Dao
Description: Portugal's Dao region is home to some of Portugal's most celebrated red wines. Grao Vasco blends touriga nacional and tinta roriz grapes, and with meticulous winemaking crafts a flavourful and complex wine with youthful red and black plum fruit, rye bread and chocolate flavours. Serve with grilled meats, game and poultry.
By:: Vinicola Do Vale Do Dao Lda

title: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Attention to detail creates the quality and consistency that Wolf Blass wines are known for. Yellow Label Cab is made with fruit from Australia's Langhorne Creek and McLaren Vale regions. Enjoy flavours of coffee, smoky oak, black plum along with floral and wild honey notes. A superb pairing for roast lamb with rosemary.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. Extra dry and medium bodied, offering aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate, cedar, smoky oak and cassis. Serve with flank steak and grilled vegetables.

title: Jacob's Creek Shiraz Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A legend in South Eastern Australia, Jacob's Creek offers a modern expression of the classic Aussie shiraz-cabernet blend. Upfront aromas of licorice, fig, honey and herbs. Extra dry palate, with spice and fig flavours leading to a honey and toasty oak finish. Serve with ribeye steak, or lamb burgers with grilled mushrooms.

title: Yellow Tail Shiraz
Description: From Australia's largest family-owned wine company, a wine that's easy to drink, and easy to understand. It's dry, medium-bodied and softly structured, with aromas and flavours of coffee, floral note, prune, smoke and licorice. The ripe plummy-berry notes lead to a long, spicy finish. Serve with grilled lamb chops.

title: Chateau de Gourgazaud Minervois AOC
Description: The warm, dry climate of Minervois is ideal for powerful yet velvety wines. This syrah and mourvedre blend has lifted aromas and flavours of red cherry and plum, with notes of chocolate and mineral. Extra-dry and medium-bodied, with good balance and a smooth finish. Serve with smoked duck breast, lamb kebabs or cassoulet.

title: Hess Select Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: The Hess Collection was founded in 1978 by Donald Hess, who is a Swiss entrepreneur and art collector. The winery rose to prominence in the 1990s as a producer of exceptional Cabernet Sauvignon and has continued to be one of California's brightest stars. The Hess Select represents a reliable value for California Cabernet. Expect dark fruit and herbs, with good structure and weight. Pair with steak.

title: Fonseca Periquita Red
Description: In the era when most wine was sold by the barrel, Periquita was Portugal's first bottled wine. Made with the native castelao grape, it is extra dry and medium-bodied, with licorice, mushroom and fig flavours and balancing acidity. Medium tannins provide structure on the finish. Pair with meat dishes, game or firm cheeses.

title: Ruffino Il Ducale Toscana IGP
Description: An innovative blend of the traditional sangiovese with merlot and syrah. It pours a medium ruby red colour and shows bright aromas and flavours of berries - raspberry, cherry, plum and licorice with a minerally streak. The palate is dry, with soft balanced acidity and fine tannins. Great with herbed white meats.

title: Masi Modello Merlot Trevenezie IGT
Description: A charming, merlot-based red, that's crafted in a food friendly, easy drinking style. Medium ruby red in colour. Shows upfront aromas and flavours of toast, coffee and prune with notes of spice. On the palate, it's dry, light to medium bodied and well balanced, with soft tannins. Great paired with salumi or roasted meat.

title: Cantine Due Palme Canonico Negroamaro Salento IGP
Description: A bold, rustic red from Puglia made from the native negroamaro grape. Medium ruby red colour. Aromas and flavours of rye bread, spice, chestnut, black fruit and licorice. The palate is dry, medium-minus bodied with soft tannins and juicy dark fruit and spicy notes on the long finish. Pair with roasted or grilled meats.

title: Ciao Sangiovese Organic Terra De Chieti IGP
Description: Medium ruby with garnet tinges; aromas of dark fruit, chestnut, prune, licorice and a floral note; medium body, dry with dark fruit and spices on the finish.

title: Terrazas de los Andes Reserva Malbec 2018
Description: This is very reserved and polished with blackberries, smoke and sesame. Medium body. Delicious, soft finish. Nice transition from the 2017. Drink or hold. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, April 2, 2020)

title: Chateau Timberlay Bordeaux Superieur AOC
Description: Deep ruby/garnet red colour; complex bouquet of prunes, bell peppers, cedar and smoky notes; rich flavours follow nose, balanced long finish and firm tannins.

title: Concha y Toro Winemaker's Lot 148 Carmenère
Description: Produced exclusively for the Canadian market, this is loaded with warm earth, black cherry and fig with a notable campfire complexity. Characterfully dense and seriously structured with plush tannins and touches of spice. Great for ribs or veal medallions.

title: Mommessin Export St Pierre Rouge
Description: This red blend is pale ruby in colour and offers subtle cherry aromas and flavours. Light-bodied and fruity, it is consistently well-made. Soft texture along with a balanced finish makes this wine appealing, versatile and food-friendly. Serve with beef tenderloin or enjoy lightly chilled with baked salmon.

title: Calvet Reserve des Remparts Saint-Émilion
Description: An engaging Right Bank offering, which means it's mostly Merlot with Cabernet Franc in support. Floral, ripe and approachable, with juicy red cherry accented by smoke and oak spice. A classic pairing for lamb with rosemary, but don't be afraid to try it with spare ribs in a sticky sauce.

title: Fantini Sangiovese IGT
Description: Italy's Fantini Wines is based in Abruzzo's Terre di Chieti foothills, where sangiovese thrives. Modern in style, this velvety wine has floral aromas of toast, licorice, dark fruit and juniper. Its flavours smack of ripe dark fruit, spice and smoke. Pour a glass with your favourite pasta dish or with braised short ribs.

title: Marques De Riscal Rioja Reserva
Description: From the clay and limestone soil of northern Spain comes this elegant Rioja aged in oak barrels. Expect vanilla, cedar, stewed strawberries and spices with a toasty nuance and a woody finish.

title: Folonari Pinot Noir IGT
Description: Folonari sources pinot noir grown in the neighbouring region of Pavia, in Lombardy. Expressing the grape variety's elegance, this wine shows up-front aromas of red fruit, spice, and oak with a crisp cherry finish. Its food-friendly style pairs with many dishes; try it with turkey, veal, roasted eggplant, pizza or burgers.

title: Chateau Puyfromage Francs Cotes De Bordeaux AOC
Description: Chateau Puyfromage is located in the Francs Côtes de Bordeaux, next to Saint-Emilion. Merlot is the primary variety in this appellation. The wine has aromas of toast, smoke, chocolate and plum with notes of forest floor. On the palate, it is extra dry and medium-bodied, with dark fruit flavours and a spicy finish.

title: Pascual Toso Malbec
Description: Italian-born, Pascual Toso settled in Argentina and established his Mendoza winery in 1890. This wine shows flavours of chocolate, floral note and plum with hints of smoke and spice. Medium-plus body with soft tannins and a good mouthfeel, it will complement leaner cuts of beef like sirloin or filet as well as lamb or duck.

title: Torres Gran Coronas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Over 130 years old, Spain's Torres Winery almost single-handedly established the now-famous Penedès wine region. Intense redcurrant and plum, plus coffee bean flavours, with silky tannins. Pair with spicy beef fajitas, empanadas, filet mignon or grilled lamb.

title: Fontana Di Papa Red
Description: The grapes for this food-friendly wine are grown on volcanic soils in the hills southeast of the city of Rome. It is a light ruby colour, with aromas and flavours of licorice, prune, tobacco and flowers. Medium-bodied and fruity, with moderate tannins, this is well-suited for grilled meats, pizza, pasta and firm cheeses.

title: San Pedro 1865 Selected Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: From the 1865 line, this is a classic from vineyards in the Buin zone, planted on a second terrace of the Maipo, whose alluvial soils suit cabernet sauvignon very well. This wine was aged in barrels, 20% new, which have imparted spicy notes in a cabernet with delicious menthol notes, as well as fruity and earthy ones, too. The palate is pure ripe red fruit and a texture with enough tannins to consider cellaring it for a while. Score - 93. (Patricio Tapia, guiadescorchados.cl, 2020)

title: Negrar Valpolicella DOC
Description: This versatile red wine hails from the world-famous Valpolicella region. The wine styles of this region range from light-bodied to full and rich. Ruby red, with aromas and flavours of licorice, rye bread, berry mix and red fruit. Medium-bodied and fruity with soft tannins, this is perfect for spaghetti and meatballs.

title: Ruffino Chianti
Description: Ruffino's original wine, and one of the world's most recognized Tuscan wines. The wine is extra dry, medium-bodied and well-structured. Enjoy aromas and flavours of chestnut, leather, rye bread and red berry fruit, with spicy notes and a touch of pepper.  Serve with wild boar ragu, grilled steak or roasted vegetables.

title: Ruffino Chianti Classico Riserva Ducale
Description: A benchmark Tuscan wine, first released in 1927. Today, it is made with modern techniques, while still respecting the traditions of Chianti Classico. Cherry, plum, spice, and leather notes on the nose; dry, medium to full bodied, tart cherry and plum flavours with hints of cedar. Serve with osso buco or grilled steak.

title: Carpineto Riserva Chianti Classico 2016
Description: The 2016 Chianti Classico Riserva is wonderfully fleshy and expressive, and yet has plenty of structural underpinnings. Dark cherry, plum, spice, menthol, licorice and mocha open up with a bit of air. The balance of fruit depth allied to a mid-weight sense of structure is just compelling. Readers will find a potent, bruising Riserva with tons of character. Drinking window: 2021-2036. Score - 92. (Antonio Galloni, vinous.com, Sept. 2020)

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Woodbridge wines deliver a pure expression of fruit, and are part of Mondavi's goal to put great wines on every table. Plum, wild berry and coffee aromas and flavours, with balanced acidity and supple tannins. Nutty, toasty notes reflect well-judged oak ageing.  A superb choice for grilled meats or roasted vegetables.

title: Chanson Réserve du Bastion Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Description: Elegant, with sour cherry, mineral and spice. Unlike many wines at this price point, it's comprised entirely of fruit from the Côte d'Or. Food-friendly, it's perfect with grilled eggplant with veal cutlets, rotisserie chicken or rack of lamb.

title: Villa Antinori Toscana IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour; the aroma is dominated by notes of licorice, floral lift, nuts and ripe red fruits and berries; the palate is extra-dry, medium-bodied with persistent spice, nuts and red fruit flavours; the tannins are supple and rounded with a long savoury finish.

title: Barefoot Merlot
Description: A consistently good, award-winning merlot from California. Valued priced and made in a crowd-pleasing style. Ruby red in colour, the nose reveals upfront toast, prune and cassis aromas with notes of spiced chocolate. Dry, light to medium-bodied and rounded, with balanced silky tannins on the long lively berry fruit finish.

title: Smoking Loon Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red colour; bright aromas of black plum, blueberries, blackberries, clove and oak toast; the palate is dry, medium-bodied and shows more ripe plum and berry flavours with a touch of smoke on the finish.

title: Sterling Vintner's Collection Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Opaque ruby colour; scents of plum, chocolate, blackberry and spice; medium bodied, soft, silky tannins, ripe black fruit on the palate.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Carmenère
Description: Exuberant fruity aromas with hints of violets and spice. Dry, medium-full bodied, with flavours of dried herbs, blackberry, plus hints of oak.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Ruby purple; aromas and flavours of black fruit and cocoa, with notes of fresh herb; dry, medium bodied, with crisp but balanced acidity.Ruby purple; upfront aromas and flavours of toast, bell pepper, herbs and nuts; dry, medium bodied, with fresh, balanced acidity.

title: Peninsula Ridge Merlot VQA
Description: Medium ruby in colour with aromas of red fruit, herbs, berry, spice and watermelon. Medium-bodied, quite ripe and silky, it ends with toasted spices and harmonious tannins.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Concha y Toro sources the grapes for this 100% cabernet sauvignon wine from Chile's Central Valley. Delivering aromas of cassis, floral notes, coffee and toast and similar flavours of cassis with a hint of dark chocolate, this red is a delicious crowd-pleaser. The finish has firm tannins. Pair with beef tenderloin or lamb.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Red
Description: Medium ruby colour; gentle berry, toast and cedar aromas followed by vanilla and plum notes; medium-bodied with berry/cherry flavours.

title: Emiliana Coyam
Description: Named for the oak forests in Colchagua, this wine is mostly Syrah and Carmenère but can include up to seven other varietals such as Cabernet, Mourvèdre and Petit Verdot. It's elegant and refined, with red fruit, oak, pepper and vanilla. Pair with lamb chops and mushrooms.

title: Wayne Gretzky Merlot VQA
Description: Medium ruby; aromas & flavours of red cherry with hints of vanilla; dry, medium-bodied, well structured.Medium ruby in colour with aromas of red plum, nutmeg, cassis plus hints of smoke and cedar. It is medium-bodied with balanced acidity and supportive medium tannins, with flavours of red plum ending with fresh finish.

title: Featherstone Cabernet Franc
Description: This Cab Franc consistently over-delivers at this price point. It features excellent depth and complexity of rich dark fruit and vanilla notes accented by bright floral tones. Balanced and structured, it can be enjoyed tonight with your favourite grilled meats.

title: Strewn Rogue's Lot Cabernet Sauvignon Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Aromas of cherry & plum with floral & oak notes; dry, medium-bodied, with a smooth, round texture & soft tannins.Made from grapes grown in the Niagara Peninsula, this cabernet blend offers a complex array of spice, herbs, red fruit and berry aromas. On the palate, it is fresh with juicy, spicy red fruit flavours, medium tannins and a lingering underbrush note that comes through on the finish.

title: Creekside Syrah VQA
Description: Black raspberry, white pepper & oak on the nose; dry, with flavours of red cherry, damson plum & spice.Medium ruby colour; floral, black pepper and juniper aromas with smoky, black plum notes; ripe and juicy fruit flavours with a peppery, medium-long finish.

title: Gnarly Head Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: California's Lodi region has warm days and cool evenings-perfect for wines that are full-flavoured and balanced. Gnarly Head Cabernet Sauvignon has medium body and is well-structured, with ripe tannins and soft balanced acidity. Flavours of dark fruit, floral note, toasted oak, jam and hazelnut spread.

title: Latour Pinot Noir
Description: Ruby colour. Nuts, caramel, mushrooms and berry fruit with an underlying mineral note; extra dry, medium-bodied with caramel and berry fruit, and earth flavours.

title: Peninsula Ridge Shiraz VQA
Description: Aromas of ripe berries & spice, with notes of fresh leather; dry, with a mix of dark fruit, white pepper & floral notes.Clear ruby with violet at the rim; floral and berry marmalade aromas with spice and prune notes; medium body with berry preserve flavour and soft oak spice to finish.

title: Carlo Rossi California Red
Description: Pale ruby colour; mildly fruity nose displaying candied plum, floral and watermelon notes; light to medium body with crisp berry flavours

title: Man Family Skaapveld Shiraz 2019
Description: This silky-smooth Shiraz shows rich dark fruit, dark chocolate, earth, and a touch of black pepper spice. It has the structure and balance to drink to 2025 or beyond, making it a great value option as a cellar starter. Try it tonight with beef fajitas or burgers.

title: Castillo de Monseran Garnacha, Carinena DO
Description: Deep ruby colour; lifted aromas of ripe dark berries and fresh rye bread, blood orange and a touch of spice; medium bodied, medium tannins and juicy plum, citrus and spice flavours.

title: Cavallina Nero D'Avola Shz Terre Sicilane IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour with purple highlights; upfront aromas of black plum, nuts, licorice and honey; medium-minus bodied displaying flavours of ripe dark fruits and a soft spicy finish.

title: Santa Cristina Rosso Toscana IGT
Description: Ruby red colour; chestnut, leather, spice, plum and floral aromas; light to medium body; savory, dark fruit flavours, balanced lifted acidity, medium tannins with good length to finish.

title: Citra Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Medium ruby purple colour; smoke, rye bread, floral note and fig on nose and palate with hints of nuts, plum and spice; balanced acidity, medium-bodied with firm, dry finish.

title: Pelee Island Baco Noir VQA
Description: Deep purple red colour; aromas and flavours of smoky oak, floral tone, dark fruit and spice with leafy/tomato notes; extra dry, medium bodied, ripe and rounded, with tangy acidity and smoky, spicy dark fruit notes on the lengthy finish.

title: Susana Balbo Signature Malbec 2018
Description: Gustavo Bertagna has added 8% Cabernet Franc to this polished Paraje Altamira Malbec to give it 'more length and freshness' and the evidence is there in the glass. Dense, serious and built for the longer haul, it's inky, layered and profound, with blackberry and liquorice flavours, scented oak and impressive balance. Drink date: 2022-2028. Score - 93. (Tim Atkin, MW, timatkin.com, Argentina Special Report 2020)

title: Fuzion Shiraz Malbec
Description: Pale ruby purple colour; lifted aromas of toast and candied berries with a hint of coffee; extra dry, medium-bodied, flavours of candied berries with roasted coffee beans overtones.

title: Wildass Red 2018
Description: Wildass Red combines a who's who of different grapes each vintage, but whatever the blend, the wine is consistently fruit-forward, bright and savoury, with easygoing tannins. This one comes from the red-varietal-loving 2018 vintage. A great match for meaty stews. (March 31, 2021)

title: Brights Maria Christina Red
Description: Pale garnet; smoky nose; off dry palate with berry flavour and a soft finish

title: Loios Red
Description: Deep ruby with purple highlights; floral, pink grapefruit, red and dark berries, vanilla and toast aromas; dry, medium body; citrus, berries, vanilla and toast flavours, well balanced with medium length finish.

title: Finagra Alandra Red
Description: Deep ruby colour; dark fruit, herbal and prune aromas with hints of blood orange and chocolate; medium-bodied with black plum and herbal flavours.

title: J.P. Chenet Cabernet Syrah Organic Pays D'OC
Description: A charming, easy-drinking Southern French red, one of the world's best-selling French wines. A youthful, ruby red colour. Shows an intense nose of spices, smoke, prune and coffee beans with delicate licorice, herb and spice notes. Dry, medium bodied, with balanced acidity, supple tannin and spiced, ripe fruit flavours.

title: Santa Margherita Chianti Classico 2017
Description: A vibrant Chianti Classico with bright black cherry, red berry, earthy florals, cedar spice, savoury herbs wrapped up in a whiff of smoke. Drink date: 2020-2024. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, Nov. 3, 2020)

title: Red Knot Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Dark ruby colour; aromas of dark berry, light spice with herb and sweet oaky notes; dry, medium-full body, with a firm structure, black currant and plum flavours; and a long finish.

title: Jacob's Creek Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon Limestone Coast
Description: The unique soils and mild climate of Australia's Limestone Coast create some of Australia's finest red wines. Jacob's Creek Reserve is medium to full-bodied and smooth, with aromas and flavours of bright cassis, smoke, black olive and eucalyptus with rich oak notes emerging on a long finish. Serve with grilled flank steak.

title: The Prisoner
Description: This bold blend combines Zinfandel with Cabernet Sauvignon, Petite Sirah, Syrah and Charbono to create a robust, ripe, smooth salute to the 'mixed-blacks' field blends of early Italian immigrants to California. Named for and featuring the 1807 etching by Francisco de Goya on the label, this is a wine that will deliver dark chocolate and clove alongside rich dark fruit tones. A powerhouse wine that calls for a grilled steak.

title: Gray Fox Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium burgundy colour; aromas of cassis, rye bread and black plum with floral and spicy overtones; ripe flavours of sweet cassis.

title: Frescobaldi Chianti Nipozzano Riserva DOCG
Description: Deep red with garnet colour; floral aromas of red plum and berries, blood orange fruit with cedar notes; extra dry, medium to full bodied, with balanced fruit flavours, notes of plum, red fruit and citrus with a touch of spice and leather; balanced medium acidity and a long finish.

title: Angels Gate Gamay Noir VQA
Description: Often the underdog, gamay offers plenty of vibrant character, and this is a shining example. Ruby red colour pours into the glass that fills with lifted aromas of red fruit, rye bread, mushrooms, raspberry and strawberry. Extra dry and medium-bodied with fresh red fruit and berry flavours that dominate into the finish.

title: Pelee Island Monarch Red VQA
Description: Medium dark ruby colour; floral, yeasty, cedar and fresh berry aromas with a hint of toast; medium sweet, medium body; forward flavours of ripe berry fruit, balanced acidity, and a long, mouthfilling finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Merlot VQA
Description: Medium ruby red colour; aromas and flavours of black plum, dark berries and light, toasted oak notes; extra dry, medium bodied, low to medium balanced tannins and good acidity on finish.

title: Sandbanks Baco Noir VQA
Description: Deep ruby red colour; upfront aromas of vanilla and dark berry fruit; extra dry, medium bodied, with a sweet fruit centre, refreshing tangy acidity and flavours of juicy black fruit, hints of savory pink grapefruit and smokiness.

title: Rocca delle Macìe Riserva Chianti
Description: One of Italy's most famously food-friendly red wines, Chianti is a welcome guest at any table. This one shows layers of spice, chocolate, wild berry and cherry. A brilliant choice with eggplant parmigiana sandwiches or grilled beef and mushroom kebabs.

title: Konzelmann Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve VQA
Description: Pale ruby; upfront red fruit, herb and vanilla aromas; dry, light to medium-bodied with balanced tannin and acidity; flavours of red fruit, herbs, vanilla and spice carry into the medium long finish.

title: Beringer Main & Vine Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Rich deep ruby colour; moderate aromas of dark plum, chocolate, cedar and spice; flavours of juicy plum fruit, vanilla and cedar; dry, medium-bodied with silky tannins.

title: Concha Y Toro Frontera Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby colour; upfront black plum, smoke, nuts and mushrooms aromas; extra dry, balanced acidity and medium bodied, with good dark plum flavour, through to a pleasant fruity finish.

title: Creekside Laura's Red 2017
Description: Laura's Red is as classic an Ontario Wine as a Trius' Red... It's a wine with a lot of history of good wine making, good vintages behind it, collectability and longevity; and now that it is under screwcap, even more so - it has also been around for 20+ years. The 2017 is one of the best in years because it mixes complexity and elegance: lots of cassis, blackberry, and black cherry in the fruit department. Then we get subtle spice, coffee/mocha, black licorice and tobacco... There's a decade ahead of this wine and its peak is still, at least, five years away. Classic wine from an unlikely vintage.  Score - 4.5 Stars (out of 5). (michaelpinkuswinereview.com, Sept. 22, 2020)

title: Lindemans Bin 45 Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep garnet red colour; floral aromas of black plum and licorice with savory and honey notes; medium-bodied with plum, spice and honey flavours.

title: Georges Duboeuf Beaujolais-Villages
Description: An intense bright ruby colour; shows fragrant aromas of dark fruit and spice with earthy/minerally notes; extra dry, soft yet structured palate, delightfully fresh and bright with chewy tannins, shows forward flavours of dark fruit, nutmeg and herbs.

title: Konzelmann Canada Red VQA
Description: Clear ruby red colour; fragrant herbs and red pear, spice and toast aromas; dry, medium body; forward berry fruit with spice, soft balanced acidity and fine moderate tannins.

title: Sibling Rivalry Red VQA
Description: Clear ruby red colour; lifted smoky and prune aromas with a touch of herbs and oak spice; dry, ripe plummy flavour, medium finish and soft tannins.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Fuzion Organic Malbec Cabernet
Description: Clear garnet colour; floral, plum, berries - cassis, cherry - as well as rye bread and smoky aromas; dry, medium body; ripe plum and blackberry flavours with soft tannin and a touch of smoke to finish.

title: L'Epayrie Special Reserve Rouge
Description: Pale ruby colour; licorice, smoky, coffee and dark fruit aromas; light spice and dark fruit flavours; clean finish.

title: Meiomi Pinot Noir
Description: Bring the drama of the California coast to your next dinner party host without paying a dramatic price. Meomi blends grapes from three top areas for producing world-class, velvety smooth Pinot Noirs.

title: Tawse Sketches Cabernet/Merlot 2018
Description: Inspired by the classic red blends of Bordeaux, this wine combines the towering power and angular structure of Cabernet with the smooth, seductive charm of Merlot to paint a vivid portrait of the Niagara Peninsula. Expect nervy currant, plum and blackberry fruit, with touches of smoky espresso from barrel maturation in French oak, and pair with roast beef dinner.

title: Tawse Growers Blend Pinot Noir
Description: Polished and refined with upfront cherry and strawberry notes. Successfully delivers both a pretty and a substantial feel. Pair with cedar-planked salmon or a charcuterie platter.

title: Escondido Tempranillo 2017
Description: Some modern, meaty oak and spice, laid across ripe dark cherries and plums here. The palate has a very smooth and slick feel with a succulent, juicy and attractively fresh, dark-plum finish. Handy depth. Drink or hold. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, July 26, 2019)

title: Fuzion Alta Reserve Malbec
Description: Bold, balanced and brawny, this spicy Argentinian favourite packs in upfront black plum, toast, vanilla and chocolate flavours. It's also a terrific value.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Noir VQA
Description: Pale ruby red colour; soft floral and cherry notes with a touch of clove spice and dark chocolate on the nose; medium-bodied with soft fruit flavours and lively acidity.

title: Campo Viejo Rioja Reserva
Description: Deep garnet colour; ripe dark fruit, smoky and touch of spice on the nose; ripe fruit flavours with a touch of oak, lush finish

title: Bulls Blood Merlot-Keikfrankos
Description: Clear ruby red colour; herbs, plum, citrus and earthy aromas; medium sour plum flavour.

title: Open Merlot VQA
Description: Clear ruby red; floral and berry aromas with a touch of candied fruit; dry, medium body; lots of ripe fruit flavour, well balanced.

title: Pasqua Passimento Rosso IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour; intense aromas of smoke, licorice, coffee and hints of vanilla and spices. Flavours of smoke, diried fruit and spices, with soft tannins to finish.

title: Wakefield Jaraman Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: Retaining a healthy deep-red lustre. Classic aromas of cedar and cassis, a tease of eucalypt, clove and licorice. It's a gnarly and sinewed expression - charry oak, dried herbs, a measured berry burst that affords it fleshy charm. Serious. Drink date: 2020-2028. Score - 92. (Nick Butler, therealreview.com, Feb. 11, 2020)

title: Small Gully The Formula Robert's Shiraz
Description: Formula for success: (three passionate partners + 40-year-old vines + estate vineyards) x a single-minded focus on quality = a powerful and savoury Shiraz with rich dark fruit, chocolate, woodsmoke and big, ripe tannins. Perfect for roasted or grilled meats.

title: Cusumano Nero D'Avola Terre Siciliane IGT
Description: deep ruby colour; dark fruit with coffee and spice aromas; dry, medium body; cherry and plum flavours with balanced acidity; ripe tannins in soft medium length finish

title: Spinelli Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium ruby colour; moderate aromas and flavours of licorice, dark fruit, spice, floral note and black plum; extra dry and light to medium bodied with a medium finish.

title: Montecillo Rioja DOCa Crianza
Description: Clear ruby red colour; floral, cedar, vanilla and berry aromas with a hint of smoke; rich vanilla-berry flavour, well balanced with a smooth finish.

title: Konzelmann Shiraz VQA
Description: Medium ruby colour; aromas of strawberry jam, smoke with floral and candy notes; extra dry with medium body and soft tannins supporting jammy berry fruit with touch of smoke that persist on a long finish.

title: Lindemans Bin 50 Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; floral, coffee, dark fruit and candy on the nose with toasted oak notes; dry, medium-bodied, with a coffee and sweet dark fruit center and good length.

title: Pelee Island Lighthouse Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Deep ruby colour; dark fruit, blood orange, chocolate, berry and cedar aromas; extra dry, medium body; ripe fruit flavour with balanced acidity.

title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi Tenuta di Castiglioni
Description: Frescobaldi has been crafting wines for over 700 years. This silky, modern-styled blend of Cab, Merlot and Sangiovese is filled with red fruit, sweet spice and vanilla notes. A perfect choice for lamb.

title: Passion Of Portugal Red
Description: Deep ruby colour; floral, licorice and fig aromas with chocolate and smoky notes; dry, medium body; round black fruit flavours with a touch of spice and a soft finish.

title: Vicente Faria Gloria Reserva 2018
Description: This perfumed wine is ripe and structured, with hints of wood aging. Its tannins and mint flavors give the wine a sophisticated touch that goes well with the rich fruits and indicate its aging potential. Drink this wine from 2021.  Score - 89. (Roger Voss, Wine Enthusiast, July 1, 2019)

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Pinot Noir Marlborough
Description: Clear ruby red colour; raspberry, beetroot and red fruit aroma with an herbal and earthy touches; extra dry, medium-plus body; soft berry  with a touch of spice in flavour, medium finish.

title: The Foreign Affair The Conspiracy
Description: Following the ripasso method perfected in Italy's Veneto region, this unique wine uses dried grapes to add richness and depth to the notes of fresh and dried berries, spice and leather. An impressive wine that's perfect for grilled red meats.

title: Donini Merlot
Description: Ruby red colour; pastry dough, berry and plum fruit nose with hints of toast and licorice; dry, with light berry and plummy fruit flavours with soft acidity, medium body and a clean finish.

title: Chateau Saint-Germain Bordeaux Superieur AOC
Description: Clear medium ruby colour; cassis and candied notes with light cedary oak spice aromas; medium body,  extra dry wine, cassis fruit and oak spice flavours to finish.

title: Masi Campofiorin IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour; lifted, savory aromas of figs and spices; the palate is dry, medium-bodied with dominating flavours of dried fruit - figs, cherries, with a nice backbone of spice; medium tannins are supple and the finish is medium.

title: Cave de Roquebrun La Grange des Combes Saint-Chinian-Roquebrun 2018
Description: Crafted by Alain Rogier, who was International Wine Challenge's 2015 Winemaker of the Year, this perennially impressive Syrah-based blend brings big, bombastic berry fruit and spice. Always a good choice for coq au vin or herbed duck breast.[Concours des Vins Macon did not include a tasting note.] Score - Gold. (Concours des Vins Macon, 2019)

title: Montes Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Dark ruby red colour; aromas of chocolate, prune, smoke with nuts and jam notes; dry, medium to full bodied, well balanced acidity and ripe tannins, with rich chocolate, prune, smokey oak flavours, notes of nuts and jammy fruit on the long finish.

title: Donini Merlot
Description: Ruby red colour; pastry dough, berry and plum fruit nose with hints of toast and licorice; dry, with light berry and plummy fruit flavours with soft acidity, medium body and a clean finish.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet Malbec Organic
Description: Deep ruby purple; floral, blackberry and chocolate aromas with a touch of honey and spice; medium body with rich fruit flavour and good length; light to medium tannins, good now but could age for 2 to 3 years.

title: Trivento Malbec Reserve
Description: Big and bold with aromas of blackfruit plus a hint of pepper and spice. Well balanced with ripe blackfruit flavours and soft tannins on the finish.

title: Louis Jadot Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Description: Great value in red Burgundy here. Lovely aromas and flavours of red berry, cedar smoke and a touch of spiced plum in this expressive and elegant Pinot. Enjoy with grilled beets, mushroom burgers or roast beef sandwiches.

title: Misterio Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby red colour with an intense nose of plum, coffee, rye bread, cedar and wild honey; extra dry, medium bodied; ripe fruit flavour with silky tannins in a long finish.

title: Monte del Frà Lena di Mezzo Valpolicella Ripasso Classico Superiore 2018
Description: A ripasso in the leaner, fresher style, with lovely succulent acids, though wood flavour still plays a dominant role in the overall profile, suppressing cherry fruit. I like the old school, antique shop flavours, the burnished teak and black tea, and the lingering finish. A fine mix between wide appeal and insider's delight.  Score - 89. (John Szabo, MS, winealign.com, Dec. 5, 2018)

title: Pelee Island Rouge
Description: A wine crafted for casual get-togethers. Ruby red in colour with aromas and flavours of red plum, smoke, berry compote and touch of spice and citrus. Medium-bodied and dry with a silky finish. Enjoy with roast beef, roasted potatoes and a side salad or a selection of cheeses.

title: C'est La Vie! Pinot Noir Syrah
Description: Clear ruby with purple tint; fragrant nose of baker's yeast,  red plum, spices and red berries; extra dry, medium body; ripe plum and berry flavours with a touch of spice; balanced acidity.

title: Dandelion Vineyards Lionheart of the Barossa Shiraz
Description: This is sourced from old vines, many over 100 years of age, planted in some of the oldest soils on earth. Full-bodied, concentrated and rich with sophisticated, refined blackberry, earth, spice and meat tones. A big, bold wine for big, bold meat dishes.

title: Marchesi di Barolo La Tradizione Barolo
Description: The100% Nebbiolo Tradizione is sourced from select vineyards in Barolo, Monforte, Castiglione Falletto and La Morra. Intense red berries with spice and a lifted floral rose complexity. It can be enjoyed tonight with braised beef dishes or firm cheeses.

title: M. Chapoutier Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon-Villages
Description: From the legendary Michel Chapoutier, this is a consistently highly rated wine that reliably delivers big flavour in an intense yet elegant package. Look for bold red and dark fruit, with earth and spice notes. Great for burgers, ribs or lamb.

title: Carmen Reserva 1850 Premier Carménère
Description: Ruby colour; coffee, prune, nuts, toast and honey aromas; medium bodied, extra dry wine; lively coffee and dried dark fruit flavours with toast and honey notes and good finish.

title: Zonin Ripasso Valpolicella Superiore DOC
Description: Ruby red colour; rich xmas cake aromas of red fruit, berries and spice; dry, medium body; a nice medium flavour intensity of ripe fruit, smooth, with spice finish.

title: Rivera Il Falcone Riserva Castel del Monte
Description: Crafted to offer an aromatic, fresh experience, with expressive red fruit and spice alongside herbs, mineral and earth undertones in a firm, balanced frame. A wine for braised or grilled fare.

title: Muga Reserva
Description: From Spain's famed Rioja region, this ready-to-drink, Tempranillo-based blend features oodles of rich blackberry, cherry, woodsmoke, cedar and vanilla. Serve it alongside rotisserie chicken and roast potatoes or duck confit.

title: Sandbanks Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Bright ruby colour; floral, plum and dried red pear with hints of chocolate and smoke; dry, light to medium body; plum and oak spice with fine tannins.

title: 13th Street Gamay
Description: A superb example of Ontario's proficiency with Gamay. This is always complex, with ripe cherry and plum fruit alongside touches of smoke, meat, pepper spice, herbs and underbrush. A substantial Gamay that will be great with a roast beef dinner.

title: Tini Sangiovese Romagna DOC
Description: Clear ruby red colour; coffee, toast, licorice, floral and prune aromas; extra dry, light to medium body; coffee, spice and prune flavours with balanced acidity.

title: Hob Nob Pinot Noir Pays D'OC
Description: Bright ruby colour with pink rim; smoky, cherry and beetroot aromas with black olive note and floral lift; dry, medium body; juicy ripe berry flavour with medium finish.

title: B & G Partager Rouge
Description: Garnet red colour; ripe dark berry and fruit aromas with toast and spice notes; soft fruit flavour, light tannin & light toasty medium length finish.

title: First Press Napa Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This great value from Napa always offers great concentration and generous aromas and flavours of ripe fruit, chocolate and vanilla oak tones with underlying spice and herbs. Rich and intense, it delivers easy pleasure. Enjoy with pulled pork.

title: Inniskillin Merlot VQA
Description: Deep ruby colour; upfront plum, candied fruit, licorice and smoke aromas; extra dry, light to medium body; rich plum, candy and spice flavours, well balanced with moderate tannins that could help it age up to 3 years.

title: Gato Negro Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red with garnet edge; floral, spice, berry cocktail, licorice and mushroom aromas; dry, medium body, soft fruit and soft medium tannin; an easy to enjoy dry wine with fruity, moderate  finish.

title: PKNT Carmenère Reserve
Description: Clear ruby red; floral, black olive, chocolate and spice notes; medium-plus body; black olive with hints of chocolate and spice flavours; medium ripe tannins in medium length finish.

title: PKNT Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve
Description: Spicy notes of blackcurrant with a floral lift, toasted oak and black cardamom sustain this fruity gem from the Rapel Valley in Chile. Its intriguing name is pronounced 'picante.'

title: Farina Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore DOC
Description: Clear ruby red with purple highlights; chocolate, nutmeg and toast aromas with floral and fig notes; dry, medium to full body; forward fruit flavours, balanced acidity and soft tannins for a smooth finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. Extra dry and medium bodied, offering aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate, cedar, smoky oak and cassis. Serve with flank steak and grilled vegetables.

title: Konzelmann Pinot Noir VQA
Description: Ruby red colour; floral aromas of black cherry, then smoke, beetroot and nutmeg; extra dry, med-bodied with good acidity, cherry, smoky oak flavours with light earthy/mineral and spice notes; quite smooth with soft tannins & a fruity finish.

title: Lealtanza Reserva 2015
Description: I have always enjoyed the ambiance of Lealtanza. This has a lovely, smooth texture and a lively fruit ambiance. The nose shows lifted redcurrant/sour cherry fruit, with roasted herbs (rosemary), pepper, cedary spice. There is also a meaty/chorizo note. It is medium bodied, almost svelte, plush and well balanced with fine tannin. The length is excellent.  Score - 91. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, Nov. 28, 2020)

title: Zenato Veneto Rosso IGT
Description: Made from a blend of partially dried cabernet sauvignon, merlot and corvina grapes. This wine pours a deep ruby with purple highlights. On the nose, complex aromas of nuts, smoke, coffee, floral note and licorice. The palate is medium bodied, with soft tannins and flavours of nuts, coffee and spice.

title: Columbia Crest H3 Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Columbia Crest has risen from strength to strength since emerging in 1983, and Vintages customers have fallen in love with this focused and appealing Cab. Smooth, generous and fruity with chocolate and coffee notes. Try with coffee-and-porter-braised brisket.

title: McManis Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: With an attractive nose of ripe black fruit, cassis, vanilla and woodsmoke, this generous and easygoing crowd-pleaser is ideal for gatherings of all kinds. It will shine equally well with finger foods or with grilled steaks, gourmet burgers or grilled ribs.

title: Georges Duboeuf Beaujolais AOC
Description: Dark ruby colour; young berry fruit & cherry aromas; soft fruit flavour; easy drinking style.

title: Georges Duboeuf Beaujolais Brouilly
Description: Clear ruby red colour; floral, prune, nutty and jammy aromas; extra dry, medium-plus body; lively fruit flavours with balanced medium acidity and medium length finish.

title: L'Epayrie Special Reserve Rouge
Description: Pale ruby colour; licorice, smoky, coffee and dark fruit aromas; light spice and dark fruit flavours; clean finish.

title: Eastdell Gamay Noir VQA
Description: This inviting red offers bright aromas of fresh and preserved red berries, smoke, spice and red fruit. On the palate it is extra dry with light to medium weight and layers of red fruit, smoke and savoury spice culminating in a refreshing and flavourful finish.

title: Pelee Island Ruggles Run Gamay Zweigelt VQA
Description: Medium ruby colour with a pale pink rim; aromas of blackberry, herbs and spices with smoke and floral notes; dry, medium bodied with moderate acidity and tannins with flavours of blackberries, green herbs, spices and smoke.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet Cabernet Sauvignon Organic
Description: Deep ruby colour; aromatic notes of coffee, prune, flowers, honey and fresh rye bread; on the palate it is medium-bodied and extra dry, with flavours of coffee and prune spread that carry through to the long finish.

title: Red House Wine Co. Cabernet Shiraz VQA
Description: Vibrant medium purple; lifted, smoky and prune aromas with a touch of cedar and coffee beans; dry and medium bodied, with full fruit flavour and smooth tannins on a long finish.

title: Ascheri Langhe DOC
Description: Youthful ruby with purple highlights; rye bread, dark fruit, spice and tobacco aromas; extra dry, medium bodied; rye bread and spicy dark fruit flavours with balanced acidity and moderate tannins in a medium length finish.

title: Cavaliere D'Oro Gabbiano Chianti Classico DOCG
Description: Medium ruby colour; aromas and flavours of chocolate, dark fruit and gentle baking spice, with prune and honey notes; dry, medium-bodied, structured tannins and refreshing acidity.

title: Catedral Reserva Dao
Description: Ruby red colour; upfront smoke, licorice, prune and spice aromas; medium body, dry wine; round fruit flavours, well balanced; medium/long finish with soft medium tannin on the finish.

title: Umberto Cesari Liano Sangiovese/Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: For over 50 years, Umberto Cesari has been the standard bearer for quality wines from Emilia-Romagna. This blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet is dark, spicy and herbal. Go all in and serve it with a regional specialty like ragù alla Bolognese.

title: Hahn Pinot Noir Monterey
Description: The Hahn vineyards are located south of San Francisco, just inland from Monterey Bay. Cool ocean breezes ensure development of vibrant fruit flavours. Aromas of black plum, smoke, nuts and a floral note lead to a palate with soft tannins, plum flavours and balanced acidity. Serve with cedar-planked salmon.

title: Rodney Strong Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Founded in 1959, Rodney Strong Vineyards has been under the stewardship of the Klein family since 1989. Vintage after vintage, this customer favourite offers up dark berry tones accented by cedar, oak spice, vanilla and smoke. This is a refined and textured wine that will work well with grilled lamb, steak or roast meats.

title: Cave Spring Gamay VQA
Description: Light ruby red colour; lots of fresh red and black plum aromas with notes of citrus, berries and nuts on the nose; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, with round, ripe plum and berry fruit flavour and fresh finish.

title: A to Z Wineworks Pinot Noir
Description: Founded in 2002, A to Z Wineworks has twice seen their wines named to Wine Spectator's Top 100 wines of the year. Always impressive, earthy and characterful, this is a Pinot that brings the savoury and the smoky to its red berry fruit. A wine for duck.

title: Graffigna Malbec
Description: Deep ruby colour; lifted, spicy and yeasty, blood orange, berries compote and herbs on the nose; dry; medium-full body; dark fruit and spice flavours with smooth tannins to finish.

title: Fontella Chianti DOCG
Description: Attention to detail and constant innovation is Casa Girelli's key to consistent high quality. Medium ruby colour, with aromas of chestnut, red currant and spice, floral and citrus notes. The palate is extra dry, with a solid structure of tannin and acidity. Expect flavours of tart cherry, with earthy and vegetal notes.

title: Beso De Vino Seleccion, Carinena DO
Description: Deep purple colour; upfront moderate aromas of prune spread, smoke and spice; dry and medium bodied with flavours of dark berry preserve, smoke and spice; medium finish, short term ageing potential.

title: Louis M. Martini Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: One of the greatest value Cabs Napa has to offer. Layered, complex and stunning with rich black fruits and cedar in a sumptuous and elegant package. Balanced and structured, this is a classy Napa Cabernet. Enjoy with filet mignon and blueberry compote.

title: Gérard Bertrand Cabernet Sauvignon Pays d'Oc
Description: Complex and concentrated with flavours of cedar, toast, black pum and licorice; cedar, plum and spice fruit, medium bodied & long finish.

title: Trapiche Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby red colour; cedar, black plum, floral and berries aromas; extra dry, medium body and light to medium intensity fruit flavour, with supportive tannins on the finish.

title: Frisky Zebras Seductive Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby, chocolate, floral and black plum aromas; dry, medium body; chocolate, black plum, mushrooms and spice flavours; ripe medium tannins.

title: Sogrape Grao Vasco Dao
Description: Portugal's Dao region is home to some of Portugal's most celebrated red wines. Grao Vasco blends touriga nacional and tinta roriz grapes, and with meticulous winemaking crafts a flavourful and complex wine with youthful red and black plum fruit, rye bread and chocolate flavours. Serve with grilled meats, game and poultry.
By:: Vinicola Do Vale Do Dao Lda

title: Montresor Amarone Della Valpolicella DOC
Description: Dark ruby-red colour; licorice, red fruit, dried figs and raisins and spicy aromas and flavours; dry, medium bodied, with balanced acidity, ripe tannins and good length.

title: Beronia Tempranillo Rioja
Description: Dark ruby colour; sweet and savoury notes of dark berry fruit, cedar and spice; dry, with medium body, supple tannins and dark fruit flavours.

title: Santa Carolina Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot
Description: Garnet red colour; aromas of cassis and black raspberries; medium-full bodied with ripe fruit flavour and light cedar spice on the finish.

title: Les Jamelles Merlot Pays d'Oc
Description: A deep ruby colour with forward dark fruit aromas that include black berries, currants and cherries; medium body, easy drinking

title: Cabriz Colheita Selecionada 2017
Description: This friendly-priced blend of 40% Alfrocheiro Preto, 40% Tinta Roriz (Tempranillo) and 20% Touriga Nacional was aged in equal parts French oak and stainless steel for six months. Look for bright, brambly berry fruit and a bit of chewy tannin, and savour with slow-cooked brisket.

title: San Pedro 1865 Selected Vineyards Carmenère 2018
Description: A great vintage has delivered a very intense, fresh and defined style with aromas of brambly blackberries and dark plums and such attractively fleshy style on the palate. Very juicy, smooth and fresh. So plush and silky. Long, fresh tannins here. Drink or hold. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, April 17, 2020)

title: Brights Maria Christina Red
Description: Pale garnet; smoky nose; off dry palate with berry flavour and a soft finish

title: La Ferme du Mont Première Côte Côtes du Rhône 2019
Description: A blend of 60% Grenache, 30% Syrah and 10% Mourvèdre, this wine was matured in traditional concrete vats for eight months. Expect a fruit-forward glassful of black cherries and mulberries and pour alongside chicken thighs with mushrooms and bacon.

title: Lindemans Cawarra Shiraz Cabernet
Description: Deep purple/ruby colour; rich floral chocolate and prune fruit with vanilla and poached pear on the nose and palate; dry, medium bodied with a spicy finish.

title: Luccarelli Primitivo Puglia IGT
Description: Deep ruby colour; fruit forward bouquet of dark fruit - black plum/prune, spice, lifted chocolate and chestnut notes; medium-to-full bodied and dry with flavours that follow the nose, plus dark berry cocktail, and medium tannins that add balance.

title: Torrevento Matervitae Negroamaro Puglia IGT
Description: Deep ruby colour; smoky, spicy, chestnut, floral and coffee aromas; dry, medium body, smooth and easy drinking.

title: Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The late Robert Mondavi is considered the godfather of the California wine movement. This classic Cab - with cassis, blackberry and cedar notes - has been made since the winery's founding in 1966. Enjoy it with hearty dishes: meaty lasagna or filet mignon.

title: Era Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC Organic
Description: Medium ruby colour; floral, prune, nuts, toast and raisins aromas; medium-bodied with plum/prune fruit, nuts and raisins flavours.

title: Veedha Douro Red
Description: Deep purple core; aromas and flavours include smoke, chocolate, prune, cinnamon and some floral character; medium body, dry, medium tannins on to spicy finish.

title: Cono Sur Tocornal Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot
Description: Deep purple ruby colour; dry, soft red fruit character with a hint of cedar; extra dry and medium bodied with balanced acidity and ripe, supportive tannins.

title: Caliterra Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red colour; lifted chocolate, herbs, smoke and prune aromas; medium to full-bodied with chocolate, smoke and prune flavours; well-balanced with a medium finish.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Woodbridge wines deliver a pure expression of fruit, and are part of Mondavi's goal to put great wines on every table. Plum, wild berry and coffee aromas and flavours, with balanced acidity and supple tannins. Nutty, toasty notes reflect well-judged oak ageing.  A superb choice for grilled meats or roasted vegetables.

title: G. Marquis The Silver Line Pinot Noir
Description: The G. Marquis vineyard in Niagara-on-the-Lake is home to carefully tended Pinot vines that were planted in 1994. This wine offers complex notes of red cherry, raspberry, mineral and smoke. Elegant and structured, it's a good match for mushroom risotto.

title: E. Guigal Côtes du Rhône
Description: A fine intro to the wines of France's revered Rhône region. A classic blend of Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre grapes, with flavours of plum, black raspberry and woodsmoke. A robust red to serve with beef stew, gourmet burgers or grilled tamari steaks.

title: Megalomaniac Homegrown Red VQA
Description: Bright medium ruby; upfront aromas of cassis with smoky, chocolatey and herbaceous notes; extra dry and medium-plus bodied, with balanced medium acidity and tannins; juicy cassis and dark chocolate flavours lead to a finish that is long and smooth.

title: Coffin Ridge Back From the Dead Red
Description: Coffin Ridge is a pioneering winery in the exciting frontier of Grey County. This wine is a blend based on Baco Noir, Maréchal Foch (both grown pretty much only here Ontario) with Pinot Noir and Mertot. Brambly, with savoury spices, earth and herbs and tangy red and black fruit. This will be great with meaty stews, or a grilled burger with mushrooms.

title: Cupcake Red Velvet
Description: Deep ruby colour with aromas of cloves and prune with lifted smoky, nutty tones; picks up some chocolate and more spice on the palate.

title: Inniskillin Pinot Noir VQA
Description: Ruby red colour; lifted aromas of smoky oak, black plum reduction, nuts, earthy with a touch of spice; extra dry, medium bodied; shows good varietal character.

title: Peninsula Ridge Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: The wine is bright ruby, with a purple rim; on the nose, lifted herbal/tomato leaf, cedar, dark berry and citrus aromas; extra dry, with medium body, balanced acidity and soft tannins; the finish is long and smooth.

title: Fabre Montmayou Reserva Malbec 2018
Description: One of the fundamental references when talking about wines with very good value for money ... this is from a selection of vineyards in Vistalba and Las Compuertas, both in the traditional Luján de Cuyo zone. Here we have the zone's ripe and friendly fruit, the nutty tones and sweet spices nuanced by redder and more refreshing fruits and particularly juicy acidity and a very smooth, easy-to-drink texture. Score - 92. (Patricio Tapia, guiadescorchados.cl, 2020)

title: La Vieille Ferme Cotes Du Ventoux AOC
Description: Medium violet/ruby colour; upfront aromas of dark fruit and licorice; dry with perfumed black plum character and a touch of caramel; medium finish with supportive tannins.

title: Sprucewood Shores Lady in Red VQA
Description: This elegant red from the shores of Lake Erie greets you with aromas of smoke, coffee, prune, spice and cedar; dancing on the light to medium-bodied palate with flavours of roasted coffee beans, prune and spice. Dry with moderate acidity to balance dark fruit intensity; it finishes with soft and supple tannins.

title: Tommasi Il Sestante Valpolicella Ripasso DOC
Description: Deep ruby red colour. The nose draws you in, with its complex lifted aromas of toast, nut butter, licorice, black plum and hints of chocolate and earth. On the palate this wine is medium-minus bodied with good structure. It follows with flavours of toast, nuts, spice and ripe plums notes with coffee and earthy/herbal notes.

title: Raymond Family Classic Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby colour; floral, dark berries  - cassis, blackberry, herbal and soft vanilla aromas; medium body; cassis, vanilla and spice flavours with ripe supportive tannins.

title: Illuminati Riparosso Mont D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Deep ruby; licorice, nuts and dried fig aromas with toast and floral notes; balanced fruit and oak flavours; medium bodied.

title: Jackson-Triggs Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Light to medium ruby garnet colour; dry and medium bodied with lively crisp cassis berry character and very light tannins.

title: Dry Creek The Mariner Meritage 2016
Description: This has rich aromas of blackberries and ripe cherries, as well as cedary oak. The palate has good poise and crisply detailed tannins, carrying plenty of ripe dark-berry flavor. A blend of 65% cabernet sauvignon, 16% merlot, 10% petit verdot, 7% malbec and 2% cabernet franc. Drink or hold. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, Dec. 12, 2019)

title: Smoking Loon Old Vine Zinfandel
Description: Ruby red colour; black plum, smoky oak and vanilla aromas; medium bodied and dry, with plum, vanilla and fig flavours mingling with smoky notes leading to a soft finish.

title: Storia Antica Superiore Valpolicella Ripasso 2018
Description: A charming, value-priced ripasso that offers ripe, juicy fruit flavours, with touches of chocolate and pepper spice and a supple, refined mouthfeel. Try this with a hearty beef-based winter stew. (Vintages panel, Jan. 2020)

title: Hidden Bench Estate Organic Pinot Noir
Description: Hidden Bench will not release any wine that does not meet their exacting expectations. Their estate Pinot comes from select parcels from their three estate vineyards. Elegant and refined cherry, herb and mineral notes. Try this with bacon-stuffed mushrooms.

title: Aquinas Pinot Noir
Description: Aquinas wines are made from fruit sourced in California's Napa, Sonoma, Lake and Mendocino counties. This wine is a medium ruby colour, with floral, blackberry, toast and vanilla aromas; it's extra dry and round on the palate, with medium tannins and balanced acidity. Enjoy flavours of blackberry, plum, toast and vanilla.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep purple colour; aromas of smoke, floral note, prune, licorice and herbs; dry, medium-bodied, well balanced with ripe tannins and smoky, prune and licorice flavours; medium-long finish.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Concha y Toro sources the grapes for this 100% cabernet sauvignon wine from Chile's Central Valley. Delivering aromas of cassis, floral notes, coffee and toast and similar flavours of cassis with a hint of dark chocolate, this red is a delicious crowd-pleaser. The finish has firm tannins. Pair with beef tenderloin or lamb.

title: Carlo Rossi California Red
Description: Pale ruby colour; mildly fruity nose displaying candied plum, floral and watermelon notes; light to medium body with crisp berry flavours

title: Gato Negro Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red with garnet edge; floral, spice, berry cocktail, licorice and mushroom aromas; dry, medium body, soft fruit and soft medium tannin; an easy to enjoy dry wine with fruity, moderate  finish.

title: Santa Rosa Estate Malbec
Description: Argentina's Mendoza region is its largest and most prolific wine producing area. This malbec is extra dry and medium-bodied, fresh and fruity featuring lifted aromas of oak toast, black plum, smoke and berry compote. Fruity and smoky notes make this an ideal accompaniment for grilled flank steak or mature cheeses.

title: San Felice Chianti Classico 2018
Description: This is bright and vivid, showing blueberries, blackberries with violets and other flowers. Medium to full body, tight tannins, bright acidity and a vivid finish. Real Chianti Classico. Drink now. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, Oct. 27, 2020)

title: Penfolds Koonunga Hill Shiraz/Cabernet
Description: First crafted in 1976, this classic Australian blend of Shiraz and Cabernet has always been a favourite. Supple and concentrated with dark fruit, cassis, herbs, mint and dark chocolate tones, it is a wine with broad appeal. It will be superb with pepper steak or grilled ribs.

title: Masi Bonacosta Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: A description of Valpolicella attributed to Ernest Hemingway calls it 'a light dry red wine, as friendly as the home of a favorite brother.' Friendly notes of coffee, licorice, prune, clove and violet pull you in; flavours of coffee, spice and plum embrace you and end in a silky finish. Serve with risotto, lamb or venison.

title: Concha Y Toro Frontera Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby colour; upfront black plum, smoke, nuts and mushrooms aromas; extra dry, balanced acidity and medium bodied, with good dark plum flavour, through to a pleasant fruity finish.

title: JP Azeitão Red
Description: From the Palmela region of Portugal's Setubal Peninsula, this is a popular and well-made blend of 40 % syrah, and 60% local red varieties. Upfront smoky, dark fruit and spicy flavours are supported by a supple tannic structure. Excellent value and an ideal partner for grilled chicken, pork with clams or cured meats.

title: La Mascota Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Dark ruby colour; dark fruit, chocolate, cedar, cassis and floral aromas with earth and mineral notes; medium to full-bodied with black plum, chocolate and currant notes followed by a dry, cedar finish.

title: Louis M. Martini Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This is a wine that hangs its hat on providing a good-quality Cali Cab at an approachable price point. There's a lot to value here: generous ripe dark fruit, oak spice, herb and mocha notes, with a fresh feel. Pair this with rib-eye steak.

title: The Wolftrap Syrah Mourvèdre Viognier
Description: Medium ruby with a purple hue; the nose offers smoke, prune, spice and rye bread; the palate is dry, well balanced, with flavours that deliver exactly what the nose promise; a long and lingering finish.

title: Les Jamelles Cabernet Sauvignon Pays D'OC
Description: Medium ruby purple colour;  aromas of cherry, cassis, blackberry, vanilla and plum with notes of spice and herb; dry, medium bodied, soft and rounded, with flavours of cassis, ripe cherry, blackberry and vanilla with spicy tones.

title: Brotte La Fiole CdRhone AOC
Description: Clear medium ruby colour; upfront aromas of red plums, blackberries, raspberries, watermelon and herbs de Provence; extra dry and medium bodied with flavours of plums, berries, herbs and spices; medium finish, ready to drink.

title: Conundrum Red
Description: Caymus (the minds behind this puzzle) won't tip their hat as to what comprises this popular blend. The smoke, sweet dark fruit, chocolate and spice notes are the perfect solution for your dinner conundrum. Enjoy with pulled pork or grilled short ribs.

title: Alamos Malbec
Description: Deep ruby colour; upfront licorice and dark plum aromas with smoky and earthy notes; medium-bodied with spice and plum flavours with a moderate finish.

title: Miras Jovem Merlot 2015
Description: Bright, deep ruby with garnet rim. On the nose, medium-intensity aromas of cooked fruits (plum jam and raspberry jam) and dried fruits (figs, raisins) with hints of toffee and floral notes. Intense and expressive on the palate, it presents soft tannins and good acidity with flavours of ripe red fruits, spices, and a subtle hint of oak. Medium to long, slightly toasty finish.

title: Yalumba The Strapper GSM 2016
Description: This has a lovely, quite complex nose of cran-cherry fruit, eucalyptus, white pepper and fine oak spicing. It is medium-full bodied, quite soft and plush, but avoids heat (13.5%). Tannins are very fine and there is a sweet edge, but it is not sugary or cloying. Very nicely balanced in fact. The length is very good to excellent.  Score - 90. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, Aug. 11, 2020)

title: Latour Pinot Noir
Description: Ruby colour. Nuts, caramel, mushrooms and berry fruit with an underlying mineral note; extra dry, medium-bodied with caramel and berry fruit, and earth flavours.

title: Masi Costasera Amarone Classico DOC
Description: Deep purple ruby colour; rich, ripe, dark fruit aromas and flavours with hints of licorice, toast and chocolate; full-bodied and smooth with a firm, long finish.

title: Wente Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium ruby purple colour; extra dry and medium to full-bodied with upfront ripe berry fruit and hints of vanilla; medium tannins; long finish.

title: Rosemount Diamond Shiraz
Description: Deep purple red; dark rye bread, blood orange and dark berry fruit character with hint of chocolate; mid-framed and bold with a spicy finish.

title: Wyndham Estate Bin 555 Shiraz
Description: Deep purple colour; spicy fruit bouquet of coffee, prune, smoke, licorice and a floral note; smoky black fruit flavours with a long, full finish.

title: Cottage Block Merlot VQA
Description: Pale garnet coloured; lifted aromas of red plum, cedar, herbs and spices; extra dry, medium-bodied, medium tannin and acidity; flavours of plum, cedar, herbs and spice; medium finish.

title: Ruffino Aziano Chianti Classico DOCG
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; spice, cured meats, floral, rye bread and red fruit nose; extra dry, medium bodied, bright spice, salumi and red fruit flavours with soft tannins in a medium long finish.

title: Rosehall Run Pinot Noir VQA Defiant
Description: Medium ruby red colour; aromas of dark berries, toast, earth and spice, nuts and coffee; extra dry, medium bodied, easy drinking, flavours of dark berries and fruit and toast, with spice and nuts notes.

title: Ménage à Trois Red
Description: Celebrating the art of the blend! This wine features the beguiling trio of zinfandel, merlot and cabernet sauvignon, with upfront flavours of ripe fig, smoke and dark chocolate supported by plush tannins. Medium to full-bodied, flavourful, it's superb with grilled meat dishes, burgers or a gourmet grilled cheese sandwich.

title: Pepperwood Grove Old Vine Zinfandel
Description: Ruby colour; aromas of smoky oak, floral and prune fruit with hints of juniper and chocolate; lovely replay of smoky black plum fruit on the palate; medium-bodied and fruity with a vanilla finish.

title: Angels Gate Pinot Noir VQA
Description: Pale ruby with a touch of garnet; aromas of red berries, vanilla, toast, nuts and dried flowers; medium bodied with flavours of red cherry and raspberry, vanilla and toast, and soft tannins.

title: CREW Merlot 2017
Description: This latest CREW Merlot from Ontario's southerly Colchester Ridge brings a juicy core of strawberry and cherry fruit along with the complexity of graphite and oaky notes. It'll go beautifully with margherita pizza. (Vintages panel, Sept. 2019)

title: Wits End Luna Shiraz
Description: This Shiraz includes a dash of Barbera and always earns high scores. It's sourced from premium vineyards, with a portion of the grapes fermented in French oak and a portion in stainless steel. The result is a wine with a velvety character, generous red and black fruit, and notes of herbs and chocolate that keep customers coming back for more, vintage after vintage. A wine for roast beef or a rich stew.

title: Wolf Blass Red Label Shiraz Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby purple colour; extra dry and medium-bodied with medium tannins; lifted aromas and flavours of coffee with cream, black plum reduction, honey and herbs; long finish.

title: Sterling Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This rich, seductive Napa Cab always impresses with cassis, spicy plum and hints of chocolate. Bold and flavourful with the structure to cellar - but why wait? Pair with roasted chicken, Kobe beef sliders or standing rib roast.

title: CREW Cabernet Franc 2018
Description: Cabernet Franc is considered to be a bit of an Ontario specialty, and recent vintages in particular have seen Mother Nature and winemaking skill fit together hand-in-glove to create some of the finest examples ever. This one from 2018 is filled with generous plum, cassis and dark fruit, with a superb structural underpinning. Pair this gem with barbecued ribs, roasted turkey, and roasted veggies. (Vintages panel, Sept. 2019)

title: Masi Costasera Amarone Classico DOC
Description: Deep purple ruby colour; rich, ripe, dark fruit aromas and flavours with hints of licorice, toast and chocolate; full-bodied and smooth with a firm, long finish.

title: Adobe Reserva Merlot Organic
Description: Ruby coloured; moderate aromas of cassis, chocolate and smoke with floral and toasty notes; extra dry and medium bodied; flavours of rich cassis and a spicy, savory finish.

title: Montes Alpha Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: What do you get when you combine one of Chile's most renowned producers with the world's most famous grape? Near perfection, that's what. Concentrated, complex and generously fruity and fresh. Enjoy this with grilled meats and people you wish to impress.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Red
Description: Medium ruby colour; gentle berry, toast and cedar aromas followed by vanilla and plum notes; medium-bodied with berry/cherry flavours.

title: Banfi Centine Rosso Toscana IGT
Description: Clear, medium ruby colour; aromas of nuts, floral note, red fruit and clove; dry and light to medium bodied with flavours of nuts, red berries and fruit with spice on medium finish, drink now.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Merlot
Description: Medium deep ruby red colour; smoky, spicy, rich yet elegant with plum, dark fruit and mushrooms on the nose; extra dry, medium-bodied with smoke, spice, black plum and more dark fruit flavours with hints of underbrush; moderate acidity but well balanced; ripe tannin on finish.

title: Cathedral Cellar Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Offering super value, this Cabernet comes from South Africa's cool Cape. It displays blackcurrant, dark cherry, spice and savoury herbs, all supported by bright acidity. Pair with gourmet burgers or steak-and-kidney pie.

title: Jackson-Triggs Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Light to medium ruby garnet colour; dry and medium bodied with lively crisp cassis berry character and very light tannins.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A crowd-pleasing cabernet sauvignon made with both international and Canadian grapes. Medium ruby, with aromas and flavours of black plum, berry compote, chocolate, toasted oak and spice. It is is extra dry, medium bodied and smooth with juicy plum-berry and spice on the finish. Serve with homemade burgers or cheddar.

title: Errazuriz Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Dark ruby red colour; smoky, chocolate, cassis, cedar and floral nose; extra dry, medium to full-bodied, well structured, with complex chocolate, cassis and cedar flavours, balanced acidity, soft tannins and a long finish.

title: Yvon Mau Merlot Pays d'Aude
Description: Medium ruby colour; upfront dark fruits and berries, spice and chocolate aromas; dry, light to medium bodied, with juicy dark fruit flavours; fresh, clean, fruit driven style.

title: Hardys Stamp Series Shiraz Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Black cherry colour with floral, plumy and vanilla aromas and notes of toasted oak and herbs; medium body, plum and vanilla flavours with a hint of toast in the finish.

title: Tommasi Graticcio Appassionato 2018
Description: A medium-bodied, vibrant Corvina, Rondinella and Merlot red wine blend made in a similar method as Amarone wines. Concentrated with spicy dried fruit, dark cherry, ripe plum, savoury herb and nutty flavours rich on the palate. 'Graticcio' is the term for the traditional bamboo racks used for air-drying grapes after the harvest; a technique that concentrates the flavours in the grapes. Drink: 2020-2028. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, Nov. 3, 2020)

title: Two Oceans Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot
Description: Deep ruby colour; floral, cassis and herbal aromas with notes of mushrooms and spice; dry, medium bodied, with soft medium tannin, smooth, bright cassis flavours; approachable, easy drinking style.

title: Domaine Boyar Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby purple in colour; smoke, black plum, cedar, vanilla and cassis on the nose; extra dry, medium body, with smoke and ripe plum, cedar and vanilla flavours, balanced medium acidity and tannins on the medium long finish.

title: Cono Sur Bicicleta Pinot Noir
Description: Ruby red colour; upfront red and dark berry, ginger, and red fruit notes with a pleasing hint of candy in both aroma and flavour; extra dry, medium-body, quite lively on the palate, with medium tannin and a rounded fruity finish.

title: Megalomaniac Pompous Red VQA
Description: Medium ruby/garnet in colour; on the nose there are perfumed notes of cassis, vanilla, candy and watermelon; the palate is dry and juicy featuring flavours cassis, vanilla and melon; medium body.

title: Campo Viejo Rioja Tempranillo
Description: Medium ruby in colour with a hint of garnet; the lifted aromas entice you with notes of fresh rye bread, dark fruit, mushrooms and exotic spices; on the palate it is extra dry, medium-bodied and ripe with flavours of dark fruit and berries, vanilla and sweet spices.

title: Sandbanks Dunes Red VQA
Description: Sandbanks has been one of the leading wineries in Prince Edward County since 2003. Their Dunes Red is a skillful blend of the foch, gamay and cabernet grape varieties, and it's brimming with aromas and flavours of smoky dark fruit, herbs and spices. Serve with your favourite barbeque dishes.

title: Yellow Tail Big Bold Red
Description: Deep ruby; bright lifted aromas of smoke, prune, honey and cinnamon; jammy, medium bodied with some sweetness and flavours that include prune, smoke and spiced honey cake.

title: Rio Madre Graciano 2019
Description: This wine is 100% Graciano, which is a grape historically used to add lifted floral tones and structure to Rioja's famed Tempranillo-led blends. Rio Madre first produced this wine in 2010 in response to the quality and character they were seeing from their Graciano vineyard. The 2019 will be an intensely perfumed wine, with dark fruit and peppery spice, and will go beautifully with beef.

title: Urbina Gran Reserva 2004
Description: The Gran Reserva bottling comes from slightly better vineyards, according to Ángel Urbina, and has a little more power than some of the bodega's wines. Everything is relative, however, as this is a still an elegant, graceful, savoury wine with haunting balsamic sweetness. Drink date: 2019-2025. Score - 95. (Tim Atkin, MW, timatkin.com, Rioja Special Report 2019)

title: Black Cellar Shiraz Cabernet
Description: The Black Cellars winemaker explored numerous blends deep within the heart of the cellar until perfection was achieved.
