The ultimate blend combines upfront flavours of black currant, floral and jammy notes with a touch of mint chocolate and a smooth mouthfeel that exemplifies the mystique of Black Cellar.

title: Tommasi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Description: Amarone is a great crowd favourite and ideal for holiday dinners. This one comes from the historic Tommasi family, who are masters of this celebrated style. The wine features blackberry, coffee and spice, with polished tannins. Pair with braised meats, pasta or dark chocolate.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Cabernet Shiraz VQA
Description: Medium ruby; moderate aromas of cedar, prune, toast, vanilla and herbs; extra dry and medium body with flavours of cedar, plum, oak toast with vanilla on the finish.

title: Open Smooth Red VQA
Description: Medium ruby; bright aromas of crushed and candied red berry fruit, wood spice and toast; the palate shows some sweetness and a light to medium body, powered by candied red berry and fruit, hints of spice and soft tannins.

title: Carmen Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Clear, deep ruby colour; upfront aromas of smoke, cassis and chocolate; extra dry and medium to full bodied with rich flavours of smoky cassis and plum that lead to a long finish.

title: Flagstone Poetry Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby colour; lifted aromas of black plum, candied fruit, coffee and spice; dry, medium bodied with medium acidity and tannins; flavours of plum, candied berries and a mocha finish.

title: Wakefield Promised Land Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium ruby; floral, cassis and cedar aromas; these reappear on the palate along with black cherry and a hint of juniper on the smooth finish.

title: Trapiche Astica Merlot Malbec
Description: Medium ruby colour; upfront ripe red plum and fresh berries - raspberry, strawberry, with a slight smokiness on the nose; plum, blackberry and the same mild smokiness on the palate and a hint of blood orange.

title: Ravenswood Vintners Blend Old Vine Zinfandel
Description: A new addition to the Vintages Essentials portfolio.A modern classic that helped put Zinfandel on the map. Fun fact: eccentric Ravenswood hosts an annual party celebrating fans who've been tattooed with the winery's logo. Soft and juicy and bursting with toasted oak, nuts and dark berry fruit, this is made for barbecued meats.

title: Seven Falls Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Wahluke Slope is one of the warmest and driest areas in Washington and the conditions are ideal for producing robust and ripe reds with exceptional varietal purity. This Cabernet is approachable and appealing with generous dark fruit, cherry, cassis, dried herbs, vanilla and chocolate. Silky and rich with caressing tannins, it is perfect for lamb, steak, or grilled ribs.

title: Caparzo Sangiovese Toscana IGP
Description: Clear, medium ruby colour; aromas of chocolate, floral note, toast, prune and spice; dry, light to medium bodied with flavours of chocolate covered prune and toast; drink or hold short term.
By:: Borgo Scopeto E Caparzo S.R.L. Soc.

title: Carpineto Dogajolo Rosso Toscano IGT
Description: Clear medium ruby colour; upfront aromas of rye bread, licorice, berry and spice; extra dry and light to medium bodied with well-integrated flavours of licorice, mixed berries, leather and earth; medium finish.

title: Santa Carolina Merlot
Description: Deep brick red colour; Rich, upfront plummy, blood orange and blackberry fruit aromas and flavours with notes of chocolate, earth and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied with moderate tannins.

title: Sandbanks French Kiss VQA
Description: Medium ruby with a garnet hue; lifted aromas and flavours of chocolate, prune, toast and nuts; dry, medium-bodied with balanced acidity and tannins.

title: Famille Perrin Réserve Côtes du Rhône
Description: You can't go wrong with the Southern Rhône, which is on a roll with a string of outstanding vintages. This juicy blend from the celebrated Perrin family is a gem, with ripe red berry fruit and spice notes. Delicious with Mediterranean-style pizza or hearty lamb stew.

title: The Foreign Affair Dream 2017
Description: Quite smooth and even-keeled, lean but supple, Foreign Affair's 'Dream' is a polished and attractive wine. I like the juicy acids and the fine, dusty tannins, still adding a welcome bit of grip on the palate. Indeed, the flavours are still a bit backwards and could use another year or three to come around. Compelling. Merlot 45%, Cabernet Sauvignon 34%, Cabernet Franc 15%, Petit Verdot 6%, with partial appassimento on less than a fifth of the blend. Score - 91. (John Szabo, MS, winealign.com, Nov. 16, 2020)

title: Louis Jadot Beaujolais-Villages
Description: If you like Beaujolais, this is one you'll want to come back to again and again. It features fresh strawberry, dark cherry and floral flavours. Chill for 20 minutes and enjoy with grilled salmon, churrasco chicken or Spanish tapas.

title: Aldone Merlot Riserva IGT 2013
Description: Made in exceptional vintages only, this merlot is hand-picked and aged in new French oak cask for eighteen months. Its Bolgheri provenance shines through in the ripe plummy black fruit, dark chocolate and spice on the lush, firm palate. The lengthy finish displays fine tannins. Enjoy through 2020. Pair with Beef Wellington.

title: Inception Deep Layered Red
Description: Medium ruby; aromas of cedar, spice, prune, and a floral note are detected; the palate is medium body and off-dry showing flavours of cedar and prune fruit along with floral and salumi notes, supple tannins and a medium finish.

title: Château des Charmes Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: Clear, deep purple colour; aromas of chocolate, floral note, plum and smoke; extra dry and medium bodied with a fruit core of chocolate, black plum and other dark fruit; hint of smoke on the medium length finish, drink now or hold 2-3 years.

title: Trapiche Pure Malbec
Description: Trapiche is Argentina's leading exporter of wine. This malbec shows a commitment to pure fruit flavours. An opaque, deep ruby with purple hues; upfront aromas of berry melange, rye bread crust, red fruit, plus hints of bloor orange. The palate is dry, finely textured and brimming with flavours of plum, blackberry and spice.

title: Jaszbery Szekszardi Kekfrankos
Description: Clear deep ruby colour; subtle aromas of cherry, soft floral and spice; dry and medium bodied, aromas repeat on the palate, light cherry, spice and soft floral; short finish.

title: Leonardo Chianti Fiasco
Description: Medium ruby with a garnet hue; the nose offers upfront aromas of licorice, coffee, dark fruit and chestnuts; flavours on the palate echo the nose, but also offers up some dried herb and leather; dry, well balanced, with soft but balanced acidity.

title: Radio Boka Tempranillo VDT Castilla
Description: Ruby red colour; floral aromas of red plum, toast and berries - dark cherries and strawberries with hints of sweet spice; the palate is dry, medium-bodied with balanced flavours that reflect the nose.

title: Hacienda López de Haro Crianza 2017
Description: Plum, cherry and earthy spice notes make up a classic Rioja nose, while this crianza from a hot, dry year feels fleshy and ripe. Dark berry flavors push toward the limits of raisiny on the warm finish. Ranked #43 by Wine Enthusiast's Top 100 Best Buys of 2020.  Score - 90. (Michael Schachner, Wine Enthusiast, Aug. 1, 2020)

title: Jackson-Triggs Merlot
Description: The smoothness of merlot is allowed to shine in this single varietal expression. Starts with bright ruby colour, followed by aromas of prune, chocolate and black plum reduction. The fruit flavours resonate on the palate, which is extra dry yet soft with a pleasing finish.

title: Villa Annaberta Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore
Description: Deep ruby; notes of marmite, toast, licorice with a floral lift on the nose; on the palate it is dry and medium bodied with moderate acidity and tannin; flavours of dried fruit, toast and spice that lingers to the finish.

title: Schwarzer Rappe Cabernet Dorsa 2015
Description: Discover substance, density, spice and juiciness in this beautifully crafted wine. Invite friends to share a bottle over hearty beef, lamb or wild game meals.

title: The Show Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: From the land of Californian cowboys comes this bold, juicy red. Look for dominating aromas of prune and smoky oak with floral, licorice and cassis notes. On the palate expect resonating plush flavours with soft texture all the way through to the finish.

title: Borsao Tinto Garnacha
Description: Deep ruby; fresh ripe dark fruit, chocolate and spice aromas; dry and medium body, similar flavours from the nose of dark fruit, chocolate and spice core with mushrooms and prune notes on the finish.

title: Bodacious Smooth Red
Description: Medium ruby in colour; aromas of sweet plum, nutella, blood orange, and candied berries; medium-sweet with the same flavours as on the nose.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep purple colour; aromas of smoke, floral note, prune, licorice and herbs; dry, medium-bodied, well balanced with ripe tannins and smoky, prune and licorice flavours; medium-long finish.

title: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium deep ruby red colour; smoky oak, fig and cassis, hints of dark chocolate and berry jam; dry, medium bodied with smoky cassis fruit flavours and chocolate notes in the finish.

title: Carnivor Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Dark purple-red colour; aromas of smoky oak, cassis, with notes of lilac, chocolate and nuts; dry, medium bodied, lush, rich and rounded, flavours of smoke, cassis, chocolate/coffee and spice with notes of dried fruit, vanilla and toasted oak.

title: Apothic Dark Red
Description: Opaque deep ruby; fragrant aromas of prune, smoky oak, dark chocolate and spice; on the palate it is medium bodied and dry with a hint of sweetness; the flavours echo the aromas leading to a long and coating finish.

title: Rib Shack Red Vintage Blend
Description: Medium ruby colour; upfront aromas of plum, candy, vanilla and berries; medium bodied and dry, with flavours of plum, candied berries and vanilla.

title: Monasterio De Las Vinas Crianza Carinena
Description: A blend of garnacha, tempranillo and syrah give this red a layered and balanced profile. Clear ruby in colour; the nose is perfumed with nutmeg, fig, honey, smoke and violets aromas. The palate is medium-bodied with silky tannins and a soft finish; look for dark fruit character and elegant smoky oak notes.

title: Pelee Island Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red colour; smoky, plum jam and mushrooms aromas; plummy flavour with a touch of smoke, balanced wine.

title: Erath Pinot Noir
Description: This is a bang on Oregon Pinot, with cherry, tobacco leaf and earthy aromas and flavours that just might put it in the running for your house red. Dry, medium-bodied and supple, it has the versatility to match everything from planked salmon to burgers to roasted red peppers and grilled back ribs.

title: The Velvet Devil Merlot
Description: This is a lively, polished Merlot from Charles Smith that features black cherry, raspberry, toast and spice alongside plum and vanilla. It's crafted in an inviting, crowd-pleasing style, with a silky finish. A fun option for burgers and grilled mushrooms.

title: Doña Paula Estate Malbec
Description: Medium ruby colour; on the nose are upfront notes of blackberry/raspberry, chocolate, licorice and honey; on the palate, it is extra dry and medium-full bodied, with flavours that echo the aromas.

title: Bodega Norton Barrel Select Malbec
Description: Clear medium ruby colour; smoky, floral and rye bread aromas, along with hints of black plum and honey; dry with medium body, balanced acidity and firm structure; smoky black fruit is enhanced by notes of honey and spice, and the flavours linger on a medium length finish.

title: Fuzion Shiraz Malbec
Description: Pale ruby purple colour; lifted aromas of toast and candied berries with a hint of coffee; extra dry, medium-bodied, flavours of candied berries with roasted coffee beans overtones.

title: Buried Cane Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: The name Buried Cane refers to a technique, commonplace in cold wine-growing regions such as Ontario's own Prince Edward County, parts of the Pacific Northwest and others, whereby vines are covered in earth and 'hibernate' through the winter to avoid freezing. Expect this Cab to deliver big, dark berry and currant fruit and plush tannins, and pair it with hearty beef stew.

title: Burnt Ship Bay Estate Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Lifted bell pepper, black plum, cedar and vanilla notes abound in this medium-bodied Cab/Merlot. Velvety tannins wrap around a long savoury finish in this powerful red perfect for any rich and hearty meat dishes.
By:: Burnt Ship Bay Estate Winery Ltd.

title: Cliff 79 Cabernet Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby colour; bouquet shows smoky, spicy, dark fruit - blackberry and black plum; dry and medium-bodied on the palate; rich, ripe fruit flavours and savoury herbal notes; good acidity and texture.

title: Mcguigan Black Label Shiraz
Description: Black cherry red colour; lifted aromas of red berry and fruit, touches of mint, toast and blood orange; dry, medium bodied, rich and rounded with ripe red berry and fruit, hints of herbs and a soft pleasant finish.

title: Las Mulas Cabernet Sauvignon Reserva Organic
Description: Deep ruby in colour; upfront aromas of cassis, coffee and cedar with notes of mint and spice; dry, with medium body, balanced acidity and fine-textured, supple tannins; flavours of cassis and coffee, supported by cedar, and savoury notes of spice and mint; fruit flavours linger on a lengthy finish.

title: Philippe De Rothschild Cabernet Sauvignon Pays d'Oc
Description: Deep purple; intense cassis aroma & flavour with herbal notes; medium-full bodied with firm tannins and raspberry notes in the finish.

title: Naked Grape Shiraz
Description: Clear ruby purple colour; forward aromas of ripe raspberry with floral nuances; mellow, fruity and medium bodied with balanced acidity and soft tannins.

title: Jean-Claude Boisset Les Ursulines Bourgogne Pinot Noir 2019
Description: Grown in clay-limestone soil where once stood a convent of the Ursuline order of nuns, this wine always offers an excellent insight into hallowed Burgundian terroir without an ungodly price tag. It was made in gravity-fed tanks using indigenous yeast and spent seven months on the lees before a quick turn in oak. Look for vibrant redcurrant, sour cherry and freshly cut roses, and sip with coq au vin.

title: Lindemans Cawarra Shiraz Cabernet
Description: Deep purple/ruby colour; rich floral chocolate and prune fruit with vanilla and poached pear on the nose and palate; dry, medium bodied with a spicy finish.

title: The Tragically Hip Fully Completely Reserve Red 2018
Description: This Bordeaux blend has become a regular, looked-for wine on Vintages shelves.  Expect impressive ripe mixed fruit, with woodsmoke and baking spice undertones and firm, give-me-steak tannins. It will offer 5-7+ years of evolution in your cellar. This collaboration between Stoney Ridge and The Hip is the wine for grilled ribs or steak.

title: Kilikanoon Killerman's Run Grenache/Shiraz/Mataro 2018
Description: Always a fine value, the Killerman's Run is crafted to offer an approachable experience. Good balance, juicy and ripe fruit, complex herbs and spice, and a food-friendly texture make it thoroughly engaging. This has the structure to develop for a further 3+ years but will be a great addition to your table tonight. Try it with your favourite grilled fare. (Aug. 1, 2020)

title: Two Oceans Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot
Description: Deep ruby colour; floral, cassis and herbal aromas with notes of mushrooms and spice; dry, medium bodied, with soft medium tannin, smooth, bright cassis flavours; approachable, easy drinking style.

title: The Wanted Zin Old Vines Zinfandel IGT
Description: Deep ruby with garnet rim; upfront aromas of prune, toasty oak, chocolate and honey; medium bodied with a juicy mid-palate filled with flavours of dried fruit, toast, chocolate and spice; fine tannins and a lingering finish.

title: Cave Spring Pinot Noir VQA
Description: Light ruby colour; smoky, red plum, floral and vanilla aromas; very dry, medium bodied palate with fresh plummy flavours.

title: Vieni Briganti Reserve 2015
Description: Crafted from the hybrid grapes Maréchal Foch and Baco Noir, this is lifted and floral with red and black fruit and a savoury undertone. Silky and gently smoky, with some chocolate notes on the close. A structured, well-made wine that will pair well with portobello mushroom burgers or smoky ribs. (Vintages panel, April 2019)

title: 13th Street Burger Blend Gamay Pinot Noir VQA
Description: This offering from the award-winning winery is a blend of gamay and pinot noir. This wine pours bright ruby and it has vibrant aromas and flavours of lifted spice and red fruit, cured meats and watermelon. Medium-bodied, dry, with finely textured tannins, this is ideal for grilled burgers and French fries.

title: Jacob's Creek Double Barrel Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; pronounced aromas of hazelnut butter, black plum, herbs and blood orange; dry, with medium body and lush tannins; flavours of nut spread, black plum, with herbal and citrus notes; the finish is medium in length, with some warmth on the palate; drink now or cellar for two to three years.

title: Fielding Fireside Red VQA
Description: The varietals in this rich red blend are chosen for their structure and approachability. The deep ruby colour is followed by inviting aromas of red fruit, herbs, cedar, nutmeg and citrus. These complex flavours continue on the palate, with balanced acidity and medium tannins, that create a lasting finish.

title: Sella & Mosca Riserva Cannonau di Sardegna
Description: Cannonau is the Sardinian name for that darling Mediterranean grape, Grenache. This traditional version has complex flavours of plum, wild berries, leather and spice. Enjoy with grilled lamb or beef kebabs, or osso buco.

title: Wayne Gretzky Baco Noir VQA
Description: Creating a great baco noir is a true test of Ontario winemaking. Wayne Gretzky Baco scores with balance and energy. Aromas of black fruit and licorice with cedar, smoky and cassis notes; extra dry and medium-bodied, with lively acidity and medium tannins; flavours of black fruit, with spicy notes leading to a medium finish.

title: Cesari Amarone Della Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Deep ruby colour; nuts, chocolate, licorice, raisins and spice aromas; dry, medium to full bodied; rich flavours of hazelnut chocolate, raisins and spice; long finish.

title: Colchester Ridge CREW Meritage 2016
Description: A rich and textured Bordeaux style blend from the warm cradle of Lake Erie's North Shore. Substantial but with balanced and integrated alcohol. Still quite tight with youthfully concentrated black fruit. Oak treatment is nicely in check. Give this another year or two to unwind or decant now and serve with salty protein. Best 2020-2026. Score - 89. (Sara d'Amato, winealign.com, Sept. 10, 2019)

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A crowd-pleasing cabernet sauvignon made with both international and Canadian grapes. Medium ruby, with aromas and flavours of black plum, berry compote, chocolate, toasted oak and spice. It is is extra dry, medium bodied and smooth with juicy plum-berry and spice on the finish. Serve with homemade burgers or cheddar.

title: Beronia Elaboración Especial Tempranillo
Description: Deep garnet in colour; forward lifted aromas of prune, vanilla and toast; on the palate the wine is dry, with medium to full body, medium acidity and fine-textured tannins; upfront flavours of prune, along with the vanilla and toast notes of oak; the finish is warm and soft.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Merlot
Description: To protect his top quality wine, Concha y Toro's Don Melchor spread the rumor that the Devil lived in the cellar, hence the name. Deep, ruby in colour this wine offers aromas and flavours of cassis, chocolate, licorice and toast. The palate is light to medium-bodied and smooth with similar fruit and a soft, balanced finish.

title: Long Weekend Wine Co. Cabernet VQA
Description: This cabernet made by Fielding Estate Winery was created to add a great wine to your long weekend. This wine is ruby red in colour with aromas and flavours of prune, herbs, coffee bean, candied fruit and chocolate. Light to medium-bodied and extra dry on the palate with soft tannins, this is well-suited for barbecued meats.

title: Porta 6 Lisboa VR
Description: This fragrant, ripe and juicy red offers heady aromas of violets, coffee and dark fruit; the palate is medium-bodied, supple and dry with chewy tannins and flavours of coffee, blackberry, black plum, watermelon and herbs on a medium length finish.

title: Santa Julia Reserva Malbec
Description: Deep red purple colour; aromas of plum, blackberry and cassis, with notes of honey, chocolate and blood orange; dry, medium-plus bodied, rich and plush on the palate, with balanced tannin structure, flavours of ripe black plum with notes of black currant, honey, coffee and citrus.

title: Bodacious Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Bright ruby red in the glass; aromas of sweet red plum and berry fruit and floral, candy and vanilla notes; dry and medium bodied with lively flavours of plum, strawberry, cranberry, and vanilla on the palate with a soft finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Merlot
Description: A smooth, fruity merlot sourced from fine vineyards in Canada and around the world. It's medium ruby in colour. Shows aromas of cassis, floral tone, cadar, licorice and smoke. The palate is medium bodied and dry with ripe cassis character and notes of violets, cedar, spice and smoke. Well suited for any occasion.

title: Creekside Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Medium ruby in colour; upfront aromas of spice and black plum; extra dry and medium-bodied, with balanced medium acidity and fine-grained tannins; flavours of spice,  plum, forest floor and dark fruit lead to a lengthy finish.

title: Bodacious Smooth Red
Description: Medium ruby in colour; aromas of sweet plum, nutella, blood orange, and candied berries; medium-sweet with the same flavours as on the nose.

title: Tedeschi Amarone della Valpolicella
Description: Amarone is made using an ancient method of air-drying grapes. The wines are intense, rich and Port-like, but dry. This has cherry, dried fruit, fig and pressed-violet aromas. Superb with roasted meats like lamb, or more exotic dishes such as beef vindaloo.

title: Konzelmann Merlot VQA
Description: Ruby colour; floral, red fruit, nuts, toast and vanilla aroma; matching flavours, balanced; medium body.

title: Honoro Vera Garnacha Monastrell Organic
Description: Deep ruby in colour this fragrant red offers aromas of smoke, dark fruit, coffee cake and honey. The palate is dry and medium-bodied with balanced acid and tannins; look for flavours of smoky dark fruit, coffee and wild honey followed by a long and spicy finish.

title: Pasqua Sangiovese Puglia
Description: Aromas of licorice, spice, herbs, berry mix with a dried flowers note; medium body, moderate acidity, clear spice, herbs and berry fruit.

title: Pelee Pebbles Red
Description: Clear medium ruby in colour; aromas of ripe plum and black pepper, with underlying floral and herbal notes; extra dry and medium-bodied, with medium acidity and tannins; flavours of red plum with light spicy notes on a medium-length finish.

title: Wakefield Promised Land Shiraz
Description: The Wakefield Promised Land series of wines were created for immediate enjoyment; the shiraz is soft and fruity with upfront aromas of nutmeg, plum, herbs and vanilla. The palate is dry with moderate acid, medium tannins and a medium weight body; look for flavours of spice, dark plum and vanilla on a medium finish.

title: Fantini Numero Uno Primitivo IGP
Description: Primitivo's long history dates back to the times of the Phoenicians. It has an lot in common with a more well-known grape variety called Zinfandel. Fantini's version is an intense ruby colour with aromas and flavours of toast, prune, chocolate, spices and herbs; medium-plus body and soft with a harmoniously tannic finish.

title: El Gorú Monastrell/Syrah/Petit Verdot
Description: This blend is based on Monastrell (the predominant red grape in Jumilla) with Syrah and Petit Verdot in support. You will find this to be an intense, concentrated, complex wine with impressive ripe dark fruit, black pepper spice, earth, vanilla and mocha. Typically robust and hearty. Try this with pork shoulder.

title: Joel Gott 815 Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The grapes for this cross-California Cabernet are sourced from prime sites in places such as Napa, Lake County, Monterey, Lodi, Paso Robles, Santa Ynez and Sonoma. Ripe and velvety with juicy dark fruit, cassis and an alluring chocolate note. A brilliant option for lamb burgers, slow-cooked red meats or a charcuterie platter.

title: Big House Cardinal Zin Zinfandel
Description: This is a convenient format for taking to the cottage, poolside, or camping. Medium ruby colour; smoky plum and black cherry notes with dried sweet herbs and spicy oak notes; ripe fruit core with berry fruit, dried herbs, and vanilla flavours; medium-bodied and fruity.

title: Citra Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Medium ruby purple colour; smoke, rye bread, floral note and fig on nose and palate with hints of nuts, plum and spice; balanced acidity, medium-bodied with firm, dry finish.

title: La Vieille Ferme Cotes du Ventoux
Description: Medium violet/ruby colour; upfront aromas of dark fruit and licorice; dry with perfumed black plum character and a touch of caramel; medium finish with supportive tannins.

title: Spinelli Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Produced from montepulciano grape, in the heart of the province of Chieti in Abruzzo. This ruby red wine is bright with lively aromas of chestnut and red plum and hints of spice and herbs. Soft and pleasing on the palate with balanced flavours and a good length finish.

title: Las Mulas Merlot Reserva Organic
Description: Deep ruby with purple highlights; the nose offers upfront aromas of cassis, herbs and spices; the velvety palate is dry, light to medium-bodied with moderate acidity and tannins with concentrated flavours of cassis and herbs followed by a medium finish.

title: Ghost Pines Merlot
Description: Ghost Pines looks beyond regional boundaries to find the best grapes available throughout California for their wines. This one comes from prime sites in Sonoma and Napa and brings a whack of ripe and rich dark fruit with touches of spice, smoke, cocoa, milk chocolate and herbs. This velvety, lush wine will be a great option for Merlot's classic pairing of lamb, but try it with shepherd's pie, duck or roasted pork loin.

title: Château des Charmes Pinot Noir Estate Grown & Bottled VQA
Description: Chateau Des Charmes' long history in the Niagara area dates back to the early 60's. Their Estate Pinot Noir is medium ruby with floral aromas of red plum, blackberries, smoke and chocolate; extra dry medium-bodied palate has balanced acid and tannins and flavours of plum, blackberry, and smoke on a medium-length finish.

title: Big Bill Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Named for the larger than life first manager of KWV, Bill Millar. The color a rich and opaque ruby; on the nose look for aromas of prune, cedar, chocolate and spice. The palate is medium-plus bodied and extra dry with supportive tannins and acid balancing big dark fruit character followed by a lightly spiced, medium finish.

title: Game Changer The Obstinate Red VQA
Description: Ruby red colour; aromas of cedar, berries, mint, spice and chocolate; the palate is extra-dry, medium-bodied showing flavours of cedar, mixed berries, spice and dark chocolate with a slight herbaceous character on the smooth finish.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Noir Reserve VQA
Description: Medium ruby red colour; aromas of berry fruit, smoke and chocolate, with underlying notes of fruit jam and cloves; extra dry, medium bodied with berry fruit, smoky oak and chocolate flavours; well balanced with moderate to long finish.

title: Lindemans Bin 99 Pinot Noir
Description: Garnet colour; berry/cherry, floral fruit with toast and vanilla notes; light to medium-bodied with berry fruit and vanilla on the palate; delicate spicy notes in the finish.

title: Lindemans Bin 40 Merlot
Description: Ruby red colour; floral, cassis and bell pepper on the nose; soft, round berry-plummy flavours with a chocolate and cedar notes in the finish.

title: Henry of Pelham Baco Noir Old Vines VQA
Description: Opaque ruby; upfront aromas of black plum, coffee, smoke and spicy oak. Medium-plus bodied, the palate is extra dry with medium acidity and tannins; complex and layered with plum, coffee, spice and cedar smoke followed by a medium length finish.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Columbia Crest Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Founded in 1983, Columbia Crest has been a leading voice in Washington's emergence as a go-to region for reliability, value and, above all, quality Bordeaux varietals. This will have great fruit intensity, balance and structure and will be ideal with steak or smoked ribs.

title: United Stars Mukuzani Dry, Kakheti, Georgia
Description: The saperavi grape is indigenous to Georgia, and it is this country's most planted red grape variety. Forward floral aromas of black and red berries with spicy, watermelon and leesy/bread notes. The wine is deeply coloured and extra dry, with lively acidity and a supportive tannic structure.

title: Peljesac Red
Description: Pale ruby colour; prominent notes of plum jam, raspberry and cherry; the palate is dry, light to medium-bodied and filled with more flavours of red berry fruit and floral notes; well integrated tannins; finishes with pleasant spice notes.

title: Josh Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This red wine has its fruit sourced throughout California's Mendocino, Napa and Sonoma counties. It is ruby red in colour with ripe aromas and flavours of plum, floral notes, jam, candied fruit and baking spices. The palate is rich and round, with velvety tannins and flavours of plum jam and licorice on a long finish.

title: 19 Crimes Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Inky purple with upfront aromas of cassis, licorice, herbs and vanilla; the palate is medium to full and dry with balanced acidity and soft tannins. Look for big fruity flavours of cassis and vanilla followed by a lengthy, spicy finish.

title: Gentleman's Collection Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This vibrant ruby red wine offers pronounced aromas of dark fruit, toast, dried fig, spice and cedar. The palate is rich and medium to full with moderate acid and medium tannins carrying flavours of dark fruit and berries, toast, spice and cedar followed by a soft finish.

title: Quinta De Bons Ventos Lisboa VR
Description: An elegant blend of four grape varieties create a silky red that pours a deep ruby colour and offers aromas of black cherry, tobacco, and vanilla. The palate is well balanced and medium weight with a flavourful mix of sweet Cassis, earth, leather, and tart cherry followed by a medium length, lightly spiced, finish.

title: Trapiche Pure Malbec
Description: Trapiche is Argentina's leading exporter of wine. This malbec shows a commitment to pure fruit flavours. An opaque, deep ruby with purple hues; upfront aromas of berry melange, rye bread crust, red fruit, plus hints of bloor orange. The palate is dry, finely textured and brimming with flavours of plum, blackberry and spice.

title: Ménage à Trois Silk Red Blend
Description: A blend of pinot noir, malbec and petite sirah sourced from some of California's best wine regions. Every step in winemaking is aimed at creating a wine with a soft and elegant palate, delivering oodles of rich fig, toast and nutty chocolate fruit, accented by floral notes and a hint of sweet spicy oak.

title: Trapiche Pure Black Malbec
Description: Sourced from the foothill vineyards in the Uco valley, this red pours an opaque ruby and offers lifted aromas of black plum and blueberry, coffee and spice. The palate is medium-bodied and dry with medium acidity and soft tannins; expect flavours of dark fruit and milk chocolate followed by a lightly spiced finish.

title: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Aged in used bourbon barrels, this rich California red has upfront notes of blood orange and allspice, with a hint of herbs and berry melange. It makes a great gift for the barbecue-and-bourbon fan.

title: Sogrape Vila Regia Douro DO
Description: Deep ruby red colour; prune, smoke and chocolate aromas and flavours with herbal and wild honey notes; extra dry and medium to full-bodied with a long finish.

title: Angove Organic Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Brilliant ruby in colour with a pronounced nose of oak toast, cedar, prune, chocolate and light herbal character. The palate is medium-bodied, extra dry, with soft to medium acidity and noticeable tannins; expect concentrated toast and prune character, chocolate, and a medium length herbaceous finish.

title: Black Cellar Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Clear, medium ruby colour; aromas of cassis, floral note and toast, nuts and vanilla oak; extra dry and medium-minus bodied; flavours of fragrant cassis, toast, nuts and vanilla with a soft, but balanced acidity that supports the fruit character followed by a medium, fruity finish.

title: Marius Rouge Pays d'Oc
Description: A household name in the Rhone Valley Chapoutier produces this wine with a couple of its most notable grapes, grenache and syrah. The result is a robust and elegant wine with intense ruby colour. Look for aromas and flavours of dark fruit, coffee beans, tar, licorice and jam notes, silky tannins and a pleasant finish.

title: Pelee Island Merlot
Description: Pelee Island Winery is located in Canada's warmest and most southerly grape growing region. This wine is dry, medium-bodied with medium acidity and noticeable tannins. Toasted oak, nuts, and ripe berry flavours with a hint of herbs and cedar on a smooth finish. Serve with barbecued chicken, burgers or grilled vegetables.

title: G. Marquis The Red Line Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: G. Marquis wines show the balance of cool-climate viticulture. This cab is ruby in colour, with aromas of dark fruit, berry, coffee, herbs and toast. The palate is extra dry, with balanced acidity and tannins. Brimming with fruit flavour - notes of dark fruit, berry and coffee are underscored by herbal and toast nuances.

title: Zonin Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: A great example of one of the classic wine styles of Italy's Veneto region, this Valpolicella is medium ruby red in colour, with aromas of rye bread toast, black raisins and a hint of spice. Dry with medium body and a supportive, moderately tannic structure, it is packed with lively dark fruit flavour.

title: Naraya 2017
Description: Intense red cherry colour. Aromatic, high intensity with a varietal of red fruits expression, compote of plum, humid clay. In mouth appears rounded body, with a light astringency that is perfectly integrated with the acidity and the alcohol.

title: Z. Alexander Brown Uncaged Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: This is a serious, full-bodied wine from musician Zac Brown that will need some time to grow into its best self. Tight fruit and spice flavors are wrapped in firm tannins. While delicious now, it could wait until 2023 to be best enjoyed.  Score - 90. (Jim Gordon, Wine Enthusiast, Sept. 1, 2020)

title: Gran Feudo Reserva
Description: In Spain, Reserva wines must be matured for three years in cask and bottle before release. Easygoing with aromas of cherry and spring flowers. It sizzles with hamburgers, beef empanadas or roast chicken stuffed with olives, almonds and paprika.

title: Folonari Valpolicella Ripasso Classico Superiore DOC
Description: Light to medium ruby colour; intense spicy bouquet, cassis, chestnut and cedar flavours; dry, medium bodied, smooth, nutty, spicy berry flavors; well balanced, rich, dry finish

title: Noble Vines 337 Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: Lavish oak spices meld seamlessly with ripe, exotic fruit flavors on a firm but silky texture. It's well balanced, seductive and combines freshness and liveliness with deep and layered flavors. Best Buy. Score - 90. (Jim Gordon, Wine Enthusiast, May 1, 2020)

title: Isole E Olena Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2013
Description: The 2013 Chianti Classico Gran Selezione is breathtaking. Beautifully ripe, deep and expressive, the 2013 has it all: deep fruit, stunning aromatic presence and tremendous structure. Black cherry, pomegranate, rose petal, mint and lavender all meld together in this super-expressive, resonant Chianti Classico. An absolutely killer wine, the Gran Selezione is a fabulous, contemporary expression of Chianti Classico at its very finest. Drops of Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah round out the blend. Paolo De Marchi gave the 2013 a year in barrique and second year in cask. Drink date: 2021-2038. Score - 98+. (Antonio Galloni, vinous.com, July 2018)

title: Pelee Island Baco Noir VQA
Description: Medium deep ruby; mixed berry aromas & flavours with herbs, leather & earth; dry with a persistant finish.Deep purple red colour; aromas and flavours of smoky oak, floral tone, dark fruit and spice with leafy/tomato notes; extra dry, medium bodied, ripe and rounded, with tangy acidity and smoky, spicy dark fruit notes on the lengthy finish.

title: Stormy Bay Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red colour; aromas of smoky oak, cassis, red and black plum jam and chocolate; dry, medium bodied, with berry and plum reduction flavours; good length.

title: Fresh Perspectives Satin Red VQA
Description: 'Smooth and silky, this wine will have you meeting new people and thinkingin new ways! The touch of oak offers great balance to the supple berry notesand smooth finish.' - Angela Aiello Wine Expert & Founder of iYellow Wine Club

title: Lupi Reali Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC Organic
Description: Produced without the use of artificial pesticides or chemicals this wine is also vegan-friendly, but besides that good stuff, it is well-made too. Expect layers of black fruit and spice mingling with mocha and earthy character on a medium body. Very smooth and balanced with a soft/elegant finish.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle Merlot 2017
Description: From the biggest name in Washington wine, this bombastic Merlot spent 18 months in oak and is brimming with ripe plum, vanilla and a wisp of smoke. Supportive tannins give structure to the long finish. Savour with pork roast or baked ham. (Vintages panel, Nov. 2019)

title: Piccini Chianti Orange Organic DOCG
Description: The passion for wine spans over four generations here. Made from a blend of predominantly sangiovese, this pours ruby red with lifted aromas of licorice, chestnut, red fruit and flowers, with a touch of earth; soft and supple on the palate with delicate tannins that provide balance.

title: Melini Chianti DOCG
Description: Pale red garnet colour. Aromas of rye bread, red plum and raspberry with hints of spice and floral notes. Dry, medium bodied, with balanced acidity and flavours of juicy red fruit, spice and floral notes. Easy drinking but also a superb food-friendly wine.

title: Melini Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
Description: 300 years of history along with constant innovation creates a modern expression of Chianti. This Riserva has 18 months in oak, adding spice and depth. The wine has aromas of red fruit and berries, with balsamic and nutty notes. Extra dry, with medium-plus body and supple tannins. Superb with grilled meats and aged cheeses.

title: Cline Zinfandel
Description: Medium ruby colour; intense chocolate, smoky and black fruit aromas with hints of spice and black olive richness; dry with generous chocolate and prune fruit flavours and a rich mouthfeel; spicy long finish.

title: Tocado Garnacha Campo De Borja DO
Description: From the producer of Tres Picos and other customer favourites, comes this velvety red that is packed with flavour. The nose is distinct with aromas of ripe berry and floral while the silky smooth palate bursts with ripe fruit and light spice followed by a round/soft finish. Perfect for casual dining and entertaining.

title: Cecchi Chianti DOCG
Description: An uncomplicated, food-friendly Chianti that's easy to enjoy. Light ruby-garnet colour. Appealing aromas of rye bread, red currant, chestnut, spice and floral notes. Medium bodied palate with soft tannins and moderate acidity. Shows juicy clean lees, red currant, nuts and spice flavours with a floral hint on the finish.

title: Radio Boka Tempranillo VdEspana BIB
Description: Ruby red colour; floral aromas of red plum, toast and berries - dark cherries and strawberries with hints of sweet spice; the palate is dry, medium-bodied with balanced flavours that reflect the nose.

title: Pelee Island Rouge
Description: A wine crafted for casual get-togethers. Ruby red in colour with aromas and flavours of red plum, smoke, berry compote and touch of spice and citrus. Medium-bodied and dry with a silky finish. Enjoy with roast beef, roasted potatoes and a side salad or a selection of cheeses.

title: Open Smooth Red VQA
Description: Medium ruby; bright aromas of crushed and candied red berry fruit, wood spice and toast; the palate shows some sweetness and a light to medium body, powered by candied red berry and fruit, hints of spice and soft tannins.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Merlot
Description: Medium ruby colour; lifted cassis, cedar, chocolate and raspberry/blueberry aromas; medium-bodied and dry; ripe cassis and red berry fruit and supple tannins.

title: Kacaba Cabernet VQA
Description: An award-winning local winery, this offering from Kacaba is a great introduction to quality reds from Ontario. Plush and flavourful with notes of fresh herbs, dark fruit, lees, smoked and cured meats, mingling on light to medium bodied palate that is brightened by a lift of acidity wrapping up with fine/integrated tannins.

title: Henry Of Pelham Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Dark ruby; vanilla, herb, cassis, ripe black berry with floral, earthy tones; dry, with a generous palate.Deep ruby/purple colour; berries, vanilla, toast, cedar and bell pepper aromas and flavours; dry, medium-bodied, well balanced with a rounded, generous palate with a rich texture and long finish.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Santa Carolina Merlot
Description: Deep brick red colour; Rich, upfront plummy, blood orange and blackberry fruit aromas and flavours with notes of chocolate, earth and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied with moderate tannins.

title: Cesari Mara Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore DOC
Description: Ripasso is an iconic Italian wine, made with a second fermentation of Valpolicella on the lees of Amarone.  This one is dry, with complex chocolate, cinnamon, nuts and figs interplay and a velvety mouthfeel. Serve with rich pasta dishes, roasted meats or aged cheeses.

title: Josh Cellars Legacy Red
Description: Named after the founder and his father, Josh Cellars sources its fruit from various premium site throughout the state. This blended wine exudes aromas of coffee, herbs, prune preserve and dark spices. In the mouth, it's bold and juicy with supple tannins and added flavours of toasted almonds and hazelnuts on a long finish.

title: Waltzing Matilda Shiraz Grenache
Description: This shiraz grenache blend comes to us from South Australia. Follow the journey from its deep ruby red colour to the inviting bouquet of floral tones, freshly baked bread, ripe berries and the delightful flavours of spice, berries, herbs and watermelon.

title: Inniskillin Baco Noir VQA
Description: Part of their Niagara estate series, this baco noir shines with delight. Filled with upfront rich black plum notes, look for smoky oak, cedar and herbal aromas. Fresh and flavourful on the palate with more rich plum flavours, smooth texture supported by supple tannins and a pleasant finish.

title: Fantini Sangiovese IGT
Description: Italy's Fantini Wines is based in Abruzzo's Terre di Chieti foothills, where sangiovese thrives. Modern in style, this velvety wine has floral aromas of toast, licorice, dark fruit and juniper. Its flavours smack of ripe dark fruit, spice and smoke. Pour a glass with your favourite pasta dish or with braised short ribs.

title: Fantini Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Toasted nuts, dark fruit and lifted mild spice aromas; ripe, mouthfilling black plum/berry fruit.

title: Negrar Garetta Corvina Verona IGT
Description: Corvina, usually blended with Molinara and Rondinella in Valpolicella, goes solo in this wine. A nose of subtle rye bread, spice and dark fruit aromas. Light to medium body with flavours of dark fruit and spice on the palate and finish. An engaging style that pairs well with pizza, or does well solo - just like the grape.

title: Passo Del Sud Appassimento
Description: A super rich blend of southern Italian grape varieties made in the appassisimento style. Shows opulent floral aromas of toast, ripe plum, coffee and licorice. Palate is ripe, richly textured, and well balanced, with lush flavours of toast, plum and vanilla, with smoky chocolate notes.

title: Open Dark Red VQA
Description: OPEN wines are made from Ontario grapes from the Niagara Peninsula. You will experience luscious aromas of cassis, smoke with nuances of black olive and cedar.  Medium-bodied and well balanced, dry with focus on cassis and smoky oak flavours. Superb with braised short ribs, or a meaty penne ragu.

title: Passi Reali Appassimento Montepulciano Organic VDT
Description: Appassimento is the Italian term for drying grapes to concentrate the sugars and flavours before winemaking. This wine shows upfront notes of prune reduction, red fruit, and chocolate that carry to the richly-fruited palate and end in a warm finish. It is also is certified organic. Pair with non-dairy eggplant parmigiana.

title: Bodacious Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Bright ruby red in the glass; aromas of sweet red plum and berry fruit and floral, candy and vanilla notes; dry and medium bodied with lively flavours of plum, strawberry, cranberry, and vanilla on the palate with a soft finish.

title: Candidato Oro Tempranillo Garnacha, Castilla VDT
Description: Garnet red colour; upfront aromas of cedar, honey, dried fig and smoke; extra dry, medium bodied with sweet dark fruit flavours and smoky oak notes on the long finish.

title: Trapiche Reserve Malbec
Description: Deep ruby red colour; aromas of rich black cherry, spice and plum; dry, full bodied, with ripe cherry fruit centre; good length.

title: Cono Sur Bicicleta Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Cono Sur is a leader in sustainable wine production. Bicicleta Cabernet Sauvignon is deep ruby in the glass, with aromas of plum, smoke, cedar, cassis and nuts. You will taste plum, cassis and ripe berry fruit; barrel ageing adds the smoky and nutty notes of oak. Serve with grilled meats, pasta or a selection of cheeses.

title: El Abuelo Organic Tempranillo Monastrell, Almansa DO
Description: Spain's Almansa region is rich in limestone and poor in organic matter - ideal soils for quality wines! El Abuelo (Grandfather) is deep-coloured, with bright aromas of fig, ginger and red fruit with smoky hint. It is dry and approachable, with spice and red fruit flavours, soft balanced acidity and ripe tannic structure.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Meritage VQA
Description: Bright ruby/cherry colour; cedar, berry mix, toast, nutmeg and herbaceous/leafy, bell pepper aromas; extra dry, medium body, with supportive tannic structure; cedar, berry, toast and herbal fruit flavours.

title: Georges Duboeuf Beaujolais
Description: Dark ruby colour; young berry fruit & cherry aromas; soft fruit flavour; easy drinking style.

title: Anciano Clasico Garnacha, Valencia DO
Description: Anciano garnacha is made from perfectly ripe grapes which are harvested from dry farmed, low-yielding vineyards which are transformed into a smooth, generous wine with bright floral, licorice, walnut and dried fig fruit flavours with a touch of honey.

title: Nederburg Shiraz
Description: Deep violet-ruby colour; floral, smoky, prune, black olive and spice aromas; medium-to-full bodied with rich dark berry flavours and a long finish.

title: Poço Do Lobo Reserva Red 2015
By:: Caves Sao Joao - Sociedade Dos Vinh

title: Julia Florista Red
Description: Named after the famed flower girl of Fado, this red is an elegant rendition highlighting vanilla, bright red plum, nuts and hint of blood orange. Truly a soft and easy-drinking charmer that is ideal for a variety of dishes from burgers to rare beef.

title: Silk & Spice Red
Description: Portugal's heritage of exploration is celebrated in this easy-drinking red blend. Deep ruby, with aromas of black plum and berry reduction and lifted honeyed and spicy notes. On the palate, Silk & Spice lives up to its name; soft, supple and approachable, dry, with plum, jammy and spicy flavours.

title: Santa Carolina Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep garnet colour; floral, cassis and coffee on the nose with hints of herbs; medium-bodied and ripe with cassis and coffee fruit nuances; long, supple finish.

title: Vicente Faria Animus Douro DO
Description: Great value, classic Portuguese red made from indigenous varieties grown in the prestigious Douro Valley. Expect a dark ruby garnet colour, and complex upfront aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate and licorice with a note of wild honey. Palate is dry, medium-bodied and rich with ripe tannins and a long finish.

title: Domaine Hatzimichalis Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby; lifted aromas of smoke, cassis, earth and leather; extra dry, medium to full-bodied, flavours of cassis, toasty oak, earth and spice notes on the finish.

title: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Merlot
Description: Deep ruby colour; dark fruit, licorice, chocolate, smoke and herbal aromas; extra dry, medium bodied, very fruit driven, with dark fruit flavours, soft tannins, oaky finish.

title: Relax Red Blend, Rheinhessen
Description: A red partner to the ever popular blue-bottle riesling. This new addition is ripe, rich and delicious. Loaded with upfront aromas and flavours of black cherries, plums, blood orange and a touch of tobacco. On the palate, it's medium-bodied with rounded texture and persisting fruit flavours that linger on the finish.

title: Stave & Steel Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A refined, full-bodied cabernet with bold fruit flavours. Dark plum and candied berry notes with a touch of herbs enrich the palate, providing excellent structure and supportive tannins. The Bourbon influences add notes of spice, vanilla and caramel that lead to a long, smooth finish.

title: Three Thieves Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A classic California wine, Three Thieves is 100% cabernet sauvignon, sourced from the Monterey and Lodi regions. Medium-bodied and rich, with forward aromas and flavours of berry compote, candy and dried pear. The toasty and vanilla notes from ageing in French and American oak barrels linger on a long and spicy finish.

title: Philippe De Rothschild Merlot Pays d'Oc
Description: Ruby red colour; floral, coffee, toast and licorice aromas; coffee, spice and dark fruit flavours; medium body with soft touch of tannin on finish.

title: Plantaze Monte Cheval Vranac
Description: Medium garnet; lifted, plum, smoke and licorice aromas with a note of salumi; smoky, plummy fruit flavour with a hint of spice.

title: Chateau D'Aigueville CdRhone Villages Red AOC
Description: Thirty-year-old vines are the basis for this elegantly structured wine. Intensely aromatic with a bouquet of smoke, juniper, prune and tobacco. The palate is fruity and concentrated dark fruit with smoky, tarry follow-through. Pair with braised beef or pepper steaks. Maximum aging 4-8 years.

title: Frescobaldi Castiglioni Chianti DOCG
Description: Deep ruby colour; floral, licorice, chestnut and plum aromas with hints of fresh rye bread; dry, medium bodied, good spice, chestnut and red plum flavours, supportive tannin, lingering finish.

title: Cigar Box Pinot Noir
Description: A pinot noir crafted from hand-harvested grapes from Chile's famed Casablanca Valley. Ruby colour with a bouquet of coffee, licorice and fig and hints of smoke and nuts. The initial palate is silky and elegant, followed by coffee and spicy fig fruit flavours. Try this with grilled salmon or roasted chicken with vegetables.

title: Jacob's Creek Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby red colour; rich, vanilla and coating dark fruit, lifted plummy, black cherry aromas with spice accents; dry, medium bodied, with moderate tannins and light berry fruit flavours.

title: Waywood Wines Quattro Vini 2015
Description: Bold garnet colour with a rich, vibrant, initial fruit hit of blueberries and redcurrants, with hints of tobacco, juniper berry and savoury spice. Medium-bodied, with bold hits of blueberry, blackcurrant bursting through, giving way to plum. Damson on a long savory spice driven finish with hints of fennel seed and citrus oil.

title: Dorna Velha Reserve Tinto 2013
Description: Intense dark ruby colour. It has a rich aroma of ripe fruits and new oak. On the palate, very concentrated and well balanced with hints of floral and spices. Soft tannins and lingering finish. Serve at a temperature between 15º to 17ªC. Perfect with red meat dishes, game and aged cheeses.

title: Drumheller Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: The 2017 vintage saw cool temperatures in late September that allowed grapes a longer hang time in which to ripen slowly and develop even further nuance and complexity. This created wines of great freshness and balance. Expect this Cabernet to feature excellent cassis and dark fruit, with vanilla and a touch of mint. A good option for grilled or roasted beef.

title: Frontera After Midnight Dark Red Blend
Description: The grapes for After Midnight are harvested in the cool of the evening. This preserves the freshness and flavours of the fruit before the grapes are crushed. Enjoy aromas and flavours of black cherry, raspberries and vanilla. The balanced structure is smooth and supple.

title: Kourtakis Apelia Agiorgitiko (St George) Red Peloponnese IGP
Description: Medium ruby; lifted aromas of smoke and dried fig with spice and herbal notes; extra-dry, light to medium bodied, soft acidity and tannins with flavours of smoke, fig, underbrush and a touch of herbs on an easy finish.

title: Château Des Charmes Cabernet-Merlot Estate Grown & Bottled VQA
Description: Chateau Des Charmes, founded by Paul Bosc in 1978, has been making wine as a family ever since. Their Cabernet Merlot is a blend of cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot sourced from several vineyards. This medium-minus bodied wine has cherry, floral and chocolate aromas and flavours, finishing with supple tannins.

title: Forward Smooth Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This cabernet from the Forward brand of Pelee Island Winery delivers palate pleasing rich, ripe flavours. Look for lifted notes of bell pepper, berry compote, hints of herbs and mint. Balanced on the palate with rich flavours and smooth texture leading to a lengthy, dry finish.

title: Martin Berdugo Joven 2017
Description: A seductive wine from Ribera del Duero with intense floral and black fruit aromas, this young, versatile red is well-suited to a range of foods, from beef chili to Chinese food to vegetable curry.

title: Black Cellar Shiraz Cabernet
Description: The Black Cellars winemaker explored numerous blends deep within the heart of the cellar until perfection was achieved. The ultimate blend combines upfront flavours of black currant, floral and jammy notes with a touch of mint chocolate and a smooth mouthfeel that exemplifies the mystique of Black Cellar.

title: Cathedral Cellar Shiraz 2018
Description: From KWV, Cathedral Cellar's 2018 Shiraz is full-bodied with ripe dark berry, plum, leather, smoked meat, savoury herb and spicy flavours on the palate. KWV celebrates their 100th anniversary with this 2018 vintage. Hover your phone over the label to see the winemaker who provides winetasting notes and the story behind the wine. Drink date: 2021-2024. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, Feb. 1, 2021)

title: Abbotts & Delaunay Les Fruits Sauvages Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: The vineyards from which this Cabernet is sourced are bordered by a variety of wild plants (fleurs sauvages), which are tended as carefully as the vines themselves. These native flora provide a clear indication of the overall health of the immediate environment. This wine is crafted in an easy-drinking, fruity style, with mixed dark fruit, cassis and spice. Pair with steak.

title: Fat Bastard Syrah Pays D'OC
Description: Deep ruby red colour; rye bread, smoke, black olive tapenade and prune aromas with notes of berry mix; extra dry, medium-bodied, sweet fruit core of flavour with notes of lees, smoky black olive and prune, soft but well balanced acidity and ripe tannins.

title: Reif Estate Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Light garnet; aromas & flavours of red cherry, anise, leather, tobacco & mineral; dry, well structured & long.Light garnet colour; lifted herbs, bell pepper, spice and juniper aromas; dry and light to medium-bodied with flavours of savory herbs, bell pepper and spice; dry, with balanced moderate acidity and tannins; medium long finish.

title: Navip Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium ruby colour; upfront aromas of black plum, rye bread, toast and spice; medium bodied, with plum, toast and spice notes and hints of berry; dry finish.

title: Carnivor Zinfandel
Description: With a vine-friendly Mediterranean climate, California's Lodi region has earned its reputation with full-bodied zinfandels. Flavours of cassis, chocolate, smoky oak, fig and spice are complemented by a silky texture. Carnivor wines pair well with meats, but keep in mind for roasted vegetables or pasta dishes as well.

title: Casillero Del Diablo Reserva Privada Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Reserva Privada tier uses cabernet sauvignon grapes from Chile's Maipo Valley, one of its finest winegrowing regions. The wine is matured in oak barrels for one year. Cassis, floral, smoky oak, cedar and chocolate aromas are mirrored on the palate. The smooth finish lingers. Pair with aged cheeses.

title: The Grinder Pinotage
Description: Originating in South Africa, this award-winning wine pours deep ruby into the glass and has upfront aromas of smoke, prune, rye bread and spice. These reappear on a medium-plus bodied and extra dry palate with silky tannins and a long finish. Pair with coffee-rubbed ribs or grilled portobello burgers.

title: Yellow Tail Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep purple with intense aromas of prune and candy/vanilla. The palate is rich with confectionary black fruit, black olive and wood spice. The finish is rich and mellow.

title: Yvon Mau Merlot Pays d'Aude
Description: Medium ruby colour; upfront dark fruits and berries, spice and chocolate aromas; dry, light to medium bodied, with juicy dark fruit flavours; fresh, clean, fruit driven style.

title: Beringer Brothers Bourbon Barrel Red Blend
Description: Beringer has been making quality wines in California since 1875. Aged in used bourbon barrels, this bold red blend has aromas and flavours of coffee, toasted oak and prune with floral and licorce notes. Medium-bodied with soft tannins and long finish, it;s perfect for a leg of lamb with mashed potatoes and root vegetables.

title: Peter Lehmann Portrait Barossa Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby with purple highlights; floral, prune, coffee and smoke aromas with peppery spice; medium to full bodied; juicy plummy flavour with soft oak in medium finish.

title: Sola Nero Red
Description: Bright cherry red colour; fresh and fruity plums and berries with savory hints - underbrush and rye bread - on the nose; medium-light body with flavours of plum and cranberry; crisp finish.

title: Shannon Home Ranch Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: Big, very ripe and velvety, this full-bodied wine is packed with black cherry, black fig and a dash of baking spices. It's quite smooth, moderately tannic and easy to sip. Score - 90. (Jim Gordon, Wine Enthusiast, Dec. 31, 2020)

title: Magnotta Cabernet Sauvignon Venture Series VQA
Description: Magnotta's family-owned vineyards take full advantage of the varied soils and micro-climates of Ontario's Niagara Peninsula. The Venture Series cab has aromas of chocolate, dark fruit and cassis, with cedar and floral notes. On the palate, balanced acidity and tannins support chocolate and dark berry and fruit flavours.

title: Revel Cab Noir Dark Red VQA
Description: There is plenty to revel in with this flavourful red; intensely fragrant with prune, smoke, chocolate and spice aromas that continue onto a silky smooth palate which reveals rich chocolate covered prune core followed by hints of smoke and spice on the finish. Perfect with grilled steak or burgers.

title: Black Tower Dornfelder Pinot Noir Pfalz
Description: Light ruby red colour; yeasty-bready, berry and dark plum spicy aromas; off-dry, light to medium-bodied, ripe fresh berries and plums with balanced acidity, soft tannins, medium finish. Easy drinking style.

title: XOXO Simply Smooth Red
Description: The name says it all: simply smooth red. Enjoy its forward dark berry, toast, nuts, plum and chocolate aromas and flavours. The palate is soft, rounded and smooth with a juicy berry finish. Enjoy anytime, on its own or with your favourite takeout or delivery. Serve lightly chilled to enhance the refreshingly smooth style.

title: Louis Bernard CdRhone AOC
Description: With grenache as the main grape variety in the blend, the wine is spicy and generous, and a superb partner for cuisine. Medium ruby red colour with forward aromas of black plum jam, anise and mushrooms. On the palate, extra dry and light to medium bodied, with ripe, juicy plum fruit flavours and hint of spice on the finish.

title: Gato Negro Merlot
Description: Bright ruby colour; lifted aromes of rye bread, spice, bell pepper and black plum; extra dry, light to medium-bodied, with leesy, plummy fruit flavours and a moderate to long pleasant finish.

title: Bouchard AF Heritage Du Conseiller Pinot Noir Vdfrance
Description: Heritage du Conseiller line pays homage to Paul Bouchard (1814-1898) and his commitment to quality. Medium ruby in colour with vibrant aromas and flavours of beetroot, plum, flowers, berry and licorice. Light to medium-bodied and fruity with a refreshing clean finish, this is well-suited for baked salmon or pepperoni pizza.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Baco Noir VQA
Description: Deep purple colour; smoke, prune, chocolate, jammy fruit and cedar aromas; extra dry, medium body; smoky prune flavours; dry finish; medium tannins.

title: Laurent Miquel Pere et Fils Merlot Pays d'Oc IGP
Description: Laurent Miquel has been making top-quality wine for decades. This merlot is a medium ruby colour with aromas of dark fruit, coffee, licorice, rye bread and violet. Flavours of dark fruit preserve, coffee and spice to a extra dry, medium-minus body with silky tannins and a long finish. Pair this with roast pork or lamb stew.

title: Roux Père & Fils Les Cotilles, Pinot Noir, VdFrance
Description: This pinot noir is made with fruit sourced from various sites in Southern France. Medium garnet colour, expect vibrant aromas and flavours of plum, cherry, carnations, beetroot and honey. Medium-plus bodied with balanced acidity, this is a perfect match for grilled salmon alongside mixed greens and scalloped potatoes.

title: Trius Merlot VQA
Description: Medium-deep garnet red colour; aromas of smoke, prune, dried flowers, chocolate and cedar; extra dry, with balanced acidity, medium bodied, with flavours of smoky plum compote, chocolate and cedar; moderately long finish.

title: Trius Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: Medium garnet; aromas & flavours of cherry, cassis, vanilla & red berry, with undertones of green pepper & cedar.Medium garnet; aromas of chocolate, cassis and cedar; dry, medium body; chocolate and red berry flavour with undertones of smoky oak and prune; nicely balanced with medium tannins.

title: Trius Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Bright medium ruby colour; black currant, cedar and chocolate with a touch of herbs and oak toast on the nose; medium body, extra dry wine, cassis and spice flavours and oak finish.

title: Gioulis Sofos The Wise One 2018
Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Agiorgitiko, this Wise One shows the sagacity of harmonious balance. Expect earthy and spice notes adding complexity to a core of juicy dark fruit, all with impeccable structure. Pour with moussaka or beef pot pie.

title: Spinelli Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Produced from montepulciano grape, in the heart of the province of Chieti in Abruzzo. This ruby red wine is bright with lively aromas of chestnut and red plum and hints of spice and herbs. Soft and pleasing on the palate with balanced flavours and a good length finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. Extra dry and medium bodied, offering aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate, cedar, smoky oak and cassis. Serve with flank steak and grilled vegetables.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Red
Description: Medium ruby colour; gentle berry, toast and cedar aromas followed by vanilla and plum notes; medium-bodied with berry/cherry flavours.

title: Argento Seleccion Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium violet/ruby colour; coffee, toast, nuts, black plum and cedar on the nose; dry, medium-full-bodied with a ripe fruit center, supple tannins and good length on the finish.

title: Alianca Terra Boa Vinho Tinto Old Vines
Description: Medium deep ruby; aromas of smoke, floral tone, prune spread and spice; extra dry, balanced acidity, medium bodied with soft fruit and medium tannins.

title: Oyster Bay Pinot Noir
Description: Oyster Bay's Pinot Noir is always a hit, delivering reliable quality at an easy-to-swallow price. It has a pretty nose, with strawberry, blackberry, plum, sage and earth. Food-friendly and vibrant, it will pair well with duck, salmon or grilled pork.

title: Malivoire Gamay
Description: Not widely seen outside France, Gamay thrives in Ontario and has become somewhat of a specialty. Ripe and refreshing, with juicy red berry fruit and peppery spice. Shines with grilled gourmet sausages, roast beef with mashed potatoes or lamb souvlaki.

title: Roux Père & Fils Les Cotilles, Pinot Noir, VdFrance
Description: This pinot noir is made with fruit sourced from various sites in Southern France. Medium garnet colour, expect vibrant aromas and flavours of plum, cherry, carnations, beetroot and honey. Medium-plus bodied with balanced acidity, this is a perfect match for grilled salmon alongside mixed greens and scalloped potatoes.

title: Trius Merlot VQA
Description: Medium-deep garnet red colour; aromas of smoke, prune, dried flowers, chocolate and cedar; extra dry, with balanced acidity, medium bodied, with flavours of smoky plum compote, chocolate and cedar; moderately long finish.

title: Trius Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: Medium garnet; aromas & flavours of cherry, cassis, vanilla & red berry, with undertones of green pepper & cedar.Medium garnet; aromas of chocolate, cassis and cedar; dry, medium body; chocolate and red berry flavour with undertones of smoky oak and prune; nicely balanced with medium tannins.

title: Trius Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Bright medium ruby colour; black currant, cedar and chocolate with a touch of herbs and oak toast on the nose; medium body, extra dry wine, cassis and spice flavours and oak finish.

title: Gioulis Sofos The Wise One 2018
Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Agiorgitiko, this Wise One shows the sagacity of harmonious balance. Expect earthy and spice notes adding complexity to a core of juicy dark fruit, all with impeccable structure. Pour with moussaka or beef pot pie.

Description: Produced from montepulciano grape, in the heart of the province of Chieti in Abruzzo. This ruby red wine is bright with lively aromas of chestnut and red plum and hints of spice and herbs. Soft and pleasing on the palate with balanced flavours and a good length finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. title: Peller Family Vineyards Red
Description: Medium ruby colour; gentle berry, toast and cedar aromas followed by vanilla and plum notes; medium-bodied with berry/cherry flavours.

title: Argento Seleccion Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium violet/ruby colour; coffee, toast, nuts, black plum and cedar on the nose; dry, medium-full-bodied with a ripe fruit center, supple tannins and good length on the finish.

title: Alianca Terra Boa Vinho Tinto Old Vines
Description: Medium deep ruby; aromas of smoke, floral tone, prune spread and spice; extra dry, balanced acidity, medium bodied with soft fruit and medium tannins.

title: Oyster Bay Pinot Noir
Description: Oyster Bay's Pinot Noir is always a hit, delivering reliable quality at an easy-to-swallow price. It has a pretty nose, with strawberry, blackberry, plum, sage and earth. Food-friendly and vibrant, it will pair well with duck, salmon or grilled pork.

Description: Not widely seen outside France, Gamay thrives in Ontario and has become somewhat of a specialty. Ripe and refreshing, with juicy red berry fruit and peppery spice. Shines with grilled gourmet sausages, roast beef with mashed potatoes or lamb souvlaki.

title: Argento Seleccion Malbec
Description: Bright ruby red colour; toasted oak, nuts, sweet plum compote and honey aromas with hints of violets and herbs; dry, medium bodied, with balanced medium acidity and silky tannins supporting flavours of roasted nuts and ripe black fruits.

title: Vineland Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; aromas of black fruit, spices, chocolate, dried herbs and plum; extra dry, medium-bodied, well structured with flavours of black berry and fruit, spice and dark chocolate; long, lively finish.

title: Pelee Island Merlot
Description: Pelee Island Winery is located in Canada's warmest and most southerly grape growing region. This wine is dry, medium-bodied with medium acidity and noticeable tannins. Toasted oak, nuts, and ripe berry flavours with a hint of herbs and cedar on a smooth finish. Serve with barbecued chicken, burgers or grilled vegetables.

title: Porcupine Ridge Syrah
Description: This wine, named for the crested porcupines of the region, is a stellar value. A serious, dark and smoky Syrah, with blackberry, spice and vanilla. It loves grilled meats, from hamburgers to thick juicy steaks.

title: Benziger Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: A focused aroma of cinnamon and oak accents ripe plum in this approachable, incredibly great value red, which is sumptuous, bright, and sleek on the palate. Spiced blue fruit melds with supple tannins for easy drinking; balanced acidity offers superb food-pairing abilities.  Score - 93. (Meridith May, tastingpanelmag.com, June 2020)

title: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Attention to detail creates the quality and consistency that Wolf Blass wines are known for. Yellow Label Cab is made with fruit from Australia's Langhorne Creek and McLaren Vale regions. Enjoy flavours of coffee, smoky oak, black plum along with floral and wild honey notes. A superb pairing for roast lamb with rosemary.

title: Ora Centurio Velletri DOP
Description: Medium ruby/garnet; aromas of raspberry and dried cherry, candied fruit, prune, mocha and herbs; dry, medium bodied, moderate structured tannins, fresh and dried fruit on finish.

title: Angus The Bull Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The philosophy behind this Australian cabernet sauvignon was to create the perfect pairing for beef. They succeeded! Deep ruby colour, with aromas and flavours of chocolate, cedar, black plum, floral and herbal notes. Medium to full-bodied and smooth, with a long finish, this is made for grilled steak and roasted potatoes.

title: Pèppoli Chianti Classico
Description: A food-friendly Chianti Classico made on the historic Pèppoli estate, whose vineyards date back to the middle ages. Features cherry, currant, leather and herbal notes. Pair with homemade pizza, cured meats or pasta with Bolognese sauce.

title: Ringbolt Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Ringbolt was a ship that sank during the 1800s off the rugged Australian coast near Margaret River, now a premium wine region. This elegant Cabernet goes down beautifully! Serve with oven-roasted top sirloin, grilled sausages or hearty lamb stew.

title: Arboleda Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: The subtle tobacco, blackcurrant and sliced-mushroom character is impressive on the nose with hints of spice and black chocolate. Medium to full body with a compressed fruit and tannin feel. Racy and structured at the finish. Grippy. Needs time to come around. Better after 2021. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, April 17, 2020)

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. Extra dry and medium bodied, offering aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate, cedar, smoky oak and cassis. Serve with flank steak and grilled vegetables.

title: EastDell Black Cab VQA
Description: Deep ruby red colour; lifted aromas of spice, dark fruit and smoke with green/leafy notes; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, soft and rounded, flavours of dark fruit and berries with herbal and earthy notes.

title: Osborne Solaz Tempranillo Cabernet Sauvignon, Castilla VDT
Description: Dark ruby colour; upfront fresh rye bread, plum, herbs and toast aromas; dry, light to medium bodied palate with dark bread, plum and oak toast flavours and moderate tannin on the finish.

title: Poças Junior Vale de Cavalos Red 2018
Description: Named after the prehistoric wall drawings close to the vineyards, the wine is a fine, ripe blend, rich in tannins and full of black fruit potential. Its structure of ripe tannins will ensure that the wine ages well. Drink from 2022. Score - 91. (Roger Voss, Wine Enthusiast, Nov. 1, 2020)

title: Fat Bastard Merlot Pays d'Oc
Description: Medium garnet colour; plums, coffee bean, licorice and tobacco notes on the nose; extra dry, light to medium-bodied with a soft plum palate, ripe tannins in a medium finish with a touch of spice.

title: Altoona Hills Cabernet/Shiraz KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Concentrated cassis, blackberry, plum, leather and oak. Grilled steak.

title: Mogen David Concord KP
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Strawberry, cherry and fresh table grapes. Enjoy with grape tarts.

title: Wolf Blass Red Label Cabernet Merlot
Description: Founder Wolfgang Blass has been making wine in South Australia since 1966. This approachable red is bursting with aromas and flavours of ripe cassis, plum, oak, chocolate and fresh mint. It's full-bodied and smooth with a long, velvety finish. Serve with grilled lamb chops alongside cheesy scalloped potatoes.

title: Pasqua Merlot Delle Venzie IGT
Description: purple garnet with blueberry plum nose. Soft and mellow with velvety blackberry flavors in the end

title: Eastdell Pinot Noir 2017
Description: Ruby colour with a faint tawny hue, the wine has a gently earthy, strawberry nose; it's medium-bodied, dry, savoury, raspberry and red plum flavours; well-balanced and varietally correct with a fresh acidic finish. It costs $15.95 at Vintages outlets and works well with roast chicken or poached salmon. Score - 89. (tonyaspler.com, March 22, 2019)

title: The Calling Pinot Noir 2018
Description: Kim Marcus of winespectator.com awarded the 2017 vintage of this wine a rating of 91 points on March 31, 2020. The 2018 has not yet been reviewed, but it will reflect a similar quality and refinement. Look for a richly textured wine with notes of forest floor, dark fruit and spice, all framed by a mineral-laced finish. This will drink well until at least 2025.

title: Trapiche Reserve Malbec
Description: Deep ruby red colour; aromas of rich black cherry, spice and plum; dry, full bodied, with ripe cherry fruit centre; good length.

title: Lindemans Bin 50 Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; floral, coffee, dark fruit and candy on the nose with toasted oak notes; dry, medium-bodied, with a coffee and sweet dark fruit center and good length.

title: Masi Campofiorin IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour; lifted, savory aromas of figs and spices; the palate is dry, medium-bodied with dominating flavours of dried fruit - figs, cherries, with a nice backbone of spice; medium tannins are supple and the finish is medium.

title: Domaine De Serame Cab Sauv Organic Pays D'Oc IGP
Description: Domaine De Serame owns extensive organic vineyards in southern France that supply their winery. This tasty organic cabernet sauvignon starts with aromas of prune, licorice, minerals, smoke and violets. Flavours include dried dark fruit and baking spices, and the finish features silky tannins. Pair with spicy roast chicken.
By:: Les Grands Chais De France Sa

title: Diabolica Red VQA
Description: This devilishly flavourful red is bursting with upfront chocolate and prune aromas. Medium-bodied, with mellow acidity, the palate reveals layers of chocolate, prune preserve, smoke and mineral flavours. Soft and silky it finishes with a note reminiscent of Black Forest cake.

title: Pelee Island Lola Cabernet Franc Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: In Ontario's southwestern edge, Pelee Island Winery enjoys plenty of sunshine during growing season. Expect vibrant aromas and flavours of cedar, dark berries and fruits, with mint, spicy and herbal notes. Medium-bodied and fruity with a dry finish, this is a great match for a charcuterie board with deli meats and cheeses.

title: Sogrape Vila Regia
Description: Deep ruby red colour; prune, smoke and chocolate aromas and flavours with herbal and wild honey notes; extra dry and medium to full-bodied with a long finish.

title: Red Knot Shiraz
Description: Deep ruby/garnet in colour; rye bread, dark fruit and chocolate aromas; extra dry, medium-to-full bodied; dark berry, herbs and spice flavours and balanced acidity with ripe medium tannins and medium length finish.

title: Angels Gate Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Medium ruby colour; aromas and flavours of cassis, bell pepper, cedar, toast and nuts; extra dry with pronounced acidity and soft tannins.

title: Pedras Do Monte Cabernet Sauvignon Tinta Roriz, Lisboa VR
