Description: Deep ruby colour; licorice, walnut, dark fruit, smoke and earth aroma; dry, medium bodied with spice, nuts, dark fruit and smoky oak flavours with medium tannnins and medium finish.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Carmenere
Description: Concha y Toro sources the grapes from Chile's Rapel Valley for this Carmenere. It exudes aromas of chocolate, cassis, flowers, smoke and spice with mouth-filling flavours of chocolate, cassis and toasty oak. The medium body and smooth finish make it very food-friendly. Pair with grilled steak, hearty stews or aged cheeses.

title: Cono Sur Tocornal Cabernet Sauvignon Shiraz
Description: Plum purple concentrated centre; aromas of lilac, coffee & cassis; these plus smoky and savory notes at mid palate with ripe medium tannins on the finish.

title: Masi Tupungato Passo Doble Organic
Description: Medium deep red cherry colour; lifted aromas of wild honey, black plum jam and citrus; dry, light to medium bodied, rich, with sweet dried fruit flavours, medium balanced acidity and supporting tannins, long finish.

title: Trapiche Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby red colour; cedar, black plum, floral and berries aromas; extra dry, medium body and light to medium intensity fruit flavour, with supportive tannins on the finish.

title: Hoya De Cadenas Reserva Tempranillo, Utiel-Requena DO
Description: Medium  garnet colour; ripe dark fruit aromas with touches of smoke, honey and spice; extra dry, medium to full bodied; black plum flavour with an earthy tone, balanced structured; medium ripe tannins on finish.

title: Straccali Chianti DOCG
Description: Enjoy this fresh and vibrant Chianti with a wide range of Italian dishes. It shows a bright ruby red colour. On the nose it shows licorice, chestnut, leather and black plum. The palate is extra dry, fresh, and medium bodied, with flavours of spice, leather, nuts and plum. Finish is structured and balanced.

title: Yellow Tail Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep purple with intense aromas of prune and candy/vanilla. The palate is rich with confectionary black fruit, black olive and wood spice. The finish is rich and mellow.

title: Anatolikos 2006
Description: Named Anatolikos for the eastern facing slopes the grapes were dried upon, this exceptional dessert wine is made from 100% agiorgitiko. It bursts with notes of passion fruit, honey, apricot, vanilla, cinnamon and strawberries. Medium-bodied and sweet, with a long, viscous finish. Perfect for pecan pie or chocolate mousse.

title: Fantini Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Toasted nuts, dark fruit and lifted mild spice aromas; ripe, mouthfilling black plum/berry fruit.

title: Bindi Original Vineyard Pinot Noir 2015
Description: This has a slightly deeper hue than the Block 5 but carries the same sense of restraint and purity. The nose has deep-set spicy aromas, some gently flinty/stony notes and a gently leafy autumnal edge to boot. The fruits are centered around blueberries, dark cherries and pomegranates. It's really fresh. With its super smooth texture, the palate has mouth-filling presence in the form of supple, soft and fleshy red plums, raspberries, cassis and dark-cherry flavors. There's a late flurry of spices, and the balance is effortless, floating up out of the finish. Concentrated and balanced. From a great vintage. Approachable now, this has 15+ years in the tank. Try after 2020 for the complete picture. Ranks #49 in James Suckling's Top 100 Wines of 2017. Score - 97. (James Suckling, jamessuckling.com, Jan. 11, 2017)

title: Sterling Vintner's Collection Merlot
Description: Deep ruby colour; cedar, mint, black plum and chocolate aromas; medium bodied with supple fruit and integrated tannins. Hint of sweetness, but well balanced. Good fruit throughout.

title: Yellow Tail Shiraz
Description: From Australia's largest family-owned wine company, a wine that's easy to drink, and easy to understand. It's dry, medium-bodied and softly structured, with aromas and flavours of coffee, floral note, prune, smoke and licorice. The ripe plummy-berry notes lead to a long, spicy finish. Serve with grilled lamb chops.

title: Yellow Tail Merlot
Description: Medium ruby red colour; floral, toasted oak, dark fruit, hony and vanilla aromas and flavours; not quite extra dry, medium bodied, with sweet fruit center and a soft, lush finish.

title: The Wanted Cab Cabernet Sauvignon, Vd'Italia
Description: Made with 100% cabernet sauvignon grapes, the Wanted Cab is an Italian wine with a western swagger. Aromas of spice, cedar, mint and dark fruit fill the nose and lead into spiced dark fruit, cedar and toast notes on the palate. Medium-plus bodied, with soft and flavourful finish. Pair with grilled lamb, beef or chicken.

title: Kim Crawford Pinot Noir
Description: Food-friendly and a super value, this refreshing, cool-climate Pinot Noir from New Zealand offers classic flavours of black cherry and raspberry with earthy notes. Shines with a range of foods, such as pulled pork sandwiches, roasted chicken or salmon ceviche.

title: Inniskillin Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Medium deep ruby; aromas and flavours of prune, flowers, caramel, herbs and spices; dry, medium bodied with good depth of fruit, structured tannins and good length.

title: Farmers Market Rosso Organic, Vd'Italia
Description: This Italian blend offers solid value, along with complexity and harmony. Aromas of toast, floral note and prune lead to more dark fruit and coffee on a long, round finish. A great selection for informal gatherings, and a great companion for pork, lamb and vegetable-based dishes.

title: Umberto Cesari Iove Rosso IGT
Description: Skilful blending combines the best qualities that two grape varieties have to offer. From the meticulously-tended vineyards of Emilia-Romagna comes a blend of sangiovese and merlot with delicious dark fruit, licorice, nuts, toast and berry. A food-friendly companion to pizza, pasta and veal parmigiana.

title: Bodacious Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Blend
Description: Bodacious wines are gaining a following for their bold, yet smooth character. Enjoy floral and candied red berries aromas and flavours, along with notes of toast contributed by bourbon barrel ageing. The palate is smooth and elegant, followed by a lengthy finish. Enjoy with grilled steak or barbecue ribs.

title: Black Cellar Whisky Oak Aged Wine
Description: This wine from Black Cellars is aged in used whisky barrels. Ruby in colour with ripe dark berry fruit and fig aromas and flavours, the whisky oak imparts notes of toast, roasted nuts and vanilla. Medium-bodied and smooth with a lasting finish, this is ideal for a whisky fan to try, and a great match for saucy ribs.

title: Philippe De Rothschild Pinot Noir Pays d'Oc
Description: Ruby red colour; chocolate and ripe red plum aromas; extra dry, light-medium bodied, ripe plummy-cherry flavours with smooth finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Rich & Robust Red VQA
Description: This Jackson-Triggs wine is bursting with aromas and flavours of berry melange, toast, black plum, herbs and a hint of wood spice. It's medium-bodied, extra dry and a perfect pairing for barbecue steak with rosemary roasted potatoes.

title: Labet CdRhone AOC
Description: Pale ruby red colour; caramel, spicy, floral and light bramble and herbs aromas and flavours; extra dry, medium bodied, with soft structure; easy drinking.

title: Penny Lane Red Blend
Description: A soft, easy-drinking Californian red with a personality as bright and as pleasing as its label. Lifted aromas and flavours of spice, watermelon, red pear with ripe berry notes. The palate is soft and smooth with a lush berry fruit finish. This crowd pleasing red is great for any occasion and a fantastic match to bbq fare.

title: Toro Bravo Tempranillo Merlot DO, Valencia
Description: Hailing from Spain, this blend of merlot and tempranillo is an exceptional value. Ruby red in colour, look for alluring aromas and flavours of blackberry, plum, caramel, earth and a hint of black pepper. Medium bodied and smooth, with a long finish, it is ideal for beef tacos or grilled pork chops beside roasted potatoes.

title: Solà Fred 2019
Description: This 100% Carignan is fermented and aged in stainless steel to preserve every inch of its floral and fruit tones and engender a wine of outstanding purity. Look for nuanced ripe black fruit, cherry, herbs and pepper alongside vivid violet tones and an underlying leathery complexity. A wine for grilled sausages or a charcuterie-and-cheese board.

title: Pelee Island Shiraz Cabernet
Description: Deep ruby; berry cocktail and herbal nose with cedar, spice and coffee tones; dry, medium bodied with soft tannins.

title: Jackson-Triggs Shiraz
Description: Deep brick red colour; Rich, upfront plummy, blood orange and blackberry fruit aromas and flavours with notes of chocolate, earth and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied with moderate tannins.

title: Jackson-Triggs Shiraz
Description: Deep brick red colour; Rich, upfront plummy, blood orange and blackberry fruit aromas and flavours with notes of chocolate, earth and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied with moderate tannins.

title: Josh Cellars Merlot
Description: Joseph Carr Winery makes a tier of wines named after his affable father Josh. Josh Merlot, in turn, is inviting and full of character. With aromas and flavours of dark fruit, cedar and spice, a velvety texture, and fine tannins on the finish, this red will complement lamb, meat-based pasta or soft cheeses. Cheers Josh!

title: Alario Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The fruit for this wine is sourced from Chile's Central Valley. A crowd-pleasing, food-friendly red, anticipate appealing upfront aromas and flavours of mixed berries, coffee, spice and herbs. Medium-minus bodied and smooth, it has velvety tannins with a balanced finish. Enjoy with steak and roasted bell pepper sandwiches.

title: Santa Rita Cavanza Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Cabernet sauvignon rules the vineyards of Chile, and this wine hails from one of the most prized regions. Aromas of smoky oak and prune spread, with floral, cassis and coffee notes. The palate is extra dry, with medium body and ripe tannins. Enjoy prune and cassis flavours, and a hint of coffee. Serve with hanger steak.

title: Rioja Vega Edición Limitada Crianza 2017
Description: 83% Tempranillo, 17% Graciano. This is quite restrained and elegant with a lovely liquorice, tobacco, black berry, creamy vanilla and coffee nose and palate. Finishes lengthily.  Score - 90. (Decanter World Wine Awards, 2020)

title: M. Chapoutier Bila-Haut Occultum Lapidem 2017
Description: The 2017 Côtes de Roussillon Villages Latour de France Occultum Lapidem is a step up from the Les Vignes bottling, drawn from just the one commune of Latour de France. A 60-40 blend of Grenache and Syrah, aged mostly in concrete, it offers up bright aromas of cherries and blueberries. It's medium to full-bodied, with a creamy mid-palate and supple tannins, then turns peppery on the long, silky finish. Drink date: 2019-2025. Score - 91-93. (Joe Czerwinski, robertparker.com, April 30, 2019)

title: Santa Carolina Shiraz
Description: Deep red colour; aromas of coffee, black olive, dried fig, smoke and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied, with flavours of coffee, olive, fig and spice; good length.

title: Lykos Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
Description: Deep red colour with aromas of ripe red fruits, sweet spices, chocolate and vanilla. Full and rich bouquet with well structured tannins. Dense, ripe and exuberant with the distinct aromatic aftertaste of a unique mature wine. Pair with grilled meats, game with fruit-based sauces (like plum or quince) and mature yellow cheeses. Enjoy it at 16-18°C.

title: Frisky Beaver Red VQA
Description: This easy drinking, approachable local red blend won gold at the All Canadian Wine Awards. Medium ruby colour. Expect intense aromas of cassis, fresh bread, herbal and toast notes. On the palate, it's medium-bodied, dry yet fruity with a spiced, juicy berry finish. Perfect with good friends and good food.

title: Castillo de Almansa Reserva
Description: Deep ruby colour; aromas of smoky oak and prune reduction with notes of juniper, chocolate and nuts; dry, medium-bodied, with soft balanced acidity, fine tannins and a soft plummy fruit finish.

title: Castelgiocondo Brunello di Montalcino
Description: Montalcino's long growing season creates Brunellos that are luxurious and age-worthy, like this one with flavours of blackberry, raspberry and earth. Decant for two hours and serve with rare steaks or roast leg of lamb, or cellar for up to 10 years.

title: Monte Zovo Sa' Solin Ripasso Valpolicella
Description: Ripasso is all the rage these days. This one is full of cherry, herbs and cranberry all integrated with spicy pepper and meaty notes. The upfront style makes this a very pleasant sipper, and it will also work splendidly with pizza or grilled meats.

title: J. Lohr Seven Oaks Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: There's a reason this Cab is the most popular red in the Vintages Essentials Collection. It's full bodied and packed with black cherry, blackcurrant, cedar, vanilla and spice. Equally at home with a casual steak sandwich or a thick rib-eye steak.

title: Henry Of Pelham Speck Family Reserve Pinot Noir 2016
Description: The top-tier Pinots from the Speck brothers are sourced from the oldest estate vineyards on the Short Hills Bench that were planted in 1988. The warm vintage has given this wine fantastic concentration of dark cherries, cassis, wild raspberry and currants with earthy/brambly notes, violets and elegant oak spices on the nose. It's all about the integrated red and dark fruits, even at this early stage, that are juicy yet poised and polished and meld perfectly with the oak spices. It's all delivered on a bed of silky smooth tannins through a long finish. Lovely Pinot that will be ready to rock when released. Score - 92. (Rick VanSickle, winesinniagara.com, Feb. 1, 2018)
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Mitolo Jester Shiraz
Description: Superstar winemaker Ben Glaetzer isn't clowning around with this opulent Shiraz, a blockbuster with notes of chocolate-cherry, blackberry, coffee bean and a hint of oak. Enjoy with spicy mushroom pasta, chicken wings, ribs or rare roast beef.

title: Two Hands Gnarly Dudes Shiraz
Description: Named for the fierce and twisted-looking old vines from which the grapes are sourced, Gnarly Dudes is a tightly focused wine with intense notes of roasted fruits, plum and blackberry. Big and bold, it's a finely crafted powerhouse Shiraz. Enjoy with grilled steaks.

title: De Luze Bordeaux AOC
Description: Medium ruby colour; medium intensity cedar, toasted oak, vanilla, smoke and black plum aromas; medium bodied, with a tannic grip; flavours of cedar, toast, vanilla and plum with a medium length finish.

title: Jacob's Creek Reserve Shiraz
Description: Opaque dark red; aroma of cassis, with lifted smoky, herbal and coffee bean elements; cassis and floral red and dark fruit flavours with a smoky medium-long finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Shiraz
Description: Soft and generous with upfront black plum and licorice flavours supported by a hint of coffee beans on the finish. Shiraz is a great choice for entertaining; serve with barbecued ribs, smoked brisket, burgers with cheese and mushrooms or a charcuterie platter.

title: Rodney Strong Reserve Pinot Noir 2017
Description: Elegant, floral and fresh, with cherry, baking spice, earth and mineral framed by vanilla, deftly applied oak and a gentle tobacco note. This will be great with smoked salmon, stuffed roasted chicken or prosciutto. (Vintages panel, Jan. 2020)

title: Gnarly Head Old Vine Zinfandel
Description: California's Lodi area is home to some of the oldest vines in California. Gnarled 35 to 80-year-old zinfandel vines produce intense, concentrated fruit flavours. Experience rich, blackberry, fig and dark fruit aromas and flavours, complemented by a hint of licorice. Serve with grilled steak, roast lamb or stuffed mushrooms.

title: Château Argadens Bordeaux Supérieur
Description: The Sichel family of Château Palmer fame has been a part of winemaking in Bordeaux for some six generations. Always a great value, this popular, classically framed blend of Merlot and Cabernet is a great choice for grilled lamb.

title: Pérez Cruz Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This popular Cab consistently over-delivers due to a fabulous price and excellent quality. Elegant and beaming with cassis, black cherry and smoky oak notes. A reliable partner for burgers, blackened chicken or herb-encrusted roasted lamb.

title: Hardys Stamp Series Shiraz Cabernet
Description: Black cherry colour with floral, plumy and vanilla aromas and notes of toasted oak and herbs; medium body, plum and vanilla flavours with a hint of toast in the finish.

title: Alain Corcia- Pommard 2014
Description: Deep colour, dark and red with mauve highlights. Its aromas are redolent of blackberry, bilberry, or gooseberry, cherry pit and ripe plum. Often, wild and feline notes develop with age. It needs to be given time to open up to its fullest extent and to display its mouth-filling texture, its firm but delicate structure, its fruit-filled mouth, and its chewy tannins, which by then will be properly smoothed down.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars was founded in 1970 and is one of Napa Valley's most prestigious producers, rising to international fame at the 1976 Judgement of Paris. The Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon is open-knit and nuanced, with dark fruit, toasted oak, spice, leather and tobacco. A fine addition to any cellar or a tasty pairing for a prime cut of steak.

title: Cakebread Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Cakebreads show their commitment to quality through their years of family teamwork, commitment to sustainability and laser focus on fruit and terroir expression. A certified Napa Green Winery since 2008.

title: Goats do Roam Red
Description: Medium ruby/purple colour with aromas of blackberry, aromatic dark fruit compote, spice and fresh rye bread. Extra dry, smooth with round tannins, medium body and a good finish.

title: La Crema Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Description: Sonoma is renowned for the quality of the Pinot it produces. This one is nuanced and silky with impressive cherry, strawberry, earth and spice aromas and concentrated flavours. A great choice for cedar-planked salmon, or pork dishes.

title: Rocca delle Macìe Chianti Classico
Description: Young by Italian standards, this winery was founded in 1973 - so it's no wonder their take on Chianti Classico is modern. Food-friendly with cherry notes and hints of grilled herbs. It sings with fine fare like meat lasagna, antipasti or veal scaloppini.

title: Trabun Syrah 2017
Description: A very bright syrah from the outset with notes of orange rind, citrus, black pepper and crushed slate. Medium body, very vibrant acidity, a blue-fruited core and mineral dinish. Drink now.

title: Dry River Pinot Noir 2016
Description: The dry, elegant character of Dry River wines is very much apparent in this fruit-forward red. Secondary notes of rose and hay are supported by a tobacco-tinged oakiness, along with a juicy acidity.

title: Hay Shed Hill Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
Description: Medium bodied, this wines shows a vibrant and lively fruit driven palate, with a fleshy middle and soft, mature ripe tannins.

title: Lapa dos Gaivoes 2014
Description: Ripe and juicy with a hint of violet, earthy spice and swathes of blueberry and plum. Bright acidity and fruit make this an ideal Tapas red to be paired with anything from grilled fish to pickled vegetables and beef tartar.
By:: Soc. Ag. Joao T.M. Barbosa + F

title: Teal Lake Shiraz KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Raspberry, blackberry and black pepper. With grilled pepper steak.

title: Tommasi Ripasso Valpolicella Classico Superiore
Description: Elegant and delicious Ripasso is made from Valpolicella, with grape skins from Amarone production added to the process to create a richer wine. Dark cherry, blueberry, mocha, earth and spice. A tasty treat with veal parmigiana, osso buco or beef fajitas.

title: Ruffino Modus 2017
Description: A rich, layered red with lots of plum, chocolate and walnut character. It's full-bodied with chewy yet soft tannins. Flavorful finish. Drink or hold. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, July 1, 2020)

title: Kilikanoon Killerman's Run Shiraz
Description: This Shiraz is Kilikanoon's idea of an entry-level wine. Some introduction! A hedonistic pleasure, it's plush with blackberry jam, cherry and toasted oak. A bold match for barbecued spare ribs, spicy sausage pizza or grilled hanger steaks.

title: Rodney Strong Estate Russian River Valley Pinot Noir
Description: Russian River Valley is among the world's finest areas outside of Burgundy for growing Pinot Noir. This wine is intense, with plum, cherry, beet, smoke and spice flavours. Pair with thick grilled pork chops, rotisserie chicken or grilled tuna steaks.

title: Faustino I Gran Reserva
Description: When it comes to red wines, Rioja is king in Spain. With its distinctive bottle and classic incense, dark fruit and balsamic notes, the Faustino I Gran Reserva is one of the most recognizable, popular wines from this historic region. Try it with a mushroom risotto.

title: Ruffino Romitorio di Santedame Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2016
Description: The 2016 Chianti Classico Gran Selezione Romitorio di Santedame is a full-bodied Sangiovese from the region, blended along with 10% Colorino, that presents rich and nicely concentrated fruit. The bouquet is neatly folded together with tight offerings of black cherry, red blackberry, leather and crème de cassis. Dusty notes of earth or baked brick appear on the close. There's even a sharper note of pencil shaving. Ruffino suggests pairing this with tandoori chicken, which sounds like a great idea. Drink date: 2019-2030. Score - 93. (Monica Larner, robertparker.com, Sept. 19, 2019)

title: Remo Farina Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Description: Few wine styles are as universally beloved as Amarone. Bold, layered, powerfully expressed flavours, great depth and a luxurious, velvety mouthfeel have seen Amarone take its place alongside Barolo and Brunello as an iconic Italian expression. Pair with steak or ribs.

title: Remo Farina Ripasso Valpolicella Classico Superiore 2018
Description: A vibrant, medium-bodied Ripasso with bright dark cherry, pepper, clove and licorice flavours on the palate. A crowd-pleaser and excellent value under $20. Pair with a veal Parmigiano. Drink date: 2020-2026. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, Dec. 15, 2020)

title: Castano Monastrell Tinto
Description: This family-owned winery is known for making top quality wines, like this one which is made with the monastrell grape. Medium ruby in colour, with lovely upfront aromas and flavours of prune, honey, dried fig and licorice. Medium-bodied and smooth, with a long finish and silky tannins, this is great for grilled flank steak.

title: CEF Cabernet 2015
Description: This velvety, deeply coloured red is created by a Portuguese winery that's nearly a century old. It has a hint of balsamic on top of the rich, jammy aromas, making it a wonderful wine to pair with beef tenderloin or Asian barbecue dishes.

title: Lindeman's Shiraz
Description: Highly drinkable and crowd pleasing shiraz from the respected Lindeman's winery of Australia. Exhibits forward blackberry, currant, vanilla and spice. The palate is rich and rounded with a sweet dark fruit centre and soft rounded tannins. Now available in an easy to serve can. Great on its own or paired with most bbq fare.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A crowd-pleasing cabernet sauvignon made with both international and Canadian grapes. Medium ruby, with aromas and flavours of black plum, berry compote, chocolate, toasted oak and spice. It is is extra dry, medium bodied and smooth with juicy plum-berry and spice on the finish. Serve with homemade burgers or cheddar.

title: Il Palagio Message in a Bottle 2018
Description: This winery is owned by Sting and Trudie Styler. The wine itself is a blend of Sangiovese with Syrah and Merlot and spent 12 months maturing in French oak barrels. It's modern and fruit-driven, with lusciously ripe strawberry notes and a velvety texture. Pair with eggplant lasagna. (Vintages panel, Feb. 2020)

title: Esk Valley Gimblett Gravels Merlot/Cabernet Sauvignon/Malbec 2017
Description: The blend here is 58% Merlot, 26% Cab and 11% Malbec, and the wine spent 12 months in French oak barriques. Plenty of ripe red and black fruit is joined by spice, forest floor and vanilla notes. Elegant, with impressive structure. This will be a winner with steaks. (Vintages panel, Oct. 2018)

title: Abad Dom Bueno Mencía 2017
Description: This is certainly a big wine with plenty of oak, but the dark cherries and elderberries draw you in. Dense and very structured, but with good freshness and spice character. Full-bodied and robust on the finish. Drink in 2023. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, July 26, 2019)

title: Gabriel Meffre Laurus Côtes du Rhône-Villages 2017
Description: A blend of 75% Grenache, 20% Syrah and 5% Mourvèdre, the 2017 Cotes du Rhone Villages Laurus was still aging in its special barrels, where 60% of it will stay for a full 18 months prior to blending and bottling. It offers some resiny garrigue notes of rosemary and pine but also lovely cherry and blueberry fruit. It's medium to full-bodied but silky and agile, with an elegant finish. Drink date: 2018-2022. Score - 88-91. (Joe Czerwinski, robertparker.com, Nov. 30, 2018)

title: Naked Grape Unoaked Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This offering from the popular producer is a food-friendly cabernet sauvignon. Expect lovely aromas and flavours of prune, licorice, chocolate, cedar and a hint of rye bread. Medium-bodied and fruity, with a soft, silky finish, this perfect for grilled burgers and chips or pizza.

title: Kew Vineyards Pinot Noir 2016
Description: This is a solid, balanced and complex pinot from a good vintage, now showing complexity with classic red cherry/cranberry jam fruit nicely etched with florals, herbs, wood smoke and spice. It is medium weight, finely balanced with easy tannin. A touch sour. The focus and length are excellent. Score - 91. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, Nov. 9, 2020)

title: 12 Linajes Reserva Tempranillo 2014
Description: Ripe, smooth blackberry and tobacco aromas are chocolaty and subtle. Full allotments of black fruits, tannins and acidity play well together, while this tastes of blackberry, black cherry and baking spice. To back it all up, a rock-solid finish with notes of lemony oak, vanilla and tobacco is on point. Drink through 2028. Editors' Choice. Score - 93. (Michael Schachner, Wine Enthusiast, May 1, 2019)

title: Viña Tarapacá Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A bold wine with notes of dark fruit, chocolate and spice with light hints of smoke and prune. A lively, juicy wine of good structure with bold, ripe tannins. Pair with wide range of red meats, burgers or tomato based pasta dishes.

title: Wits End Luna Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Description: Offering classic varietal purity with gorgeous fruit power, the wine shows cassis, dark cherry, cedar and subtle spice aromas on the nose with a hint of dried herb complexity. It's wonderfully weighted and supple on the palate, displaying excellent fruit intensity backed by fine chalky tannins, finishing long and flavoursome. At its best: now to 2029.  Score - 93. (Sam Kim, wineorbit.co.nz, Aug. 2020)

title: Shingleback Davey Estate Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Description: This wine reflects the structure, depth and ageability so prized in McLaren Cabernet. The impressive dark fruit, blackcurrant, savoury herbs and refined tannins here are further hallmarks of this region's cool ocean influence. A wine for steak or lamb, this will reward 10+ years of patience.

title: Gaia Estate 2016
Description: Unfiltered, unfined. This wine has a deep red-black colour, complex and intense aromatic profile with elements of fruit, wood, vanilla and carnation. Deeply flavourful with notes of both red and black fruits, and virtually perfect in how the fruit is balanced by tannin and wood. Mouth-filling, volume, body, structure and flavour complement the character of this unusual Nemea.

title: Pelee Island Lola Merlot VQA
Description: A wine crafted for casual get-togethers. The wine has aromas and flavours of cedar, flowers, plum, licorice and caramel. On the palate, this is medium bodied and soft with balanced acidity and long, smooth finish. Pair with white meats, a lightly spiced vegan curry, burgers or a savory oven roast veal or beef.

title: Chateau des Places Graves Passover 2017
Description: Dark red colour with fuchsia highlights. Intense nose that develops notes of red fruit (currant and blackberry). Soft notes of roasted toast. The tannins are good and fine, full bodied. Well balanced with a touch of wood. Nice bottle full of charm and high aging potential.

title: The Crusher Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Crusher is a joint venture between two established California wine families - Sebastiani and Wilson. Its rich fruit concentration delivers aromas and flavours of cassis, dark plum, spice and blood orange. Pair this medium-plus bodied, smooth cabernet with grilled chicken tacos, barbecued steak or grilled porcini burgers.

title: Recrue des Sens Tête de Ponts 2015
Description: The Tête des Ponts has a beautiful bright ruby red hue with incredible and lively fresh red fruit aromas. The palate is round with vibrant fruit notes, notably blackcurrant, cherry, and strawberry. The tannins are smooth and silky giving this Pinot Noir a beautiful finish.

title: Azania Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot Organic 2018
Description: Some dark fruit aromas on the nose, as well as cherry and strawberry. The palate is soft, round and perfectly balanced, with a smooth juicy finish.

title: Azania Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot Shiraz 2018
Description: A complex, very well structured blend. Aromas of plum, blackcurrant and cherry, and underlined tones of spice. The palate is layered with fresh fruit and silky ripe tannins. A very attractive palate with a rich, smooth finish.

title: Beaulieu Vineyards Coastal Estates Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This bold cabernet sauvignon expresses blackberry, black cherry, and toasty oak on the nose. The palate offers vanilla and spice notes. It is full-bodied and smooth with silky tannins, capped by a long-lasting finish. The perfect pairing for peppered steak alongside a double-baked potato and sautéed mushrooms with peppers.

title: Bodacious Smooth Red
Description: Medium ruby in colour; aromas of sweet plum, nutella, blood orange, and candied berries; medium-sweet with the same flavours as on the nose.

title: Magnotta Pinot Noir Venture Series VQA
Description: Sales of this wine support Canada's first Lyme Disease research lab at the University of Guelph. Shows savoury notes of cherry, strawberry, nuts and vanilla with hints of toast, earth and spice. Serve lightly cool as a match to grilled salmon, roast rack of Ontario lamb, game, pork and most mushroom-based dishes.

title: Château Des Charmes Atelier Red Estate Grown and Bottled VQA
Description: An unoaked blend of pinot noir, gamay, cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and merlot. Shows upfront aromas and flavours of rye bread, red cherry, strawberry and currant with coffee and herbs. Dry, medium-plus bodied palate with medium acidity and zesty, red berry finish. Great with white meats or tomato-based pasta dishes.

title: Bieler Born to Run Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
Description: Charles Bieler sources the Cabernet for this unique wine from vineyards in Lodi, California; and Columbia Valley, Washington; bringing together the best of both. The result is generous and vibrant, with notable blackberry, cassis and cocoa flavours framed by deftly applied oak. This wine is all about balance and structure and has the breadth for casual meals (such as burgers) or formal lamb dishes. (Vintages panel, Nov. 2019)

title: 35° South Red Blend Organic
Description: This wine is characterized by the softness and delicacy of its tannins. Notes of black and red fruit stand out with spice, walnut and chocolate elements, opening way to a long and pleasant finish. Ideal with red meats like lamb and beef or with pasta dishes.

title: Feteasca Neagra Eticheta Galbena Cotnari DOC
Description: Feteasca Neagra, a red grape native to Romania, lends itself to several styles: rosé, sweet and fruity and full-bodied with oak ageing. This wine is medium sweet with subtle plum, strawberry/cherry and rye bread aromas, followed by fresh sweet berry flavours with a light berry-infused finish. Pair with berry cheesecake.

title: Mura Rossa 2010
Description: Dark ruby colour in colour with an excellent and complex structure. The blackberry flavour leaves a spicy and durable taste on the palate that is totally unique.
By:: G. Tsimpidis And Co. Monemvasia Win

title: Cavalieri Lazaridis Red 2014
Description: Deep purple in colour with intense aromas of red berries, chocolate, cedar and nuts with some hints of herbs. A full body wine with interesting fatty acidity and soft tannins. In the mouth you find the same aromas with a more fruity character. It has long, massy and complex finish.

title: Kastropolitia Red
Description: Light ruby in colour with cherry, nuts, and coffee on the nose. The palate displays soft tannins, a medium body and an elegant finish.
By:: G. Tsimpidis And Co. Monemvasia Win

title: Sterling Platinum Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Description: Extremely perfumed with crushed raspberries and plums. Some roses and other flowers. Full-bodied, round and rich. Opulent, yet fresh and delicious. Drink or hold. Score - 94. (jamessuckling.com, Feb. 14, 2020)

title: Tommasi Rafaèl Valpolicella Classico Superiore 2017
Description: Dried redcurrants and strawberries meet fragrant tea leaves and mooncake character. Medium body with a beautiful sweet-and-sour character and a tangy finish with a touch of dried fruit. Drink now. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, Nov. 7, 2019)

title: Maison Corcia Robardelles 2011
Description: Volnay, admired for its delicacy, its sap, and its bouquet, has always been thought of as the most feminine of Bourgogne wines. The attack is fresh, the finish is warm. Drinking this wine, one seems to bite into a fresh fruit and breath in its heady aroma. Nice pairing with feathered game, stewed or slowly braised, or simply roasted.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Chermont Tonnerre 2017
Description: 2017 vintage in Southern Rhône was one of the earliest harvests on record. The quality of the vintage is generally being reported as excellent but very low quantity. A wine that is precise, straight, fleshy, with a strong tannic imprint.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Potinet Ampeau Riotte 2016
Description: Domaine Potinet Ampeau is located in the village of Monthelie surrounded by Meursault and Volnay. Monthelie is one of the great bargains in Burgundy. The best terroir of this appellation are the 1er cru that are clustered on the border with Volnay. This undiscovered gem is dense, generous, full of fruit with a good structure.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Domaine de la Cendrillon Inédite Corbières 2015
Description: ***LATE ARRIVAL. PRODUCT NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE.***The foudre-aged 2015 Corbières Inedite is a notch less concentrated and ripe than the impressive No. 1. The garrigue here comes across as slightly green and resiny, nicely complementing the mixed berry fruit. The wine is medium to full-bodied, with decent length and a finish dominated by menthol and rosemary notes. Score - 89. (Joe Czerwinski, robertparker.com, April 27, 2018)

title: Gato Negro Pinot Noir
Description: Pounce on this approachable pinot noir from Chile. Ruby in colour with inviting aromas and flavours of cherry, dark bread, beetroot with floral and citrus notes. Medium-bodied and fruity with lively acidity and a silky finish. Enjoy with pork tenderloin alongside root vegetables, roasted turkey or mild cheeses.

title: Gato Negro Cabernet Merlot
Description: This blend has an intense ruby-red colour with purple hues. Lifted aromas of spices and dark fruit melded with mushroom and herbal notes. Smooth finishing sensation with excellent persistence. Excellent paired with grilled red meats and all types of cheeses and hams.

title: Naoussa Chrisohoou PDO 2016
Description: Cherry, cigar-box and savoury meat aromas start this sultry red. On the palate, olives, tomato and dried currant flavours are poised by a brisk minerality. This needs food for optimal enjoyment: think grilled beef, pizza or robust cheeses.

title: Dryades Dry Red 2013
Description: Deep ruby with brick red nuances. The aromas of dried fruits such as cranberries, blueberries, dry figs are accompanied with notes of sweet red pepper and oaky aromas. Rich with gentle tannins and balanced acidity. The aromas of fruits are abundant in the mouth, while the sweet spices and white pepper supplement its aromatic profile. It has a long aftertaste with notes of dark chocolate and vanilla.

title: The Mira Merlot 2015
Description: The nose is all creamy with delicate strawberry, fresh cassis and underlying nuances of lavender and cedar wood. Rich and lush in the mouth with generous flavours of exotic dark berries. Elegant and refined with silky smooth tannins. The finish is long and intense with deep red cherry and a lovely savoury character.
By:: Uva Mira Vineyards Pty Ltd Trading

title: Couteiro Mor Reserva 2013
Description: Made with Alicante Bouschet, Aragonez & Petit Verdot, this wine shows blackcurrant and wild berry aromas with chili paste and chocolate notes. Soft in the mouth, with complexity and a long finish.

title: Corazon del Sol Soleado Bordeaux Blend 2013
Description: From 6 acres of Bordeaux varieties planted in 2008 & 2009 that reflects the unique high-elevation terroir of Los Chacayes. On the nose you will find aromas of cacao, plums, violets and black currants. On the palate, fresh raspberry, currants, black cherry and cassis. Drink or hold.

title: The Audacity of Thomas G. Bright Merlot Cabernet VQA
Description: In 1874, Thomas G. Bright dared to dream that a Niagara winery could flourish and grow. Arterra Wines honours their pioneer with this full-bodied merlot/ cabernet blend.  It shows upfront aromas and flavours of caramel, prune and dark chocolate with a long, dry finish. Enjoy with beef and bacon sliders or stuffed peppers.

title: Viña Maipo Carmenere Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The carménère grape flourishes in Chile's climate and has become their national grape. With aromas of spice and bell pepper followed by flavours of plum, blueberry and cocoa, this medium-bodied beauty can claim Chile's signature wine status. Supple and spicy, pair with pasta, soft cheeses, mushroom burgers or barbecue fare.

title: Casa Velha Reserva Tinto 2016
Description: Clear and with an intense ruby colour, it presents a good complexity, making the floral aromas, the red fruits and spices stand out. It's a buttery and structured wine with good acidity which gives it balance and harmony.

title: Big Bill Shiraz
Description: This vibrant Shiraz shows prominent fruit sweetness with aromas of red fruit, cedar, cassis, caramel and herbs. These reappear on a extra dry, medium-bodied juicy mid-palate with a well-integrated tannin structure and a long enduring finish. Pair with grilled red meats.

title: La Braccesca Vino Nobile di Montepulciano 2017
Description: A 2017 Vino Nobile that shows tension and focus with blackberry, blueberry and hazelnut undertones. It's full-bodied with lovely, fine and chewy tannins and a delicious finish. Drink now or hold. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, Aug. 24, 2020)

title: Ripiddu Etna Rosso DOC 2017
Description: Light bodied with a bright red cherry hue, this wine shows aromas of ripe cherries, cranberries and red currants followed by subtle notes of wet saddle leather and cinnamon. On the palate the wine matches the aromas. The wine has high acidity, firm tannins and a long finish. Pairs well with cured meats, spicy sausages or aged cheese.

title: Errázuriz Aconcagua Alto Carmenère 2018
Description: This is from a selection of vineyards in the Panquehue zone toward the interior of the Aconcagua Valley, the traditional zone for Errázuriz. Aged in barrels for 14 months, this carménère reflects a very good year in the valley. The aromas are red and smell of intensely fresh red fruits accompanied by herbal tones in a body that's smooth and friendly, but that also has piercing, polished tannins and enough force to anchor it on the palate and lend a solid sensation of structure. Score - 94. (Patricio Tapia, guiadescorchados.cl, 2020)

title: Fishbone Premium Black Label 2017
Description: Crimson red rim with dark fruits. Dry medium to full bodied with rich fleshy dark fruits layered with dark chocolate. The wine has tannin support and solid structure. Drink over next 10 years.

title: Fishbone Merlot 2018
Description: Deep youthful red core with pale purple rim and aromas of clean mulberry fruit with some vanilla complexity. Ripe dark berry fruits flow through palate to a long finish. Soft tannin and acid structure gives the wine a very approachable nature. Solid for up to 8 years in the bottle.

title: Kamara Nimbus Russus Red 2016
Description: This is a blend of 40% Xinomavro, 30% Merlot, and 30% Syrah from the slopes of Oraiokastro, Thessaloniki. Expect lots of dark fruits, with hints of eucalyptus, olives, and pepper. It's round and smooth, with enough acid and tannin to cellar for the short term. The wine is aged in aged oak barrels for twelve months before release.

title: Fishbone Shiraz Cabernet 2017
Description: Purple plum rim in colour with fragrant vanilla bean and dark berries on the nose. Dry, intense rich blackberry fruit dominates the palate from start to finish, some attractive oak derived vanilla gives some added texture to mouthfeel. Drink over the next 10 years.

title: Priavino Dolcetto d'Alba 2019
Description: Made by the highly respected Roberto Voerzio, this wine is sourced from vines of approximately 35 years of age. Voerzio insists on low yields; a practice long believed to encourage wines of greater concentration, depth and quality. This one will offer ripe plum tones, with spice, herbs, clove and tobacco notes in a fresh, food-friendly package. Pair with grilled sausages or portobello mushroom burgers.

title: Mileto Joven Red 2018
Description: Dark maroon in colour with ripe fruit, plum, blackberries and licorice aromas over the spicy background of the barrel. Great structure with rounded tannins and a long and persistent mid-palate.

title: Mileto Crianza 2015
Description: Very intense dark cherry red in colour with good fruity intensity, nuances of cherries, strawberries, licorice and woody notes perfectly integrated in the wine. Good entrance in the mouth; structured wine with balanced acidity and a long finish.

title: Bar Dog Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This approachable California cabernet sauvignon is a wonderful companion to a variety of food. Deep ruby in colour with inviting notes of coffee, cedar, berry mix, spice and honey. Medium-bodied and fruity with a long-lasting, silky finish, it is a perfect pairing for a charcuterie board shared among friends.

title: Riverview Cellars Pinot Noir 2017
Description: Niagara-on-the-Lake affords producers with gentle slopes and varied soil types, but above all, they enjoy the influence of Lake Ontario, the Niagara River and the Niagara Escarpment. These bodies of water play significant roles in moderating and defining the climate here. This Pinot has a wealth of cherry, beetroot and herbal tones in a soft, silky package. Pair with grilled chicken. (Vintages panel, Sept. 2019)

title: Il Palagio Le Bambole Chianti Classico Gran Selezione 2012
Description: Clean yet rustic, with leather and cigar box aromas. On the palate the wine is very polished and super-sleek. Lots of red forest fruits flow into an intense body. Great personality , and a long aftertaste. Andrea Briccarello.
By:: Az. Agr. Il Palagio Di Piccini Moni

title: Quinto Merlot 2016
Description: With an intense red ruby colour the aromas are of fresh summer fruit -- clear notes of blueberries and black currants with hints of vanilla and coffee. The mouthfeel is crisp and lively with an elegant structure and finish. Crisp acidity and focused tannins make this a pleasing wine that is perfect with all proteins and cheese.
By:: Fattoria Di San Quintino Di Cecchi

title: Castillo De Monseran Mal De Ojo
Description: This eye-catching red from Spain consists of garnacha, tempranillo and carignan grapes. Deep ruby in colour with captivating lifted notes of prune, toasty oak, wild honey and spices. A mouth-coating medium-bodied, smooth palate perfect for barbecued flank steak alongside grilled root vegetables.

title: District 7 Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Description: Dry; soft tannins; relaxed acidity (3.76 pH). Soft, juicy, delicious, but retains cab boldness. Medium-full body. Nice dark-fruit lingering finish; 100% cabernet sauvignon. Grapes sorted, crushed, fermented in small lots. Gentle handling, minimal intervention allows the estate fruit to make the flavor statement. Finished 10 months in French, American, and Hungarian oak, 30% new. (gusclemens.com, Oct. 28, 2020)

title: J. Denuzière Crozes-Hermitage 2018
Description: What should be a good value, the 2018 Crozes-Hermitage J. Denuzière has a classic, medium-bodied, ripe, meaty style that just screams of the Northern Rhône. Deep purple and loaded with blue fruits and floral notes, it's a peppery, exotic, solid effort to enjoy over the coming 7-8 years. Maturity: 2020-2028. Score - 90. (Jeb Dunnuck, jebdunnuck.com, Nov. 19, 2020)

title: Nostos Blend Red 2016
Description: Dense ruby colour with purple notes. Light aromas of leather and intense notes of ripe black fruits in excellent balance with the oak. Full-bodied, ripe tannins and good acidity. Long finish. Best served with roasted rack of lamb or red meats.

title: Barefoot Merlot
Description: A consistently good, award-winning merlot from California. Valued priced and made in a crowd-pleasing style. Ruby red in colour, the nose reveals upfront toast, prune and cassis aromas with notes of spiced chocolate. Dry, light to medium-bodied and rounded, with balanced silky tannins on the long lively berry fruit finish.

title: Sand Point Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Twin brothers Brad and Randall Lange are fourth generation California winegrape farmers. Their commitment to the environment is embodied in expressive, well-made wines. This Cabernet offers upfront plum, candied berries and cassis, supported by a smooth texture and a spicy oak note. Pour with grilled lamb or aged cheeses.

title: Pujanza Finca Valdepoleo 2016
Description: This large single vineyard, whose 16 hectares are divided into seven different parcels for winemaking purposes, is located at 630 metres. Made from 100% Tempranillo, the resulting wine is fresh, focused and serious, showing brightness and tension on the palate. Drink date: 2021-2030. Score - 94. (Tim Atkin, MW, timatkin.com, Rioja Special Report 2019)

title: Three Thieves Pinot Noir
Description: A fantastic pinot noir from California. Aged in French and American oak. Expect floral notes then toast, fresh mushrooms and red plum jam. Soft, silky, light to medium-bodied fruity palate with a long, balanced finish. Try with grilled salmon over a bed of rice or chill slightly and enjoy with chicken salad.

title: Da Dina Aguiar Red Reserva 2011
Description: With Touriga Franca, Touriga Nacional and Tinta Roriz, one can find a red wine with very high presence, depth, quality fruit, bush notes, and softly smoked.

title: L'Heritage de Chasses Spleen 2016
Description: Second wine of reputable Haut Medoc Chasse Spleen. It offers classic medium plus flavours of vanilla, oak, ripe cherries, liquorice, sweet spices, cloves and a hint of soap. On the palate medium plus acidity and alcohol and grippy tannins which indicate the wine is still a bit young.

title: Fleur de Pedesclaux 2014
Description: Blossoming as soon as it is opened. With its richer concentration in merlot, this wine offers a softer, lighter touch with a warm and silky texture. Its fruity aromas are intense, crisp and pleasing on the palate.

title: Ruche DOCG Laccento 2017
Description: Intense ruby red with slight purple sections in youth, turning garnet after a few years in the bottle. Intense, persistent, slightly aromatic and fruity.

title: Da Dina Aguiar Grande Reserva Red 2012
Description: Highly complex aroma with notes of ripe fruit, some floral, balsamic and spices.

title: The Black Shiraz
Description: A bold Aussie shiraz with striking package design, this red will grace many dinner tables. Sourced from South Eastern Australia, it shows upfront aromas of cassis, juniper, smoke and citrus that continue to intense cassis, smoke and blood orange flavours and a long, structured finish. Pair with steak and roasted vegetables.

title: The Magic Box Amazing Cabernet
Description: Step into a world of wonder featuring this Amazing Cabernet Sauvignon- that would be South Australia. Marvel at the wine's powerful aromas and flavours of prune, candied fruit, smoke and cloves that have a long, ripe finish. Enjoy it with rack of lamb, gourmet burgers or gorgonzola cheese.

title: Brittan Vineyards Basalt Block Pinot Noir 2015
Description: Brittan's wines may seem a bit austere when first opened, which is no fault in this instance. The 2015s are a touch richer and fuller than the previous vintage, yet retain the laser focus on terroir, and specifically the basalt-driven minerality of this estate. Here are raspberries galore, with pinpoint definition. Drink now-2030 and perhaps beyond. Cellar Selection. Score - 94. (Paul Gregutt, Wine Enthusiast, Dec. 1, 2018)

title: El Gringo Dark Red Tempranillo
Description: El Gringo, a Western movie extra working in Castilla, so loved the local wines that he never went home! This wine has alluring aromas and flavours of lifted smoky oak, toast, black plum and vanilla with hints of milk chocolate. Medium-bodied with a long, velvety finish, pair it with burritos, cured Spanish ham or lasagna.

title: Unwined Smooth Red
Description: This exciting new brand from Colio is a crowd-pleaser. It offers simplicity and great taste that is easy to understand and enjoy. A ripe red with aromas of raspberry jam, red pear and watermelon. The palate is juicy with flavours of dark berries balanced by soft acidity. Enjoy with saucy chicken wings or pizza.

title: Domaine de Beyssac 2012
Description: This lovely Southern French wine charms with its juicy and soft texture. It develops fresh fruit flavors with a good balance, which makes it particularly greedy.

title: La Linda Malbec
Description: Luigi Bosca Winery crafts their La Linda Malbec from grapes sourced from Argentina's high altitude vineyards.  This medium-plus bodied red has aromas of blackberry jam and smoke, flavours of prune and dark chocolate and a silky smooth finish. Partner with a freshly grilled steak, Mexican molé dishes or lamb rogan josh.

title: Kir Yianni Ramnista 2016
Description: Made from 100% Xinomavro, Ramnista is ripe, rich, complex and intense. This wine has found its balance at elevated acidity and alcohol levels with robust tannins that create a long finish. Its concentrated bouquet of red fruit and pralines when young, evolves into hints of sundried tomato, black olive, truffle and sandalwood. A perfect match to lamb and game. Ramnista can age gracefully up to 15 years.

title: Alandes Paradoux Red
Description: This multi-vintage wine is crafted using all 5 Bordeaux varietals, with a fair sprinkling of Cabernet Franc which Karim believes has huge potential in the region. Powerful yet restrained - a ''clenched fist in a velvet glove''. Extremely refined but with that wallop of pure fruit you expect from the sun-drenched region.

title: Domaine Mercouri 2017
Description: Dense ruby red in colour with notes of faded rose petals, wild herbs, dried red fruits, liquorice, and freshly turned earth with hints of coffee and chocolate mixed with vanilla and cinnamon; dry, medium-bodied and well-structured, silky and balanced with a long finish.

title: Sterling Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This California red is conveniently packaged in a 375 mL aluminum can.  Opaque ruby in colour; inviting upfront aromas of plum, mixed berries, candy and jam. Medium-bodied and flavourful with ripe, noticeable tannins and a long, balanced finish. Serve with seared duck and garlic mash potatoes or cold cut sandwiches.

title: Chateau Changyu Moser XV Grand Vin Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Description: Produced in China's best wine growing region, Ningxia, Chateau Changyu Moser is made from 100% cabernet sauvignon and estate bottled. A unique collaboration between Lenz M. Moser and premier wine producer Changyu, this wine pairs well with a juicy steak, cheeses or a chocolate tart.

title: La Veille des Landes Montagne 2016
Description: Dark purple in colour with notes of dark fruit, spices and minerals. Well-rounded, rich and silky, full of flesh, density and strength. On the whole fresh and juicy, an acid aftertaste which brings power and tonicity, an asserted structure sustained by dense but ripe tannins.

title: Herzog Lineage Choreograph Red Wine Kosher 2017
Description: Herzog Lineage Choreograph is a field blend of 12 grape varieties harvested from Prince Vineyard vines and then fermented and aged into a single unique wine that delivers a kaleidoscope of red and black raspberries, espresso, and dusty nutmeg.

title: Herzog Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon Kosher 2016
Description: Wine exhibits berry, cherry, and licorice aromas and flavours, which are characteristic of this region's wines. Wonderful with roasted turkey, barbecued meats, or pasta dishes.

title: Herzog Lineage Pinot Noir Kosher 2018
Description: Boasts intense aromas of red cherry and chocolate. Soft notes of ripe black cherry and strawberry jam on the palate. A kiss of oak brings out hints of sandalwood and cinnamon to a smooth and lasting finish.

title: Baglio Baiata Alagna Lanni
Description: A soft blend of Nero d'avola, Syrah and Merlot, aged in barrels used to refine liqueur wines, in order to obtain hints of tobacco and cherry. The grapes are harvested late to give the wine more intense hues and fragrances. It is a dark and soft red wine, the wine is not filtered to maintain even more fragrances. The name of Lanni is short, easy to remember and pronounce. It is the contraction of our surname (A-LA-NI-A). It is a blend and a brand that we produce only ourselves and therefore is not comparable on the market. Excellent with any kind of roast and mature cheeses. Serve at 16-18°C. 2018 -5 stars award Vinitaly

title: Ramon Cardova Rioja Kosher 2017
Description: A luxurious example of Spain's famous Rioja wines. Produced from 100% Tempranillo grapes, which are carefully selected from old vines surrounding the town of Haro, La Rioja. With its bright ruby red colour, a nose of ripe wild berries and balsamic aromas, Ramon Cardova is ideal with red meat, fish and soft, light cheeses.

title: Château Camplong Grande Réserve Corbières 2018
Description: Big, plush plum and sweet bramble flavours contrast with a rustic savoury note; rounded and ripe with a fresh finish. Drinking window: 2021-2025. Score - 91. (decanter.com, March 17, 2020)

title: F Red 2014
Description: Purplish red colour of good intensity with aromas of black fruits, spice and floral notes. Faithful to the aromas perceived on the palate, it hints at flavours of cassis and licorice. With refreshing acidity and firm tannins, it has a soft texture that leads into a long finish.

title: F Reserva Red 2014
Description: On the nose, very fresh and intense with notes of black fruit, wild black cherries, liquorice and notes of wood. The palate is very concentrated, hot, with firm tannis and a smooth texture, intense and persistent to the end.

title: Carpasia Bobal DO Utiel-Requena 2016
Description: Dark cherry colour with a cardinal tone. Intense aroma, with the protagonist of ripe black fruits (plums, blueberries), floral nuances (violets) and minerals, with soft toasted notes. The palate is fleshy, medium bodied, fills the palate, fresh, tasty, fruity and persistent.

title: Dragonfly Merlot 2018
Description: Intense ruby red in colour with complex, intense spicy and fruity notes of ripe cherry and raspberry. On the palate, rounded, medium body, with a residual sugar content well balanced by a nice acidity.

title: Jackson-Triggs Cabernet Sauvignon Light
Description: The well-known winery's latest offering is a lower alcohol cabernet sauvignon. Ruby in colour with lifted aromas and flavours of dark fruit, candied berries and a hint of cedar. Light-plus bodied and fruity with a smooth finish, this is perfect for light appetizers or sirloin sliders.

title: BR Reserva Red 2015
Description: Very focused on the black fruit and barrel notes. Robust in the mouth with good freshness, well integrated rough tannins, long finish.

title: Villa Nogueira Red 2017
Description: Made with Touriga Nacional (80%), Pinot Noir (10%) and Syrah (10%) grape varieties with 30% of the blend staged for 6 months in French oak barrels of 2nd and 3rd year use. Has an intense ruby colour and aromas with menthol and balsamic notes, where wild red berries can be found, and slight nuances of oak. Fresh palate, lively acidity, ripe and silky tannins, well integrated into the wine structure.
By:: Romana Vini - Vinhos E Culturas, Ld

title: Ampakama Malbec 2014
Description: This intense wine shows all of the classic Malbec qualities: raspberry and plum aromas and plenty of ripe red cherries. Smooth and fresh, with sweet tannins and a lingering finish, this wine calls out for thin slices of good-quality jamón Ibérico, green olives and wedges of Manchego cheese.

title: Caladessa Red 2016
Description: Dark red in colour with aromas of red berries, prunes and raisins. Ripe, sweet tannins with spice notes.

title: Domaine Trapet Roch- Gevrey Chambertin 2014
Description: Yields are small (average 32 Hectolitres per hectare). As a consequence, wines produced are naturally concentrated and are pleasant to drink even young. This wine offers wild berry and gooseberry on the nose. Ample harmonious taste with good fruit attack and minerality.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Billy Goat Hill Estate Shiraz Cabernet 2017
Description: Rhubarb red to rim in colour, this wine displays red berry fruits with mild cedar and tobacco notes. Off dry, light to medium bodied with silky texture generated by succulent tannins leading to a long very pleasant finish. Drink well to 2024.

title: Mastronardi Estate Merlot 2016
Description: Founded in 2006, the 100-acre Mastronardi vineyard supports over 18 varietals, with Bordeaux reds as a regional specialty. This Merlot is ripe and smoky with black plummy fruit and a touch of spice rounding out the palate. Great for pairing with turkey or meaty stews. (Vintages panel, April 2019)

title: Trementi Bar Veneto IGP Appassimento
Description: From vineyards in Italy's Veneto region, a part of the grapes for this red are slightly dried before fermentation to intensify its flavours. The resulting wine is medium t full-bodied yet elegant with notes of espresso, juniper, smoke, prune and vanilla. The finish lingers. Pair with pasta with meat sauce or firm cheeses.

title: Nadim Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
Description: Full-bodied with flavors of blackcurrants, tobacco leaf, sweet oak and dark plum. This is an elegant and plush cabernet with soft but persistent tannins and great balance. Aged in heavily toasted French oak barrels for 23 months. It is enjoyable right now but will age nicely for years to come.

title: Nadim Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Description: Full-bodied, elegant and complex with flavors of local spices and ripe cherry. Aged in French oak barrels for 10 months, which contributes to its complexity. While ready to be enjoyed, its equilibrated acidity and persistent tannins allow this wine to age effortlessly for years.

title: Nadim Merlot 2015
Description: Well-balanced, medium-bodied and aromatic wine with aromas of fresh herbs, hints of cherry and a background of earth. This wine is aged in French oak barrels for 8 months, contributing to its maturity and elegance.

title: Nadim Syrah 2017
Description: Full-bodied, rich and flavorful wine that exhibits a persistent bouquet of chocolate and blackberry. Aged for 12 months in French oak barrels, this wine displays a lingering and pleasing finish.

title: Mezzacorona Pinot Noir Vigneti delle Dolomiti IGT
Description: Founded in 1904, Mezzacorona cultivates their pinot noir grapes in vineyards at foothills of the Italian Dolomites. Their pinot noir possesses bright red cherry, floral and blood orange fruits with a hint of vanilla. Its medium-bodied, fruity style makes it a great pairing for charcuterie, grilled salmon or roasted chicken.

title: Brumaio Morellino di Scansano 2017
Description: The wine is medium bodied with a deep cherry hue. Aromas of ripe cherry, raspberry and blackberry are dominant on the nose, followed by subtle notes of savoury summer herbs and saddle leather. The wine is very soft on the palate with wonderfully soft, silky tannins that reflect the aromas on the nose. The finish is long and lingering. There is evidence of wood treatment and this is reflected in the freshness of the wine. Pairs well with tomato-based dishes, grilled red meat and medium cheese. Drink 2017-2024

title: Teva Merlot 2018 KP
Description: Red wine to drink while young. This Teva exhibits aromas of red fruit like cherries and blueberries with a little spice. The palate is well balanced, soft and velvety, with a moderately fruity finish that leaves you wanting more.

title: Comuna Shiraz-Malbec
Description: Named after the neighbourhood in Buenos Aires is where the Tango was first performed. A stunning red that dances with your senses, offering aromas and flavours of ripe, red and black berry with notes of plum and spice. The palate is rich and ripe with juicy dark fruit and cedar on the finish. Perfect for casual fare.

title: Victoria Park Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This deeply-coloured wine hails from South Australia, and takes its name from a park honouring Princess Victoria, before she became Queen. Expect the fruit character of warm climate cabernet sauvignon; prune and floral aromas and flavours, with notes of smoke, mint and black olive. Pair with grilled burgers or ribs.

title: Canyon Road Pinot Noir
Description: Canyon Road is based in California's Alexander Valley and is known for well-made wines that express true varietal flavours. This fragrant red expresses varietal aromas of cherries and spice followed by flavours of cherry, spice and a touch of vanilla with a silky, medium-length finish. Enjoy with roasted poultry, or veal.

title: Solid Ground Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Solid Ground wines are easy-to-enjoy and contemporary in style. The Cab is a food-friendly wine that is medium to full bodied with ripe tannins and a lingering finish. Enjoy upfront spice, cedar, herbs and black plum fruit. This is a go-to wine for food pairing versatility. Pair with barbecued meats, game or carne asada.

title: Busto Reserva Red 2016
Description: Ruby colour, intense and elegant aroma, ripe red fruit and notes of the toasted oak barrel. Good volume of mouth, balanced tannins and persistent end.

title: Chianti Classico 2017
Description: This red combines a mix of pungent Tuscan scrub-juniper, rosemary and sage with pure cherry, strawberry earth and tobacco flavours. Shows fine harmony and length.

title: Chianti Classico Riserva Vignalparco 2016
Description: This is bright, polished and forthcoming, with cherry, blackberry and floral aromas and flavours. Shows a firm structural component, with earth accents and dusty tannins lining the finish.

title: Bio Bio Organic Merlot
Description: From Cielo e Terra (Sky and Earth), one of Italy's most innovative cooperatives, a delicious organically-grown merlot that offers upfront cedar and black plum flavours and good value. The wine is balanced, and easy to enjoy with a lively, food-friendly texture. Serve with grilled chicken, pizza or pasta.

title: Bordón Gran Reserva 2011
Description: Sourced from three areas within Rioja that each feature a different soil type, this wine is generous, complex and spicy, with cherry, vanilla and smoke. It will be ideal for rack of lamb but will continue to evolve for at least another decade.

title: CREW Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Description: LENS has a warm growing season, and the area's advantageous combination of the shallow waters of Lake Erie and its southerly position allows grapes ample opportunity to achieve full ripeness. This Cabernet is savoury and ripe, with redcurrant, plum, spice box and smoke, and will be great with lamb burgers or steak.  (Vintages panel, April 2019)

title: Callia Alta Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This offers terrific value, in an easy-drinking and uncomplicated cabernet sauvignon. Expect upfront aromas and flavours of blackberry preserve, vanilla and cedar. The palate is ripe and rounded with soft tannins and notes of berry jam, cedar and vanilla on the finish.  Match to a good burger or saucy lasagna.

title: Pharaoh Moans Syrah West Paso Robles 2017
Description: This boasts serious depth and power. A big, large-scaled wine, it fleshes out in the glass nicely. Black fruit, menthol and spices meld into crushed rocks and leather. The style is ripe and a bit bombastic, but holds its own and should still have plenty of aging potential.

title: Stina Plavac Mali Majstor 2016
Description: Translated into English, Plavac Mali means 'little blue' due to the size and colour of its grape. However, the taste of Plavac Mali is anything but small. On the nose, this bold deep red, Bordeaux colour wine, is comprised of dry fig, spice, and blackberry notes. Full-bodied and concentrated, the mouth is filling with cherries, ripe sour cherries, and plums with notes of Mediterranean spices and resin. The finish is long and lingering. This wine has a strong potential for aging.
By:: Jako Vino D.O.O. Operating As Stina

title: Vidal Reserve Syrah 2018
Description: Fragrant spice, dark red berry and floral notes combine on a balanced and textured palate. Pair with venison, beef and hard cheeses.

title: Jeannot Santenay "Clos de la Comme Dessus" 2017
Description: Hand-picked and fully destemmed. Aged for 14 months in French oak barrels. This is a rich and supple wine thanks to its long aging in French oak barrels. It reveals fresh fruit notes, and offers an impressive tension and minerality in the mouth.

title: Fish Hoek Shiraz
Description: Clear garnet red colour; floral, blackberry, smoke and chocolate with a touch of spice aromas; dry, medium body; ripe fruit flavour with a touch of chocolate and spice, ripe tannins to finish.

title: Papagiannakos Erythros 2016
Description: Purple in colour, balanced and round with aromas of vanilla and red fruit. Pair with meat and all yellow cheeses.

title: Temptation Merlot Sterea Ellada 2015
Description: Exquisite Merlot has been matured for 12 months in new oak. It fascinates with the deep purple colour, the aromas of black fruits and spices, the full body and it's rich flavour.

title: Tzivanis Red Selection Arma Chariot 2017
Description: Wine with bright purple colour. Fragrances of red fruits such as raspberry and apple that blend harmoniously with the distinctive hints of the French oak.

title: Domaine Germain Savigny Les Beaune 1er cru Rouge 2017
Description: 50 years old vines. This wine is aged for 12 months in French oak barrel (20% new oak). This plot is located south of Savigny, close to Beaune appellation, a sunny area that gives full body wines. Dense and rich in the mouth, this wine will be enjoyed with viande en sauce or a magret de canard after a few years.

title: Les Perrottes Rouge 2016
Description: Clear colour; garnet tinted. Nice complexity after aeration. Notes of camphor, leather, smoke, fresh dark fruits and mocha. The mouth is wide, full and well structured. Beautiful length. Ideal for winter dinners. Ageing capacity 5-7 years.

title: King of Hearts Red 2018
Description: A wonderful wine with ruby colour and purple shades, coming from two exceptional varieties, the cosmopolitan Merlot and the Greek Xinomavro. Its bouquet is a combination of red fruit like cherry, raspberry and plum perfectly balanced with the herbal character and hints of tomato.

title: Cinco Sentidos Cabernet Sauvignon Reserva 2017
Description: Intense ruby red colour. You can feel the complex fruity aroma. Black cherries, raspberries, blackberries and a few touches of tobacco. Well-structured tannins due to ageing in oak barrels. It has a long aftertaste.

title: Macanita Touriga National Cima Corgo 2017
Description: The Sub-region of Cima Corgo is characterized by a less continental, cooler climate than the Douro Superior, giving rise to a fresher, more floral style of Touriga Nacional. Still, this is a full bodied wine, with lots of fruit character and persistent flavour.

title: Convento San Francisco Special Selection Reserva 2014
Description: With some more meat than the regular, the 2014 Selección Especial was produced with a selection of old vines with longer élevage. It has good freshness and round tannins with a commercial and approachable style. Drink date: 2018-2022. Score - 91. (Luis Gutiérrez, robertparker.com, Aug. 31, 2018)

title: Saints Hills Sv Roko South Dalmatia 2016
Description: Ruby red with purple nuances. Aromas of ripe tree fruit and berries, followed by plum, fig and blackberry. Also very intensive aromas of thyme and oregano, bourbon vanilla, finishing with woody aromas and leather. Full bodied, layered texture dominated by plums and figs, and mediterannean herbs. Well balanced, long finish.

title: Niepoort Conciso Tinto Dao 2015
Description: 92 Wine Advocate '...a blend of Baga (40%), Jaen (30%) and various others (30%), aged for 20 months in used 2,000-liter fuders. This is a classic Dão, fresh, flavorful and elegant in this vintage. Showing fine tension and moderate tannins on the finish, this finishes with plums and cherries, dry and focused.'

title: Couteiro Mor Red 2018
Description: Very intense red fruits aroma and some floral notes. Very round in mouth with soft tannins and licorice finish.

title: Alfacinha VT IGP LX Reserva 2018
Description: Ideal to accompany grilled red meat dishes, strong game dishes and cheeses with intense flavour.

title: Channing Daughters Rosso Fresco 2018
Description: Rosso Fresco is an easy-going red blend whose varieties and proportions change with each vintage. It is comprised of 64% Merlot, 26% Cabernet Franc, 6% Blaufrankisch and 4% Dornfelder. There are beautiful high-toned aromas and flavours of red cherry, red raspberry, red plum, red currant, spice and earth. This dry red wine is medium bodied, has moderate (12%) alcohol, balanced acid, very soft, silky tannins and a juicy persistent finish. Rosso Fresco is a playful, full-flavoured, fun, friendly red wine that pairs well with pastas, fish, fowl. Enjoy at cellar temperature over the next two to four years, or put a slight chill on it if it's hot out!

title: Vieni Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Description: This has elegance and refinement throughout, with ripe wild red berry, redcurrant, cassis and dark raspberry fruit supported by touches of tobacco and nutmeg. Approachable and quite smooth, with a hint of sweetness from the ripe fruit. Pair this with steak or grilled ribs. (Vintages panel, April 2019)

title: Terra Leone Ammos 2016
Description: This Agiorgitiko has a deep, dark and thick colour with an intense fruity nose of cherries, forest fruits and baked raisins. All this in balance with the characters of vanilla, dried fruits and chocolate coming from the long aging process in the oak barrels. Thick and aggressive tannins that require time to mellow. Indisputably, a wine that loves bottle and demands aging in cellar to reveal its merits.

title: Anemos Red 2018
Description: A deep-coloured purple wine with intense fruity and clean aromas and the dominated flavours of cherries, strawberries and gooseberries. The silky mouth feel and the grape juice aftertaste give the impression that you are tasting grapes from the vineyard during September.

title: Iri da Iri Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico 2013
Description: This is a new wine from Valle dell'Acate. The 2013 Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico Iri da Iri opens to a medium build but definitely shows more density and concentration, if you were to compare this wine to your standard Cerasuolo di Vittoria. The blend is 60% Nero d'Avola and 40% Frappato, and the wine ages in tonneaux for 36 months. You get a more intense aromatic offering with dark fruit, black cherry and sweet tobacco. The idea behind Iri da Iri is to push the quality boundaries of Cerasuolo di Vittoria to offer a more complex and age-worthy expression in what is often considered a quick-drinking red wine category. This appellation is the only DOCG denomination in Sicily, and Valle dell'Acate wanted to prove its worth. They have done a great job. Drink date: 2018-2024. Score - 92+. (Monica Larner, robertparker.com, Dec. 28, 2018)

title: Boundary Breaks Cabernet Franc 2018
Description: We employ vineyard techniques that seek to achieve small berry size which yields sufficient colour and structure, while exhibiting lots of fruit in the finished wine. These specific vineyard practices enable us to produce uncommonly ripe fruit in a cool climate, which yields structured, full-bodied wine. The resulting Cabernet Franc from 2018 is very lively with high acid and balance.

title: Vinciguerra I Colli di Conegliano 2013
Description: Its ruby red, deep yet with subtle garnet, announces dense, pulpy fruit, which promptly appears on the nose, in the guise of wild dark berry and dried plum. In the mouth, supple tannins contribute to the balance, resulting in a wine of smooth, delicious drinkability, while its progression and length only heighten its refreshing crispness and harmonious proportions. Its pairs perfectly with grilled meats, and with roast kid and lamb, where the acidity and tannins of the wine are a delicious foil to the herbs and sauce, but its marriage with medium-aged cheeses is a handsome one as well.

title: Collalto Cabernet Piave DOC 2017
Description: Its appearance offers the first evidence: a youthful, heady ruby red, luminous and full-volumed, which characteristically trends to garnet with age. The nose immediately releases the expected herbaceousness, judicious and kept in check by the overall structure, followed by crisp raspberry and an unusual impression of sweet violets. The palate is dry, with good breadth and superb balance; the tannins amalgamate effortlessly with the alcohol and glycerine, while the acidity is equally well integrated into the aromatic properties. It concludes with a finish laced with the same aromatic complex encountered on the nose. This is the classic wine to partner with grilled meats, its rounded, well-calibrated fruit the perfect foil to the meat's pungent juices; it is just as delicious with meat ragus and medium-aged cheeses

title: Wildbacher Colli Trevigiani IGP 2016
Description: A native grape for Collalto. The wine appears a dark ruby red, with impressive depth, yet displaying a luminous vibrance. On the nose, its youthful burr is obvious, with contrasting impressions of ripe wild blackberry, macerated tobacco, and grassy interleavings of fresh hay and herbs, a complex that underscores its thoroughly husky, countryish charactacter. On the palate, the fleshy pulp of the fruit, every strand easily recognisable as that encountered on the nose, registers the impact of sinewy, insistent tannins that are at the same time finely-woven and impressive. Its level of alcohol and tannins make it the perfect partner for a wide range of meat-based dishes; preference goes to slow-cooked preparations with rich or spicy sauces.

title: Bread & Butter Pinot Noir
Description: Based in California's Napa Valley, Bread & Butter makes easy-going and approachable wines for everyday occasions year round. This pinot noir shows generous fruit with notes of oak toast, mixed berries and red plum. Floral and nutty hints grace a long, silky finish. Serve with grilled salmon, duck breast or mushroom risotto.

title: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Rum Barrels Merlot
Description: Wine pioneer Robert Mondavi understood the potential of California's Central Coast as a premier wine region. A portion of this Monterey County merlot is aged in rum barrels, contributing chocolate, rich vanilla, honey and black olive notes to the black plum merlot character. Serve with barbecue meats and smoked cheeses.

title: Queenston Mile Red 2016
Description: The Queenston Mile winery may be new to the scene, but the team behind these wines has spent over 20 years honing their craft in the St. David's Bench. This blend offers dark fruit and grippy tannins. A fine option for hearty barbecue fare. (Vintages panel, April 2019)

title: Fjord Vineyards Estate Cabernet Franc 2015
Description: The Hudson River Region has been an official appellation since the 1980s and the climate here is ideal for Cabernet Franc. This one was aged in French oak for 14 months. Expect a floral wine, with lifted black fruit and mineral tones and smooth but structured tannins. A great option for lamb.

title: Barbera d'Asti Superiore Barbaric 2016
Description: Made with 100% Barbera grapes. Ruby red in colour with orange hues. On the nose, very complex, spicy with well-defined woodland fruit notes and a woody aftertaste. Tannic, well structured, sapid and very persistent. Pair with game, red meats, ripened cheeses.

title: Nizza DOCG DueLù 2016
Description: Made with 100% Barbera grapes. Intense ruby red in colour with tawny hues after long aging. Very complex, spicy with well-defined notes of woodland fruits and an elegant woody note. Full bodied, with character, balanced acidity and considerable persistence. Pairs nicely with game, red meats, mature cheeses.

title: Vinha da Foz Tinto 2017
Description: On the nose this wine presents fresh red fruit, with a light touch of spice from maturation in oak, lending complexity and persistence. The palate displays silky, well integrated tannins complimented with a good level of acidity which keeps the finish nice and long. A similar fruit profile is carried over to the mouth, notes of crushed raspberry and cranberry contribute to the lively, youthful nature of this wine.

title: Ploutos 2016
Description: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah this wine has concentrated characters of cherry, sour cherry, plum, ripe fruit and spices from aging. Rich and intense tannins with long aftertaste and complexity. A long aging wine, ready to reward generously those who have the patience to age it in the cellar.

title: Chao das Rolas Red 2016
Description: Young with presence of red fruits. Firm but silky and with gentle acidity on the finish.

title: Corazon del Sol Block 22 Syrah 2014
